			if (ch[2533])
			{
				//ドク
				Message(14,"終于可以埋頭研究了。","","","");
			}
			else
			{
				ch[400] = 114;
				if (ch[214] < 2)
				{
					//ドク
					Message(14,"把這部分作為問題","雖然符合所有的情理…","","");
					Message(14,"可能会変得越難屶…","","","");
					//パリン
					Message(0,"精神好集中姶！","","","");
				}
				else
				{
					//ドク
					Message(14,"把這部分作為問題","雖然符合所有的情理…","","");
					Message(14,"可能会変得越難屶…","","","");
				}
				return 0;
			}
		}
		if (ch[1542] && !ch[1505])
		{
			//ドク
			ch[400] = 114;
			Message(14,"要是這里没有異常的話","就応該是這个部分出了問題…","","");
			Message(14,"但是原因在這里的話","可能会変得越難屶…","","");
			return 0;
		}
		if (!ch[1542])
		{
			ch[400] = 114;
			if (ch[214] < 2)
			{
				//ドク
				Message(14,"哘，這里改成這様","就変得那様…","","");
				//パリン
				Message(0,"喟～","","","");
				//ドク
				Message(14,"不不不，這个才","剛換過…","","");
				//パリン
				Message(0,"我在叫祢姶！","","","");
				//ドク
				Message(14,"所以咾，這邊的回路","有点奇怪…","","");
				//パリン
				Message(0,"不行…","叫也没用，算了叺。","","");
			}
			else
			{
				//ドク
				Message(14,"哘，這里改成這様","就変得那様…","","");
				Message(14,"不不不，這个才","剛換過…","","");
			}
			return 0;
		}
	}
	
	if (ch[2533] && map == 22 && !ch[1538])
	{
		if (!ch[2311])
		{
			// なわとびしたことが無い
			Message(14,"這里是我建的研究所。","","","");
			Message(14,"現在這里，研究的主題","是平常心。","","");
			Message(14,"特別是関于「焦躁」","的研究。","","");
			Message(14,"為什麼一焦躁起来犯錯就特別多咾。","是不是非常","有趣的領域咾。","");
			Message(14,"而研究所在募集","愿意作為様板的人","幇助研究。","");
			Message(14,"怎様？","加入我們的研究叺？","","");
			
			SelStart(50);
			SelText("離開",1);
			SelText("不離開",2);
			SelEnd();
			
			if (ch[50] == 1)
			{
				// 飛ぶ
				Message(14,"好，那麼馬上","去実験場叺。","","");
				mg = 1;
			}
//			else
//			{
//				Message(14,"我本来想完成実験之后","就把鑚頭的零件","売給祢……","");
//			}
		}
		else
		{
			// なわとびしたことがある
			if (ch[2311] < 21)
			{
				// なわとび不合格
				Message(14,"祢来得正好。","","","");
				if (ch[2311] == 1)
				{
					str ="上次好像一棒也没有避開。";
					Message(14,"上次協助時","好像一棒也没有避開。","","");
					Message(14,"研究様板","根本没有使用。","下次要再努力。","");
				}
				else
				{
					str ="過去最多避開了"+ (ch[2311] - 1) +"本";
					Message(14,"按照祢的様品至今為止",str,"","");
					Message(14,"的数値相当有趣","還不能用到研究中去。","下次再継続努力叺。","");
				}
				Message(14,"我希望祢也協助","這次的研究。","","");
				SelStart(50);
				SelText("協助",1);
				SelText("不協助",2);
				SelEnd();
				
				if (ch[50] == 1)
				{
					// 飛ぶ
					Message(14,"好，那就馬上","去実験場叺","","");
					mg = 1;
				}
//				else
//				{
//					Message(14,"研究様品的目標是３０以上。","能避開３０棒以上","就売給祢鑚頭的零件","");
//				}
			}
			else
			{
				// なわとび合格済み
				ch[400] = 14;
				Message(14,"祢来得正好。","","","");
				Message(14,"今天的研究也希望祢協助。","","","");
				SelStart(50);
				SelText("協助",2);
				SelText("不協助",3);
				SelEnd();
				
				if (ch[50] == 2)
				{
					// ミニゲーム
					Message(14,"是姶是姶。","祢肯協助研究姶。","","");
					str ="過去最多避開"+ (ch[2311] - 1) +"棒";
					Message(14,"按照祢的様品至今為止",str,"","");
					if (ch[2312])
					{
						Message(14,"算了破了自己的紀録","継続努力。","","");
					}
					if (!ch[2312] && ch[2311] > 80)
					{
						// ８０避け済み
						Message(14,"想再次看看，避開８０次","以上的地方。","","");
					}
					if (!ch[2312] && ch[2311] < 81)
					{
						// まだ
						Message(14,"一次也好","想見識一下","避開８０次。","");
					}
					// 飛ぶ
					Message(14,"那麼馬上","去実験場叺","","");
					mg = 1;
				}
				else 
				{
//					if (ch[50] != 2 && ch[50] != 1)
					{
						str ="過去最多避開"+ (ch[2311] - 1) +"棒";
						Message(14,"按照至今為止祢的様品",str,"","");
						Message(14,"希望祢能継続協助下次的研究。","","","");
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	ch[400] = -1;
	
	if (ch[1538])
	{
		return 0;
	}
	if (mg)
	{
		// ミニゲームする
		ch[420] = -450;
		ch[421] = 1985;
		ch[422] = 666;
		ch[423] = 0;
		ch[424] = 535;
		ch[425] = 65;
		KaguTest(30019,1);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(10);
		Event(231);
		SE(476);
		Wait(60);
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = 0;
		ch[426] = 12;
		KaguTest(30060,0);
		Walk(ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
		Wait(ch[423]);
		ch[2145] = 0;
		Black(0,100,15);
		Wait(15);
		KaguTest(30019,0);
		ch[2144] = 1;
		ch[2497] = 1;
		LoadMap(22);
		CharPos(0,0,0,-93);
		Camera(14,-550,900,370);
		Look(0,14);
		Look(14,0);
		KaguTest(12000,58);
		KaguTest(12001,58);
		KaguTest(12000,59);
		KaguTest(12001,59);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
		Black(0,0,15);
		
		ch[400] = 14;
		if (ch[2311] < 21)
		{
			// 合格して無いとき
			Message(14,"讓我説明実験的内容叺。","","","");
			Message(14,"只要一味地避開","迫緊的激光","就是実験的内容。","");
			Message(14,"被激光擦過時","就代表今次実験的結束。","","");
			Message(14,"実験数値的計数器","以躱開激光為１棒計算。","","");
			Message(14,"作為実験様品","目標是計数器顕示","２０棒以上。","");
		}
		else
		{
			Message(14,"讓我説明実験的内容叺。","","","");
			Message(14,"只要一味地避開","迫緊的激光","就是実験的内容","");
			Message(14,"被激光擦過時","就代表今次実験的結束。","","");
			Message(14,"実験数値的計数器","以躱開激光為1棒計算。","","");
			Message(14,"作為実験様品","請尽全力避得越多越好。","","");
		}
		Message(14,"我期待祢的表現。","","","");
		Wait(15);
		Camera(0,0,-1000,620);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(30);
		ch[3982] = 4;
		ch[400] = -1;
		// テクスチャ読み込んでおく
		KaguTest2(10009,0,"minigm.iti");
		Wait(90);
		BGM(10);
		ch[2061] = 1;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
#EndScript

// なわとび終了
#Script:01153
int main()
{
	int go;
	int best;
	int syokai;
	string str;
	go = 0;
	best = 0;
	syokai = 0;
	// ホイッスル
	SE(548);
	ch[3982] = 0;
	Wait(60);
	Black(0,100,30);
	Wait(30);
	ch[2144] = 0;
	ch[2497] = 0;
	LoadMap(22);
	KaguTest2(10010,0,"minigm");
	CharPos(0,340,-360,0);
	Camera(14,-550,900,370);
	Look(0,14);
	Look(14,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	Black(0,0,30);
	Wait(30);
	
	ch[2061] = 0;
	if (ch[2311] < 21)
	{
		// 過去に合格していない
		go = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2145] > ch[2311] - 1 && ch[2311] > 0)
	{
		// 自己ベスト
		best = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2311] == 0)
	{
		syokai = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2145] > ch[2311] - 1)
	{
		ch[2311] = ch[2145] + 1;
	}
	
	if (!ch[2534] && ch[2145] > 19)
	{
		// 合格
		ch[400] = 14;
		ch[2289] = 1;
		//パリン
		Message(0,"呼～，出了一身汗。","","","");
		//ドク
		Message(14,"哘，収集到相当","不錯的様品啅！","","");
		Message(14,"初歩実験","算是完成了。","","");
		//パリン
		Message(0,"那麼，快去修理","碧曼陀山的纜車姶！","","");
		//ドク
		Message(14,"纜車？","","","");
		Message(14,"知道了，既然発生了故障","運作起来可能会揺晃不定。","","");
		Message(14,"那麼，我先去那邊等祢。","","","");
		KaguTest(30005,0);
		Camera(14,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
		KaguTest(30062,0);
		ch[420] = 14;
		KaguTest(30063,0);
		ch[400] = 114;
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = -740;
		ch[420] = 1;
		ch[426] = 12;
		KaguTest(30060,14);
		Walk2(14,ch[421]*2,ch[422]*2,ch[423]/2);
		Wait(ch[423]/2);
		KaguTest(30061,0);
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = -1300;
		ch[426] = 12;
		KaguTest(30060,14);
		Walk2(14,ch[421]*2,ch[422]*2,ch[423]/2);
		Wait((ch[423] / 2) - 15);
		Camera(-1,0,0,0);
		ch[420] = 3;
		KaguTest(30064,14);
		Wait(15);
		CharPos(14,-200000,0,0);
		KaguTest(30063,-1);
		ch[2534] = 1;
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (!ch[2534] && ch[2145] < 20)
	{
		ch[400] = 14;
		//ドク
		Message(14,"或許很快就要失敗。","好像拿不到必要的資料。","","");
		Message(14,"再委托祢一次。","","","");
		//パリン
		Message(0,"姶～，我已経很快了啀。","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	
	if (ch[2145] > 19 && go)
	{
		// 初合格
		str ="避過了"+ ch[2145] +"棒";
		ch[400] = 14;
		Message(14,"恭喜。達成様品目標了。",str,"","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (go && best)
	{
		// 合格ならず。しかし，自己ベスト
		str ="只避開"+ ch[2145] +"棒";
		ch[400] = 14;
		Message(14,"算是超了過往的紀録叺。","可惜姶。",str,"");
		Message(14,"達到下回的目標","祢再努力点","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (go)
	{
		// 合格ならず。しかも、自己ベストでもない
		if (ch[2145] > 0)
		{
			str ="只避開"+ ch[2145] +"棒";
		}
		else
		{
			str ="1棒也没有避開";
		}
		ch[400] = 14;
		Message(14,"真可惜。",str,"","");
		Message(14,"不能達成","様品目標。","","");
		Message(0,"的確有点難度叺。","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (best)
	{
		// 既に合格済み。自己ベスト
		if(ch[2145] > 79)
		{
			// 鬼だべ
			Message(0,"呀呵～。","創了自己的最高紀録。","","");
			ch[400] = 14;
			Message(14,"厲害。","天才誕生了！","","");
			str ="避開"+ ch[2145] +"棒";
			Message(14,str,"","","");
			if (!ch[2312])
			{
				Message(14,"能創下如此成績的人","我从来没有見過。","","");
				Message(14,"為了証明祢為実験作出的貢献","這塊金奨牌送給祢。","","");
				Mes("得到『金奨牌』。");
				ch[2289] = 2;
				KaguTest(20022,79);
				GetItem(79);
				Wait(90);
				
				if (ch[2145] > 199 && !ch[2641])
				{
//					Message(14,"而且実験数値超過了２００","下次商品可以給祢打折優恵。","","");
					ch[2641] = 1;
				}
				Message(0,"謝謝","","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
				ch[2312] = 1;
			}
			else
			{
				Message(14,"能創下如此成績的人","就只有祢姶。","","");
				Message(14,"這次送祢銀奨牌。","","","");
				KaguTest(20022,76);
				GetItem(76);
				Wait(90);
				if (ch[2145] > 199 && !ch[2641])
				{
//					Message(14,"而且実験数値超過了２００","下次商品可以給祢打折優恵。","","");
					ch[2641] = 1;
				}
				Message(0,"謝謝！","","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
			}
			return 0;
		}
		Message(0,"呀呵～","創了自己的最高紀録！","","");
		ch[400] = 14;
		str ="避開"+ ch[2145] +"棒";
		Message(14,"厲害。",str,"","");
		Message(14,"接下来請祢接受８０棒的挑戦。","","","");
		Message(0,"放心交給我叺。","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	// 合格済み。自己ベストではない
	if(ch[2145] > 79)
	{
		// 鬼だべ
		ch[400] = 14;
		Message(14,"厲害。","天才誕生了！","","");
		str ="避開"+ ch[2145] +"棒";
		Message(14,str,"","","");
		if (!ch[2312])
		{
			Message(14,"能創下如此成績的人","我从来没見過。","","");
			Message(14,"為了証明祢為実験作出的貢献","這塊金奨牌送給祢。","","");
			Mes("得到『金奨牌』。");
			ch[2289] = 2;
			KaguTest(20022,79);
			GetItem(79);
			Wait(90);
			
			if (ch[2145] > 199 && !ch[2641])
			{
//				Message(14,"而且実験数値超過了200","下次商品可以給祢打折優恵。","","");
				ch[2641] = 1;
			}
			Message(0,"謝謝祢！","","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			ch[2312] = 1;
		}
		else
		{
			Message(14,"能創下如此成績的人","就只有祢姶。","","");
			Message(0,"可是，我還没尽全力。","下次要更努力。","","");
			Message(14,"這次送祢銅奨牌。","","","");
			KaguTest(20022,77);
			GetItem(77);
			Wait(90);
			Message(0,"謝謝。","","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
		}
		return 0;
	}
	// 鬼じゃない
	if (ch[2145] > 0)
	{
		str ="避開"+ ch[2145] +"棒";
	}
	else
	{
		str ="１棒也没避開";
	}
	ch[400] = 14;
	Message(14,"這次的激光",str,"","");
	Message(0,"結果不如人意咾。","","","");
	Message(14,"希望祢再協助","我們下次的実験。","","");
	ch[400] = -1;
	return 0;
}

// 岩壊しオバケ
#Script:01154
int main()
{
	int mg;
	string str;
	int nukeru;
	int nukeru2;
	int map;
	nukeru = 0;
	mg = 0;
	KaguTest(20010,0);
	map = ch[420];
	ch[400] = 4;
	if (ch[2526] && !ch[2527])
	{
		//ペケ
		Message(4,"赶快，請莫古雷奴他們","幇助修復工作叺。","","");
		Message(4,"剛才叫過了","我想応該很快就来。","","");
		nukeru = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2524] && !ch[2525])
	{
		// ペケにスポンサーを依頼
		ch[2525] = 1;
		ch[400] = 4;
		
		KaguTest(20008,0);
		ch[2039] = ch[430];
		
		if (ch[2528])
		{
			Message(4,"姶，有什麼事？","","","");
		}
		else
		{
			//ペケ
			Message(4,"找我們有什麼事？","","","");
		}
		ch[2528] = 1;
		Message(0,"其実是…","","","");
		Black(0,100,15);
		Wait(30);
		Black(0,0,15);
		//ペケ
		Message(4,"想讓我賛助幽霊","之家的修復工程？","","");
		Message(4,"我是无所謂啀。","","","");
		//パリン
		Message(0,"真的呎？祢好爽快姶！","","","");
		
		if (ch[3957])
		{
			// ポポン中
			//ペケ
			Message(4,"因為祢太可愛了","我没理由拒决姶。","","");
			Message(4,"不過，作為交換条件","在我発悶的時候","祢要陪我。","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"怪不得祢搶着称賛。","我能為祢做什麼？","","");
			//ペケ
			Message(4,"希望祢能参加","我們的游戯。","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"游戯？","怎麼好咾……","","");
			ch[2554] = 1;
		}
		else
		{
			//ペケ
			Message(4,"鑚頭的主人","委托我做事的話当然不会拒絶。","","");
			Message(4,"不過，是有条件的。","","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"什麼？","","","");
			//ペケ
			Message(4,"最近，都没発生","有趣的事。","","");
			Message(4,"所以，希望祢能讓我們","開懐地笑笑。","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"讓祢們笑","我該怎様做咾…","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
	}
	ch[2528] = 1;
	if (ch[2525] && !ch[2554])
	{
		ch[400] = 4;
		KaguTest(20008,0);
		nukeru = 1;
		if (ch[430] == ch[2039])
		{
			// 初めて会ったときと同じ顔
			//ペケ
			Message(4,"快点快点！","","","");
			Message(4,"快点想屶法","讓我笑出来","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
		// お面系でなければすべて素顔扱い
		switch(ch[430])
		{
		case 37:
		case 41:
		case 43:
		case 44:
		case 45:
		case 46:
		case 47:
		case 57:
		case 61:
		case 62:
			ch[430] = 0;
		}
		if ((ch[2039] != 42 && ch[430] == 42) || ((ch[2039] == 42 || ch[2039] == 56) && ch[430] == 0) || (ch[2039] != 56 && ch[430] == 56))
		{
			// 正解。
			ch[2554] = 1;
			if ((ch[2039] == 42 && ch[430] != 56) || (ch[2039] == 56 && ch[430] != 42))
			{
				// 素顔
				//ペケ
				Message(4,"…………………………","","","");
				Message(4,"哂…","","","");
				//パリン
				Message(0,"？？？","","","");
				//ペケ

				Message(0,"…鬼臉？","","","");

			else
			{
				// ガスマスク｜おさるの帽子
				//ペケ

				Message(4,"哂…","","","");
				Message(4,"哘呼，哂哂哂…","好，好有趣的表情。","","");
				//パリン
				Message(0,"呀呵，祢笑了！","","","");
				//ペケ
				Message(4,"哈…我隔了好久没有","从心底里笑出来姶。","","");
				//パリン
				Message(0,"我贏咊！","","","");
			}
			//ペケ
			Message(4,"我輸了？","有点不服咾。","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"這是，我們的約定姶。","賛助就拝托祢了。","","");
			//ペケ
			Message(4,"…不要","","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"為什麼姶！","","","");
			//ペケ
			Message(4,"我改変主意了。","","","");
			Message(4,"要祢陪我","玩游戯。","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"游戯？","","","");
			//ペケ

			Message(4,"要是祢不想挑戦游戯","現在放弃也来得及。","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"真是个別扞的人。","","","");
			//ペケ
			Message(4,"祢考慮得怎様？","","","");
		}
		if (!ch[2554])
		{
			if (ch[430] == 40 || ch[430] == 43 || ch[430] == 44 || ch[430] == 46 || ch[430] == 47 || ch[430] == 48 || ch[430] == 56 || ch[430] == 57 || ch[430] == 62 || ch[430] == 21 )

				// 不正解。微妙
				//ペケ

				//ペケ
				Message(4,"没，我没有笑姶。","","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
				return 0;
			}
			if (ch[430] != 42)
			{
				// 不正解。だめだめ
				Message(4,"不行姶。","重新再来一次叺。","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
				return 0;
			}
		}
		
	}
	if (ch[2554] && !ch[2526])
	{
		// ミニゲームするか聞く
		if (ch[2554] == 1)
		{
			ch[2554] = 2;
		}
		else
		{
			//ペケ
			Message(4,"游戯玩過関的話","我就賛助叺。","","");

		SelText("挑戦游戯",1);
		SelText("不挑戦游戯",2);
		SelEnd();

		{
			mg = 1;
		}
		else
		{
			Message(4,"当祢想挑戦的時候","再来叺。","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
		nukeru = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2497])
	{
		return 0;
	}
	ch[400] = 4;
	ch[204]++;
	if (!nukeru)
	{
		if (ch[1538])
		{
			//ペケ
			Message(4,"幽霊之家的修復","工作進行很順利咾。","","");

			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
		if (ch[1571] && !ch[1538])
		{
			//ペケ
			Message(4,"好厲害的地震姶。","","","");
			Message(4,"待会要去看看家中的収蔵","有没有大碍。","","");
		}
		if (ch[1513] && !ch[1571])
		{
			if (ch[204] < 2)
			{
				//ペケ
				Message(4,"以前，有位人類的勇者来找我","賛助鑚頭的改造費。","","");
				//パリン

				Message(0,"哘，好无情的人姶。","","","");
			}
			else
			{

				Message(4,"以前，有位人類的勇者来找我","賛助鑚頭的改造費。","","");
				Message(4,"后来叫他帰還費用","却装僊説","什麼都忘記了。","");
			}

		{

			{
				//ペケ

			}
			else
			{
				//ペケ
				Message(4,"做了賛助商之后","就中止了在山中","建造別墅的工程。","");
				Message(4,"就算有銭","也不能浪費嘛。","","");
			}
		}
		if (!ch[1505])
		{
			//ペケ
			Message(4,"找我有事呎？","","","");
			Message(4,"我擁有這間豪宅，","幽霊之中的最有銭的貝庫就是我了。","","");
			Message(4,"最近，都没発生有趣的事","好悶啅。","","");
		}
	}
	
	if (ch[2527] && map == 23 && !ch[1538])
	{
		// もぐら叩きしたことがある
		if (ch[2313] < 61)
		{
			// なわとび不合格
			if (ch[2313] == 1)
			{
				str ="上次似乎没有叩到錣鼠。";
			}
			else
			{
				str ="曾叩了最多"+ (ch[2313] - 1) +"";
			}
				
			Message(4,"祢現在，要敲錣鼠呎？",str,"","");
			SelStart(50);
			SelText("敲錣鼠",1);
			SelText("不敲錣鼠",2);
			SelEnd();

			{
				// 飛ぶ
				Message(4,"准備了啅。","","","");
				mg = 1;
			}
			else
			{
				Message(4,str,"","","");
				Message(4,"想敲錣鼠時","再来找我。","","");
			}
		}
		else
		{
			// もぐら叩き合格済み
			ch[400] = 4;
			Message(4,"要敲錣鼠呎？",str,"","");
			SelStart(50);
			SelText("敲錣鼠",1);
			SelText("不敲錣鼠",2);
			SelEnd();

			{
				// ミニゲーム
				str ="曾叩了最多"+ (ch[2313] - 1) +"。";
				if (!ch[2314])
				{
					// 過去ベストが１００叩き以上
					if (ch[2313] > 100)
					{
						Message(4,str,"好想再看看敲錣鼠１００以上啅。","","");
					}
					else
					{
						Message(4,str,"接下来的目標是１００叩。","","");
					}
				}
				else
				{
					Message(4,str,"目標是超越自己的紀録。","","");
				}
					// 飛ぶ
				mg = 1;
			}
			else 
			{
				if (ch[50] != 2 && ch[50] != 1)
				{
					str ="曾叩了最多"+ (ch[2313] - 1) +"";
					Message(4,"敲錣鼠的",str,"","");
					Message(4,"希望祢下次再来敲錣鼠。","","","");
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	ch[400] = -1;
	
	if (ch[1538])
	{
		return 0;
	}
	
	if (mg)
	{
		// ミニゲームする
		ch[2145] = 0;
		Camera(4,-37,850,370);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(10);
		ch[424] = 100;
		ch[425] = -300;
		ch[426] = 12;
		KaguTest(30060,0);
		ch[400] = 104;
		Walk(ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
		Wait(ch[423]);
		KaguTest(30061,0);
		KaguTest(30062,0);
		Look(0,4);
		ch[420] = 4;
		KaguTest(30063,0);
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = -1075;
		ch[426] = 12;
		KaguTest(30060,4);
		if (ch[423] < 2)
		{
			ch[423] = 2;
		}
		Walk2(4,ch[421]*2,ch[422]*2,ch[423]/2);
		Wait(ch[423]/2);
		KaguTest(30061,4);
		ch[424] = 450;
		ch[425] = -900;
		ch[426] = 12;
		KaguTest(30060,4);
		if (ch[423] < 2)
		{
			ch[423] = 2;
		}
		Walk2(4,ch[421]*2,ch[422]*2,ch[423]/2);
		Wait(ch[423]/2);
		KaguTest(30061,4);
		ch[424] = 675;
		ch[425] = -825;
		ch[426] = 12;
		KaguTest(30060,4);
		Camera(0,-1575,-250,1300);
		if (ch[423] < 2)
		{
			ch[423] = 2;
		}
		Walk2(4,ch[421]*2,ch[422]*2,ch[423]/2);
		Wait(ch[423]/2);
		Look(4,0);
		Wait(10);
		Event(231);
		SE(474);
		SE(475);
		Wait(45);

//		Wait(15);

		ch[2497] = 1;

//		CharPos(59,150,450,0);

		Camera(4,-825,-50,370);
		CrossFade();
		KaguTest(30063,-1);
		Look(0,4);
		Look(58,0);
		Look(59,0);
		Look(4,0);

		KaguTest(12000,59);
		KaguTest(12001,58);
		KaguTest(12001,59);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
		Black(0,0,15);
		Wait(15);
		ch[400] = 4;
		int gonum;
		string gotxt;
		if (ch[455] == 1)
		{
			// ビギナー
			gonum = 40;
		}
		if (ch[455] == 0)
		{
			// ノーマル
			gonum = 50;
		}
		if (ch[455] == 2)
		{
			// ハード以上
			gonum = 60;
		}
		gotxt =""+gonum+"次以上的話";
		
		if (ch[2313] < gonum + 1)
		{
			// 合格してない時
			Message(4,"説一下規則叺。","","","");
			Message(4,"１分種内，不断叩来回走動的","錣鼠幽霊。","","");
			Message(4,gotxt,"游玩就過関。","","");
		}
		else
		{
			// 合格している時
			Message(4,"１分種内，不断叩来回走動的","錣鼠幽霊。","","");
		}
		Message(4,"敲錣鼠馬上開始。","","","");
		Wait(10);
//		Camera(0,0,-900,370);
		Camera(-1,0,0,0);
		CrossFade();
//		KaguTest(12000,58);
//		KaguTest(12000,59);
//		KaguTest(12001,58);
//		KaguTest(12001,59);
		Wait(15);
		ch[3982] = 4;
		ch[400] = -1;
		
		// テクスチャ読み込んでおく
		KaguTest2(10009,0,"minigm.iti");
		
		Wait(90);
		Camera(-1,0,0,0);
		CrossFade();
		BGM(10);
		ch[2061] = 1;
	}
	
	return 0;
}

// 岩壊し終了
#Script:01155
int main()
{
	if (ch[2316])
	{
		ch[2316] = 0;
		PostScr(1156);
		return 0;
	}
	int go;
	int best;
	int syokai;
	string str;
	go = 0;
	best = 0;
	syokai = 0;
	// ホイッスル
	SE(548);
	ch[3982] = 0;
	Wait(60);
	Black(0,100,30);
	Wait(30);
	ch[2144] = 0;
	ch[2497] = 0;
	LoadMap(21);
	KaguTest2(10010,0,"minigm");
	CharPos(0,0,600,-150);
	Camera(2,1050,600,220);
	Look(0,2);
	Look(2,0);
	Look(1,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	Black(0,0,30);
	Wait(30);
	
	ch[2061] = 0;
	if (ch[2143] < 27)
	{
		// 過去に合格していない
		go = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2145] > ch[2143] - 1 && ch[2143] > 0)
	{
		// 自己ベスト
		best = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2145] > ch[2143] - 1)
	{
		ch[2143] = ch[2145] + 1;
	}
	
	if (ch[2145] > 25 && go)
	{
		// 初合格
		str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ (50 - ch[2145]) +"祢贏了啅";
		ch[400] = 2;
		ch[2288] = 1;
		Message(2,"恭喜祢。",str,"","");
		
		if (!ch[2509])
		{
			//モグレヌ
			Message(2,"十分激烈的决斗咾。","","","");
			Message(2,"按照約定","我承担挧開落石的工作。","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"可是再想想，用那双輸給我的手臂","去挧不怕呎？","","");
			//モグレヌ
			Message(2,"掘洞的快慢我雖然敗給祢","説到力量還是第一的。","","");
			Message(2,"馬上就出発","先去洞穴那邊叺。","","");
			// 岩を壊しに行く
			KaguTest(30005,0);
			Camera(2,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
			KaguTest(30062,0);
			ch[420] = 2;
			KaguTest(30063,0); // パリンはモグレヌをみつめる
			ch[400] = 102;
			ch[424] = 700;
			ch[425] = 600;
			ch[420] = 1;
			ch[426] = 12;
			KaguTest(30060,2);
			Walk2(2,ch[421]*2,ch[422]*2,ch[423]/2);
			Wait(ch[423]/2);
			KaguTest(30061,0);
			ch[424] = 1750;
			ch[425] = 600;
			ch[420] = 1;
			ch[426] = 12;
			KaguTest(30060,2);
			if (ch[423] - 15 < 1)
			{
				ch[423] = 1;
			}
			Walk2(2,ch[421]*2,ch[422]*2,ch[423] / 2);
			Wait((ch[423] / 2) - 15);
			ch[420] = 3;
			KaguTest(30064,2);
			Wait(25);
			Camera(-1,0,0,0);
			CharPos(2,-200000,0,0);
			KaguTest(30063,-1,);	
			ch[400] = -1;
			ch[2509] = 1;
			return 0;
		}
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (!ch[2509] && go)
	{
		if (ch[2145] == 25)
		{
			// 同点だべ
			str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ (50 - ch[2145]) +"平局";
			//モグレヌ
			Message(2,str,"","","");
			Message(2,"同分時","誰也不算贏。","","");
			Message(2,"重来就好了。","","","");
		}
		else
		{
			str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ (50 - ch[2145]) +"是我的勝利";
			//モグレヌ
			Message(2,str,"","","");
			Message(2,"就這種程度","根本不配做対手。","","");
			Message(2,"重来就好。","","","");
		}
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	
	if (go && best)
	{
		// 合格ならず。しかし、自己ベスト
		if(ch[2145] == 25)
		{
			str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ (50 - ch[2145]) +"同分姶";
		}
		else
		{
			str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ (50 - ch[2145]) +"我勝出了";
		}
		ch[400] = 2;
		
		Message(2,"雖然成績比之前的好","還是很可惜姶。","","");
		Message(2,str,"","","");
		Message(0,"還需要再努力修行。","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (go)
	{
		// 合格ならず。しかも、自己ベストでもない
		if(ch[2145] == 25)
		{
			str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ (50 - ch[2145]) +"同分姶";
		}
		else
		{
			str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ (50 - ch[2145]) +"我勝出了";
		}
		ch[400] = 2;
		Message(2,"真可惜。",str,"","");
		if (syokai)
		{
			Message(2,"想為祢慶祝也没屶法了。","","","");
		}
		else
		{
			Message(2,"成績比前次還差。","","","");
		}
		Message(0,"還需要更努力。","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (best)
	{
		// 既に合格済み。自己ベスト
		if(ch[2145] > 34)
		{
			// 鬼だべ
			Message(0,"呀呵～","超過自己的紀録。","","");
			ch[400] = 2;
			Message(2,"好厲害。","祢是破坏之神姶。","","");
			str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ (50 - ch[2145]) +"圧倒性勝利";
			Message(2,str,"怎麼看祢也不像人類。","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			ch[2146] = 1;
			return 0;
		}
		Message(0,"呀呵～","超過自己的紀録。","","");
		ch[400] = 2;
		str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ (50 - ch[2145]) +"祢贏了";
		Message(2,"好厲害。",str,"","");
		Message(2,"這程度能軽而易挙地","贏過妖精了。","","");
		Message(0,"交給我叺。","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	// 合格済み。自己ベストではない
	if(ch[2145] > 34)
	{
		// 鬼だべ
		ch[400] = 2;
		Message(2,"好厲害。","祢是破坏之神姶。","","");
		str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ (50 - ch[2145]) +"圧倒性勝利。";
		Message(2,str,"怎麼看祢也不像人類。","","");
		ch[2146] = 1;
		return 0;
	}
	// 鬼じゃない
	if (ch[2145] > 24)
	{
		if (ch[2145] == 25)
		{
			str ="今回"+ ch[2145] +"："+ (50 - ch[2145]) +"同分姶";
		}
		else
		{
			str ="今回"+ ch[2145] +"："+ (50 - ch[2145]) +"祢贏了";
		}
	}
	else
	{
		str ="這次是"+ ch[2145] +"："+ (50 - ch[2145]) +"我贏了";
	}
	ch[400] = 2;
	Message(2,str,"","","");
	Message(2,"結果不如人意咾。","","","");
	Message(0,"下次一定拿好成績。","","","");
	ch[400] = -1;
	return 0;
}
#EndScript

// 岩壊し終了
#Script:01156
int main()
{
	int go;
	int best;
	int syokai;
	string str;
	go = 0;
	best = 0;
	syokai = 0;
	// ホイッスル
	SE(548);
	ch[3982] = 0;
	Wait(60);
	Black(0,100,30);
	Wait(30);
	ch[2144] = 0;
	ch[2497] = 0;
	LoadMap(21);
	KaguTest2(10010,0,"minigm");
	CharPos(0,0,600,0);
	Camera(1,1050,600,220);
	Look(0,1);
	Look(2,0);
	Look(1,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	Black(0,0,30);
	Wait(30);
	
	ch[2061] = 0;
	if (ch[2315] < 27)
	{
		// 過去に合格していない
		go = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2145] > ch[2315] - 1 && ch[2315] > 0)
	{
		// 自己ベスト
		best = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2315] == 0)
	{
		syokai = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2145] > ch[2315] - 1)
	{
		ch[2315] = ch[2145] + 1;
	}
	
	if (ch[2145] > 25 && go)
	{
		// 初合格
		str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ (50 - ch[2145]) +"祢贏了";
		ch[400] = 1;
		Look(0,1);
//		Message(2,"恭喜祢。合格了。",str,"","");
		Message(1,"不愧為打敗我弟弟的人。",str,"","");
		Message(1,"作為贏了我的証明","這塊金奨牌送給祢。","","");
		Mes("得到『金奨牌』。");
		ch[2288] = 2;
		KaguTest(20022,79);
		GetItem(79);
		Wait(90);
		Message(0,"謝謝祢","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (go && best)
	{
		// 合格ならず。しかし、自己ベスト
		if (ch[2145] == 25)
		{
			str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ (50 - ch[2145]) +"同分";
		}
		else
		{
			str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ (50 - ch[2145]) +"哥哥勝出";
		}
		Look(0,1);
		ch[400] = 1;
		Message(1,"雖然比上次努力了","還真可惜姶！","","");
		Look(0,2);
		ch[400] = 2;
		Message(2,str,"","","");
		Message(0,"還需要継続努力。","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (go)
	{
		// 合格ならず。しかも、自己ベストでもない
		if (ch[2145] == 25)
		{
			str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ (50 - ch[2145]) +"同分";
		}
		else
		{
			str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ (50 - ch[2145]) +"我贏了";
		}
		ch[400] = 1;
		Message(1,"真可惜。",str,"","");
		ch[400] = 2;
		Look(0,2);
		Message(2,"莫古羅烏哥哥","果然是最強的。","","");
		Message(0,"還需要継続努力。","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (best)
	{
		// 既に合格済み。自己ベスト
		if(ch[2145] > 34)
		{
			// 鬼だべ
			Message(0,"呀呵～","超越了自己的紀録。","","");
			ch[400] = 1;
			Message(1,"好厲害。","不愧為破坏之神。","","");
			Look(0,2);
			str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ (50 - ch[2145]) +"圧倒性贏了哥哥";
			Message(2,str,"果然，再怎麼看也不像是人類。","","");
			Look(0,1);
			ch[400] = 1;
			if (!ch[2640])
			{
				Message(1,"到目前為止","祢是第一个贏過我的。","","");
//				Message(1,"下次商品也給祢打折優恵叺。","","","");
				ch[400] = 2;
				Look(0,2);
				Message(2,"這次送祢銀奨牌。","","","");
				KaguTest(20022,76);
				GetItem(76);
				Wait(90);
				Message(0,"謝謝！","","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
				ch[2640] = 1;
			}
			else
			{
				Message(1,"到目前為止能贏過我的","就只有祢一个了。","","");
//				Message(1,"好叺，下次商品再給祢打折優恵叺。","","","");
				ch[400] = 2;
				Look(0,2);
				Message(2,"這次送祢銀奨牌。","","","");
				KaguTest(20022,76);
				GetItem(76);
				Wait(90);
				Message(0,"謝謝！","","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
			}
			return 0;
		}
		Message(0,"呀呵～","超越了自己的紀録。","","");
		ch[400] = 2;
		str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ (50 - ch[2145]) +"祢贏了";
		Message(2,"好厲害。",str,"","");
		ch[400] = 1;
		Look(0,1);
		Message(2,"這次送祢銅奨牌。","","","");
		KaguTest(20022,77);
		GetItem(77);
		Wait(90);
		Message(0,"謝謝祢！","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	// 合格済み。自己ベストではない
	if(ch[2145] > 34)
	{
		// 鬼だべ
		ch[400] = 1;
		Message(1,"好厲害。","不愧為破坏之神。","","");
		Look(0,2);
		str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ (50 - ch[2145]) +"圧倒性贏了哥哥";
		Message(2,str,"果然，再怎麼看也不像是人類。","","");
		Look(0,1);
		ch[400] = 1;
		if (!ch[2640])
		{
			Message(1,"到目前為止能贏我的","祢是第一个。","","");
//			Message(1,"下次商品給祢打折優恵叺。","","","");
			ch[400] = 2;
			Look(0,2);
			Message(2,"這次送祢銀奨牌。","","","");
			KaguTest(20022,76);
			GetItem(76);
			Wait(90);
			Message(0,"謝謝！","","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			ch[2640] = 1;
		}
		else
		{
			Message(1,"到目前為止能贏過我的","就只有祢一个了。","","");
//			Message(1,"好叺，下次商品再給祢打折優恵叺。","","","");
			ch[400] = 2;
			Look(0,2);
			Message(2,"這次送給祢銅奨牌。","","","");
			KaguTest(20022,77);
			GetItem(77);
			Wait(90);
			Message(0,"謝謝！","","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
		}
		return 0;
	}
	// 鬼じゃない
	if (ch[2145] > 24)
	{
		if (ch[2145] == 25)
		{
			str ="今回"+ ch[2145] +"："+ (50 - ch[2145]) +"同分";
		}
		else
		{
			str ="今回"+ ch[2145] +"："+ (50 - ch[2145]) +"祢贏了";
		}
	}
	else
	{
		str ="今回"+ ch[2145] +"："+ (50 - ch[2145]) +"我贏了";
	}
	ch[400] = 1;
	Message(1,str,"","","");
	ch[400] = 2;
	Look(0,2);
	Message(2,"結果似乎不如人意咾。","","","");
	Message(0,"下次一定拿好成績。","","","");
	ch[400] = -1;
	return 0;
}
#EndScript

// サッカー終了
#Script:01157
int main()
{
	int go;
	int best;
	int syokai;
	string str;
	go = 0;
	best = 0;
	syokai = 0;
	// ホイッスル
	SE(548);
	ch[3982] = 0;
	Wait(60);
	Black(0,100,30);
	Wait(30);
	ch[2144] = 0;
	ch[2497] = 0;
	LoadMap(24);
	KaguTest2(10010,0,"minigm");
	CharPos(0,0,0,0);
	Camera(19,0,-510,370);
	Look(0,19);
	Look(19,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(30);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	Black(0,0,30);
	Wait(30);
	ch[2061] = 0;
	
	if (ch[2318] - ch[2321] <= 0)
	{
		// 過去に合格していない
		go = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2145] - ch[2325] > ch[2318] - ch[2321])
	{
		// 自己ベスト
		best = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2324] == 0)
	{
		syokai = 1;
		ch[2324] = 1;
	}
	int chchch;
	chchch = 0;
	if (ch[2145] - ch[2325] > ch[2318] - ch[2321])
	{
		chchch = 1;
	}
	if (ch[2318] == 0 && ch[2321] == 0)
	{
		chchch = 1;
	}
	if (chchch)
	{
		ch[2318] = ch[2145];
		ch[2321] = ch[2325];
	}
	
	if (ch[2145] - ch[2325] > 0 && go)
	{
		// 初合格
		str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ ch[2325] +"祢們勝利了";
		ch[400] = 19;
		ch[2291] = 1;
		Look(0,19);
		Message(19,"干的不錯。",str,"","");
		Message(19,"作為贏了莫托洛的証明","送祢這塊金奨牌。","","");
		Mes("得到『金奨牌』。");
		ch[2291] = 2;
		KaguTest(20022,79);
		GetItem(79);
		Wait(90);
		Message(0,"謝謝！","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (go && best)
	{
		// 合格ならず。しかし、自己ベスト
		Look(0,19);
		ch[400] = 19;
		if (ch[2145] == ch[2325])
		{
			str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ ch[2325] +"同分";
			Message(19,"作為初学者来説","表現算是相当不錯了。","","");
			Message(19,str,"","","");
			Message(0,"下次一定能贏！","","","");
		}
		else
		{
			str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ ch[2325] +"我們勝利啀";
			Message(19,"我知道祢很努力了","好可惜姶。","","");
			Message(19,str,"","","");
			Message(0,"還需要継続努力。","","","");
		}
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (go)
	{
		// 合格ならず。しかも、自己ベストでもない
		Look(0,19);
		ch[400] = 19;
		if (ch[2145] == ch[2325])
		{
			str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ ch[2325] +"同分";
			Message(19,"表現還不錯。",str,"","");
			Message(0,"下次一定能贏。","","","");
		}
		else
		{
			str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ ch[2325] +"我們勝利了";
			Message(19,"真可惜姶。",str,"","");
			Message(0,"以世界為目標的人","過流石這関很難困咾。","","");
		}
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (best)
	{
		// 既に合格済み。自己ベスト
		if(ch[2145] - ch[2325] > ch[2325])
		{
			// 鬼だべ
			ch[400] = 19;
			str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ ch[2325] +"以絶対優勢取勝……";
			Message(19,"了不起。","以世界為目標的莫托洛。",str,"");
			Message(0,"以世界為目標","会這麼弱呎？","","");
			Message(19,"喇……","祢，祢們太強的原故叺。","","");
			if (!ch[2326])
			{
				Message(19,"到此為止讓我隊惨敗的","祢們是頭一隊。","","");
//				if (ch[3975] > 50)
//				{
//					Message(19,"好了，所有的店鋪","商品都給祢","打折優恵。","");
//					ch[3975] -= 10;
//				}
				Message(19,"這次給祢銀奨牌。","","","");
				KaguTest(20022,76);
				GetItem(76);
				Wait(90);
				Message(0,"謝謝！","","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
				ch[2326] = 1;
			}
			else
			{
				Message(19,"到目前為止能以絶対優勢取勝的","就只有祢們。","","");
//				if (ch[3975] > 50)
//				{
//					Message(19,"好了，所有的店鋪","商品都給祢","再打折優恵。","");
//					ch[3975] -= 10;
//				}
				Message(19,"這次給祢銀奨牌。","","","");
				KaguTest(20022,76);
				GetItem(76);
				Wait(90);
				Message(0,"謝謝！","","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
			}
			return 0;
		}
		Message(0,"呀呵～","勝利了！","","");
		ch[400] = 19;
		str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ ch[2325] +"祢們勝利了";
		Message(19,"好厲害。",str,"","");
		Message(19,"這次給祢銅奨牌。","","","");
		KaguTest(20022,77);
		GetItem(77);
		Wait(90);
		Message(0,"謝謝！","","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	// 合格済み。自己ベストではない
	if(ch[2145] - ch[2325] > ch[2325])
	{
		// 鬼だべ
		ch[400] = 19;
		str =""+ ch[2145] +"："+ ch[2325] +"以絶対優勢取勝的……";
		Message(19,"好厲害。","以世界為目標的莫托洛。",str,"");
		Message(0,"以世界為目標","会這麼弱呎？","","");
		Message(19,"唔……","祢，祢們太強的原故叺。","","");
		if (!ch[2326])
		{
			Message(19,"到此為止讓我隊惨敗的","祢們是頭一隊。","","");
//			if (ch[3975] > 50)
//			{
//				Message(19,"好了，所有的店鋪","商品都給祢","再打折優恵。","");
//				ch[3975] -= 10;
//			}
			Message(19,"這次給祢銀奨牌。","","","");
			KaguTest(20022,76);
			GetItem(76);
			Wait(90);
			Message(0,"謝謝！","","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
			ch[2326] = 1;
		}
		else
		{
			Message(19,"到目前為止能以絶対優勢取勝的","就只有祢們。","","");
			
//			if (ch[3975] > 50)
//			{
//				Message(19,"好了，所有的店鋪","商品都給祢","再打折優恵。","");
//				ch[3975] -= 10;
//			}
			Message(19,"這次給祢銀奨牌。","","","");
			KaguTest(20022,76);
			GetItem(76);
			Wait(90);
			Message(0,"謝謝！","","","");
			ch[400] = -1;
		}
		return 0;
	}
	// 鬼じゃない
	str ="這回是"+ ch[2145] +"："+ ch[2325] +"";
	ch[400] = 19;
	if (ch[2145] - ch[2325] > 0)
	{
		Message(19,str,"祢們勝利了。","","");
		Message(0,"下次会拿更好的成績。","","","");
	}
	else
	{
		if (ch[2145] - ch[2325] == 0)
		{
			Message(19,str,"似乎是同分。","","");
			Message(0,"下次一定能贏。","","","");
		}
		else
		{
			Message(19,str,"我們勝利了。","","");
			Message(19,"結果不如人意咾。","","","");
			Message(0,"下次一定拿好成績。","","","");
		}
	}
	ch[400] = -1;
	return 0;
}
#EndScript

// 0111:がーどだっしゅちゅー
#Script:01158
int main()
{
	TekiStop(1);
	Message(0,"好像写着什麼？","","","");
	//説明１
	// チュートリアル表示
	KaguTest(10006,0);
	KaguTest(10007,7);
	KaguTest2(10009,0,"tute_06.bmp");
	ch[423] = 180;
	ch[424] = 42;
	ch[425] = 460;
	ch[426] = 438;
	ch[427] = 0;
	ch[428] = 0;
	ch[429] = 320;
	ch[430] = 452;
	ch[431] = 512;
	SE(399);
	KaguTest(10010,10);
	Wait(10);
	Message(0,"","","","");
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(10011,10);
	Wait(10);
	
	if (!ch[2149])
	{
		ch[2149] = 1;
		
		Message(0,"很有趣的様子。","稍試一下叺。","","");
		ch[420] = 1750;
		ch[421] = 5850;
		ch[423] = 7;
		KaguTest(30065,0);
		KaguTest(30020,0);
		ch[421] += 1000;
		KaguTest(30070,0);
		Wait(10);
		KaguTest(10006,1);
		KaguTest(10007,0);
		KaguTest2(10008,0,"用冲刺鈕在前進方向進行防護冲刺。");
		KaguTest2(10008,1,"s030（使用鼠標的場合双撃左鍵）");
		KaguTest(10010,10);
		Message(0,"","","","");
		KaguTest(10011,10);
		
			// ガードダッシュ
		KaguTest(20027,43);
		Wait2(15);
		
//		KaguTest(10006,1);
//		KaguTest(10007,0);
//		KaguTest2(10008,0,"連続でガードダッシュする事もできます。");
//		KaguTest(10010,10);
//		Message(0,"","","","");
//		KaguTest(10011,10);
		
		KaguTest(30020,0);
		ch[421] -= 1000;
		KaguTest(30070,0);
		Wait(10);
			// ガードダッシュ
		KaguTest(20027,43);
		Wait2(15);
			// ガードダッシュ
		KaguTest(20027,43);
		Wait2(15);
		KaguTest(10006,1);
		KaguTest(10007,0);
		KaguTest2(10008,0,"防護冲刺可以避開");
		KaguTest2(10008,1,"大多数的攻撃。");
		KaguTest(10010,10);
		Message(0,"","","","");
		KaguTest(10011,10);
		TekiStop(0);
		KaguTest(30020,0);
		ch[420] += 1000;
		KaguTest(30070,0);
		Wait(10);
			// ガードダッシュ
		KaguTest(20027,43);
		Wait2(15);
			// ガードダッシュ
		KaguTest(20027,43);
		Wait2(15);
			// 方向変換
		KaguTest(30020,0);
		ch[421] += 1000;
		Wait2(15);
		KaguTest(30070,0);
			// ガードダッシュ
		KaguTest(20027,43);
		Wait2(15);
			// ガードダッシュ
		KaguTest(20027,43);
		Wait2(15);
			// 方向変換
		KaguTest(30020,0);
		ch[420] -= 1000;
		KaguTest(30070,0);
		Wait2(15);
			// ガードダッシュ
		KaguTest(20027,43);
		Wait2(15);
			// ガードダッシュ
		KaguTest(20027,43);
		Wait2(15);
		TekiStop(1);
		
		Message(0,"稍微有点難","但是可以躱避攻撃。","","");
//		SaveCamera();
//		ch[420] = 1850;
//		ch[421] = 5850;
//		ch[422] = 825;
//		ch[423] = 3150;
//		ch[424] = 5850;
//		ch[425] = 150;
//		KaguTest(30019,1);
//		Wait(40);
//		
//		KaguTest(10006,1);
//		KaguTest(10007,0);
//		KaguTest2(10008,0,"ガードダッシュを使って");
//		KaguTest2(10008,1,"レバーのところまで行ってみよう");
//		KaguTest(10010,10);
//		Message(0,"","","","");
//		KaguTest(10011,10);
//
//		KaguTest(30019,0);
//		RestoreCamera();
		CrossFade();
//		Wait(15);
	}
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript
// 111:初めての雑魚
#Script:01159
int main()
{
	// 初めての雑魚倒した
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	int ln;
	SaveCamera();
	KaguTest(30005,0);
	x = ch[421];
	y = ch[422];
	z = ch[423];
	if (!ch[301])
	{
		// 次の雑魚だ
		Wait(30);
		ch[301] = 1;
		ch[420] = 100000;
		ch[427] = 7;
		KaguTest(30015,51);
		ch[420] = -173;
		ch[421] = 3781;
		ch[422] = 815;
		ch[423] = -697;
		ch[424] = 5194;
		ch[425] = 215;
		KaguTest(30019,1);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(45);
		ch[420] = 100000;
		KaguTest(30015,52);
		ch[420] = -688;
		ch[421] = 3925;
		ch[422] = 647;
		ch[423] = 496;
		ch[424] = 5348;
		ch[425] = 215;
		KaguTest(30019,1);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(45);
		KaguTest(30019,0);
		RestoreCamera();
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15)
		return 0;
	}
	if (!ch[302])
	{
		// そのまた次の雑魚だ
		Wait(30);
		ch[302] = 1;
		ch[420] = 100000;
		ch[427] = 7;
		KaguTest(30015,53);
		ch[420] = -150;
		ch[421] = 3533;
		ch[422] = 805;
		ch[423] = -150;
		ch[424] = 4979;
		ch[425] = 220;
		KaguTest(30019,1);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(75);
		
		if (!ch[2153])
		{
			ch[420] = -858;
			ch[421] = 5386;
			ch[422] = 600;
			ch[423] = 666;
			ch[424] = 5830;
			ch[425] = 145;
			KaguTest(30019,1);
			CrossFade();
			ch[420] = ch[423];
			ch[421] = ch[424];
			KaguTest(30070,0);
			Wait(75);
			KaguTest(30019,0);
			RestoreCamera();
			CrossFade();
			// 壁との距離を取る
			ch[420] = 675;
			ch[421] = 5850;
			ch[422] = 150;
			KaguTest(30112,0);
			if (ch[423] > 750)
			{
				Message(0,"那里的墻壁。","好像可以摧毀掉。","","");
			}
			else
			{
				Message(0,"這墻壁，好像可以摧毀掉。","","","");
			}
			ch[2153] = 1;
		}
		else
		{
			KaguTest(30019,0);
			RestoreCamera();
			CrossFade();
		}
		return 0;
	}
	if (!ch[303])
	{
		// 全部倒した
		ch[303] = 1;
	}
}
#EndScript

// 111:浮かせ攻撃実践
#Script:01160
int main()
{
	// 浮かせ攻撃の雑魚倒した
	// 次の扉開く
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	int ln;
	
	Wait(30);
	
	SE(950);
	
	TekiStop(1);
	SaveCamera();
	
	ln = Door2C(2);
	GetCharPos(ln,x,y,z);
	
	Camera(ln,x - 1200,y,z + 400);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(30);
	Event(202);
	Wait(50);
	
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	ch[3601] = 1;
	ch[201] = 1;
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 111:レバー引いたら扉開く
#Script:01161
int main()
{

	// 次の扉開く

	int y;
	int z;

	Wait(30);
	
	SE(950);
	
	TekiStop(1);

	GetCharPos(ln,x,y,z);
	
	Camera(ln,x,y - 1200,z + 400);
	ch[421] = x;
	ch[422] = y - 1200;
	ch[423] = z + 400;
	KaguTest(30010,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(30);
	Event(203);
	Wait(50);
	
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	ch[202] = 1;
	TekiStop(0);
}

// 113:レバー引いたらリフト動く
#Script:01162
int main()
{
	int ln;
	int bt15;
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	
	ln = Lift2C(1);
	bt15 = Getbt15(ln);
	
	if (bt15)
	{
		return 0;
	}

	Wait(15);
	SE(950);
	
	SaveCamera();
	Camera(ln,380,725,600);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(30);
	Event(353);
	TekiStop(1);
	Wait(60);

	if (!ch[2304])
	{
//		KaguTest(10006,0);
//		KaguTest(10007,7);
//		KaguTest2(10009,0,"tute_07.bmp");
//		ch[423] = 180;
//		ch[424] = 42;
//		ch[425] = 460;
//		ch[426] = 438;
//		ch[427] = 0;
//		ch[428] = 0;
//		ch[429] = 320;
//		ch[430] = 452;
//		ch[431] = 512;
//		KaguTest(10010,10);
//		Wait(10);
//		Message(0,"","","","");
//		ch[420] = 0;
//		KaguTest(10011,10);
//		Wait(10);
//			
		ch[2304] = 1;
	}

	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	TekiStop(0);

//	ch[3603] = 1;
}
#EndScript

	ch[427] = 0;
	ch[428] = 0;
	ch[429] = 320;
	ch[430] = 452;
	ch[431] = 512;
	KaguTest(10010,10);
	Wait(10);
	Message(0,"","","","");
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(10011,10);
	Wait(10);

	{
		SaveCamera();

		ch[422] = 370;
		ch[423] = 6100;
		ch[424] = -600;
		ch[425] = 50;

		Wait(120);
		KaguTest(30019,0);
		RestoreCamera();
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);

	}
}

// 0113:レバー引いたら扉開く
#Script:01164
int main()
{
	int ln;
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	
	TekiStop(1);
	ln = Door2C(1);
	GetCharPos(ln,x,y,z);
	SaveCamera();
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 2+4;
	KaguTest(30015,1);
	Walk2(58,0,-8,180);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Walk2(59,0,-8,180);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Walk2(60,0,-8,180);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Walk2(61,0,-8,180);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	ch[420] = 2700;
	ch[421] = 0;
	KaguTest(30070,58);
	KaguTest(30070,59);
	KaguTest(30070,60);
	KaguTest(30070,61);

	Wait(30);
	SE(950);
	Camera(ln,3681,-1435,900);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(30);
	Event(357);
	Wait(90);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	ch[264] = 1;
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 114 -> 113
#Script:01167
int main()
{
	if (ch[2497])
	{
		KaguTest(40002,0);
		
		MapEvent(0);
		Walk(0,-8,11);
		Wait(11);
		Event(110);
		Walk(0,-5,15);
		Wait(15);
		KaguTest(10600,ch[1107]-2260);
		MMV(StageMMV(ch[420]));
		MapEvent(1);
	}
	else
	{
		TekiStop(1);
		
		WaitD(0);
		ch[50] = 0;
		string st1,st2;
		SelStart(50);
		st1 = "離開" + StageName(ch[1107]-2260);
		st2 = "不離開" + StageName(ch[1107]-2260);
		SelText(st1,1);
		SelText(st2,2);
		SelEnd();
		
		if (ch[50] == 1)
		{
			MapEvent(0);
			Walk(0,-8,30);
			Black(0,100,30);
			Wait(30);
			
			KaguTest(10100,0);
			KaguTest(99999,0);
			TekiStop(0);
			MapEvent(1);
		}
		else
		{
			MapEvent(0);
			KaguTest(30058,0);
			while(ch[420])
			{
				Walk(ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
				Wait(ch[423]);
				KaguTest(30058,0);
			}
			Walk(0,8,20);
			Wait(20);
			MapEvent(1);
			TekiStop(0);
		}
	}
}
#EndScript

// 113裏：火をつけると扉開く
#Script:01169
int main()
{
	int ln;
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	
	Wait(15);

	SE(950);
	Wait(15);
	TekiStop(1);
	ln = Door2C(1);
	GetCharPos(ln,x,y,z);
	SaveCamera();

	Camera(ln,-228,-300,570);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(20);
	
	Event(202);
	Wait(45);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	
	ch[260] = 1;

	TekiStop(0);
	
	return 0;
}

// 113裏：レバー引くとリフト動く
#Script:01171
int main()
{
	int ln;
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	int bt15;
	
	ln = Lift2C(1);
	GetCharPos(ln,x,y,z);
	bt15 = Getbt15(ln);
	
	if (!bt15)
	{
		// 動く
		TekiStop(1);
		Wait(15);
		SaveCamera();
		
		Camera(ln,x - 500,y - 500,1800);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
		Event(206);
		Wait(30);
		Camera(-1,0,0,0);
		RestoreCamera();
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
		
		TekiStop(0);
	}
}

// 112裏：あたりに触れると敵が他マップからやってくる
#Script:01174
int main()
{
	TekiStop(1);

	int c1;
	int c2;
	ch[420] = 15;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,0);
	Wait(30);
	ch[420] = 150;
	ch[421] = 77;
	ch[422] = 132;
	ch[423] = 150;
	ch[424] = -682;
	ch[425] = 0;
	KaguTest(30093,12);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	
	CharPos(0,150,900,0);
	
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,2);
	KaguTest(30025,2);
	c1 = ch[420];
	c2 = c1 + 1;
	Look(0,c1);
	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(12005,c1);
	KaguTest(12005,c2);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(30064,c1);
	KaguTest(30064,c2);
	Walk2(c1,0,5,150);
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Walk2(c2,0,5,110);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(30);

	ch[420] = 150;
	ch[421] = 977;
	ch[422] = 132;
	ch[423] = 150;
	ch[424] = 300;
	ch[425] = 0;
	KaguTest(30093,190);

	ch[420] = 13;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c2);
	Wait(30);
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c1);
	Wait(60);
	ch[420] = 15;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c2);
	Look(c2,0);
	Wait(60);
	ch[420] = 8;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c1); // はてな
	Wait(60);
	ch[420] = 150;
	ch[421] = 1950;
	ch[422] = 370;
	ch[423] = 150;
	ch[424] = 900;
	ch[425] = 70;
	KaguTest(30093,15);
	Look(c1,0);
	Wait(30);
	ch[421] = 15;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c1);
	ch[420] = 15;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c1);
	Wait(45);
	
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	CrossFade();

	TekiStop(0);

	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c1);
	KaguTest(12005,c2);
	ch[420] = 1;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30090,c1);
	KaguTest(30090,c2);
}
#EndScript

// 112裏：レバー引くと扉開く＆敵出てくる
#Script:01175
int main()
{
	int ln;
	int wt1;
	int wt2;
	int wt3;
	
	TekiStop(1);
	
	if (!ch[262])
	{
		ln = Door2C(1);
		SaveCamera();
		Wait(15);
		ch[420] = 30;
		ch[421] = 4450;
		ch[422] = 430;
		ch[423] = 140;
		ch[424] = 2945;
		ch[425] = 0;
		KaguTest(30019,1);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(20);
		Event(306);

		ch[420] = 100000;
		ch[427] = 2;
		KaguTest(30015,1);
		KaguTest(30025,1);
		Wait(5);
		ln = ch[420];

		Wait(40);

		KaguTest(30019,0);
		RestoreCamera();
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
		TekiStop(0);
		ch[262] = 1;
	}
	ch[305] = 1;
	TekiStop(0);
}

// 111裏：レバー引いたら扉２開く
#Script:01177
int main()
{
	int ln;

	int y;
	int z;

	SE(950);
	Wait(15);
	TekiStop(1);
	SaveCamera();
	ln = Door2C(2);
	GetCharPos(ln,x,y,z);
	Camera(ln,x,y + 1200,z + 400);
	ch[421] = x;
	ch[422] = y + 1200;
	ch[423] = z + 400;

	CrossFade();
	Wait(20);
	Event(304);

	Wait(45);

	RestoreCamera();

// 111裏：二つレバー引いたら宝箱出現
#Script:01178
int main()
{
	if (ch[301] && ch[302])
	{
		// 二つレバー引いている
		int ln;
		SaveCamera();
		Wait(15);
		TekiStop(1);
		SE(950);
		ch[420] = 150;
		ch[421] = 2400;
		ch[422] = 250;
		ch[423] = 150;
		ch[424] = 1200;
		ch[425] = -150;
		KaguTest(30019,1);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(30);

		if (ch[2801])
		{
			ln = Takara2C(2833);
		}
		else
		{
			ln = Takara2C(2401);
		}
		SE(566);
		CharPos(ln,150,1200,-150);
		KaguTest(30018,ln);
		Wait(60);
		
		KaguTest(30019,0);
		RestoreCamera();
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
		
		ch[304] = 1;
		
		TekiStop(0);
	}
}
#EndScript

// 111裏：敵に見つかったら敵発生＆砲台回るようになる
#Script:01179
int main()
{
	int pt;
	
	KaguTest(30025,4);
	Camera(ch[420],526,5470,425);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(45);
	TekiStop(1);
	ch[420] = 100;
	ch[421] = 100;
	ch[422] = 100;
	KaguTest(30046,15);

	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,1);
	KaguTest(30015,2);
	ch[420] = 684;
	ch[421] = 6229;
	ch[422] = 684;
	ch[423] = -586;
	ch[424] = 4968;
	ch[425] = 145;
//	ch[420] = 1065;
//	ch[421] = 6295;
//	ch[422] = 865;
	KaguTest(30093,15);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	Wait(15);
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	ch[421] = ch[420];
	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(12005,ch[421]);
	KaguTest(12004,ch[421]);
	pt = ch[420];
	ch[420] = -1;
	KaguTest(12002,ch[421]);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30097,ch[421]);
	Walk2(ch[421],8,0,75);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30103,ch[421]);
	Wait(30);
	Look(0,ch[421]);
	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(30064,ch[421]);
	Wait(45);
	Look(ch[421],0);
	Wait(15);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,ch[421]);
	ch[420] = pt;
	KaguTest(12002,ch[421]);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30097,ch[421]);

	ch[420] = 150;
	ch[421] = 6250;
	ch[422] = 150;
	ch[423] = 150;
	ch[424] = 6250;
	ch[425] = 150;
	KaguTest(30094,20);
	ch[420] = -385;
	ch[421] = 6229;
	ch[422] = 684;
//	ch[420] = -765;
//	ch[421] = 6295;
//	ch[422] = 865;
	ch[423] = 886;
	ch[424] = 4968;
	ch[425] = 145;
	KaguTest(30093,20);
	KaguTest(30019,15);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(30);
	KaguTest(30025,2);
	ch[421] = ch[420];
	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(12005,ch[421]);
	KaguTest(12004,ch[421]);
	pt = ch[420];
	ch[420] = -1;
	KaguTest(12002,ch[421]);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30097,ch[421]);
	Walk2(ch[421],-8,0,75);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30103,ch[421]);
	Wait(30);
	Look(0,ch[421]);
	Wait(10);
	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(30064,ch[421]);
	Wait(35);
	Look(ch[421],0);
	Wait(15);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,ch[421]);
	ch[420] = pt;
	KaguTest(12002,ch[421]);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30097,ch[421]);

	KaguTest(30019,0);
	Wait(15);
	CrossFade();
	TekiStop(0);

	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30096,0);
}
#EndScript

// ポコつぼ置く
#Script:01186
int main()
{
	KaguTest(20056,0);
	if (ch[420])
	{
		// 魔法のツボ扱い
		PostScr(1308);
		return 0;
	}
	Wait(30);
	
	ch[421] = 0;
	if (ch[1538])
	{
		// エンディング中はだめ
	}
	if (!ch[3974])
	{
		KaguTest(30076,1);
		if (!ch[420])
		{
			// 置けなかった
	//		GetItem(23);
			KaguTest2(20002,0,"這里无法使用。");
		}
	}
	else
	{
		// 召喚中
		KaguTest2(20002,0,"現在无法使用。");
	}
	Wait(30);
}
#EndScript

// 召還つぼわった
#Script:01190
int main()
{
	ch[3956] = 1;
//	ch[3956] = ch[1791] / 100;
//	if (ch[1791] < 100)
//	{
//		// 失敗
//		ch[449] = 0;
//			// エフェクト＆エモ
//		ch[420] = ch[3968];
//		ch[421] = ch[3969];
//		ch[422] = ch[3970];
//		ch[423] = 1011;
//		ch[424] = 0;
//		ch[425] = 0;
//		ch[426] = 0;
//		ch[427] = 100;
//		ch[428] = 0;
//		KaguTest(30045,rand() % 10);
//		KaguTest(30045,rand() % 10);
//		KaguTest(30045,rand() % 10);
//		KaguTest(30045,rand() % 10);
//		KaguTest(30045,rand() % 10);
//		KaguTest(30045,rand() % 10);
//		KaguTest(30045,rand() % 10);
//		KaguTest(30045,rand() % 10);
//		KaguTest(30045,rand() % 10);
//		KaguTest(30045,rand() % 10);
///		ch[420] = 4;	//（仮）エモもやもや
//		KaguTest(30036,0);
//		return 0;
//	}
//	else
	{
		// 成功
//		KaguTest(20058,0);
		// エフェクトもだそう
		ch[420] = ch[3968];
		ch[421] = ch[3969];
		ch[422] = ch[3970];
		ch[423] = 744;
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = 0;
		ch[426] = 0;
		ch[427] = 100;
		ch[428] = 0;
		KaguTest(30045,0);
		KaguTest(20002,34);
		GetItem(34);
		KaguTest(20002,23);
		KaguTest(20002,24);
		KaguTest(20002,26);
		KaguTest(20002,28);
		KaguTest(20002,55);
	}
	
	if (ch[449] == 1)
	{
		// ポコツボ
		PostScr(1182);
		ch[449] = 0;
		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[449] == 2)
	{
		// イワオツボ
		PostScr(1183);
		ch[449] = 0;
		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[449] == 3)
	{
		// チャッキーツボ
		PostScr(1184);
		ch[449] = 0;
		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[449] == 4)
	{
		// ピエールツボ
		PostScr(1185);
		ch[449] = 0;
		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[449] == 5)
	{
		// ブラックビーンツボ
		PostScr(1202);
		ch[449] = 0;
		return 0;
	}
}
#EndScript

int main()
{

		PlayMovie("nuketa.txt",0);
		Black(0,100,0);
		Wait(5);

		Walk(0,5,1);
		KaguTest(30057,0);
		Mouse(1);
		ch[2300] = 1;
		ch[1791] = -100;
		KaguTest(20051,0);
		LoadMap(401);
		Black(0,100,0);
		Black(0,0,30);
//		CharPos(0,0,47,38);
//		CharPos(19,-24,236,38);
//		Scop2(19,1,"O_043.it3");
		ch[2302] = 0;
		ch[435] = 0;
		MapEvent(1);
	}
}

// 兄たま発見イベント
#Script:01194
int main()
{
	ch[400] = 17;
	ch[2317] = 1;
	
	// 会話
	//パリン
	Message(0,"囀！　祢没事姶！","","","");
	//プク
	Message(17,"絈琳，祢也没事太好了","","","");
	Message(17,"回来的時候看到幽霊之家","剛被襲撃過","","");
	Message(17,"我帯着碧諾和波庫","想逃走的時候，不小心走散了","","");
	//パリン
	Message(0,"是麼","","","");
	//プク
	Message(17,"対了，絈琳。","可以幇我找他們両个呎？","","");
	Message(17,"又容易迷路，","除祢以外的其他人類又不行。","","");
	//?まだ誰も見つけていない場合
	
	if (!ch[2328] && !ch[2329])
	{
		// まだ誰もみつけていない
		//パリン
		Message(0,"知道了，我幇祢找叺。","","","");
		//プク
		Message(17,"謝謝祢。","我先回去幽霊之家了。","","");
	}
	if (ch[2328] && !ch[2329])
	{
		// ポコだけみつけている
		//パリン
		Message(0,"波庫剛才已経找到了。","","","");
		Message(0,"剰下的就只是碧諾。","","","");
		//プク
		Message(17,"拝托祢了。","我要先回幽霊之家。","","");
		//パリン
		Message(0,"知道了，我幇祢找。","","","");
	}
	if (!ch[2328] && ch[2329])
	{
		// ピノだけみつけている
		//パリン
		Message(0,"碧諾剛才已経找到了。","","","");
		Message(0,"剰下的就只是波庫。","","","");
		//プク
		Message(17,"拝托祢了。","我要先回幽霊之家。","","");
		//パリン
		Message(0,"知道了，我幇祢找。","","","");
	}
	if (ch[2328] && ch[2329])
	{
		// 両方ともみつけている
		//パリン
		Message(0,"両人都找到了。","応該已回到幽霊之家。","","");
		//プク
		Message(17,"是麼，那麼，","我也回去幽霊之家。","","");
		//パリン
		Message(0,"好的。","","","");
	}
	
	// パリン避ける
	ch[424] = 4050;
	ch[425] = 1600;
	ch[426] = 7;
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	KaguTest(30060,0);
	Walk(ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(ch[423]);
	// 兄たま逃亡
	ch[420] = 17;
	KaguTest(30063,0); // パリンは兄たまをみつめる
	ch[400] = 117;
	ch[424] = 3820;
	ch[425] = 1525;
	ch[420] = 1;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	KaguTest(30060,17);
	Walk2(17,ch[421]*2,ch[422]*2,ch[423]/2);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(ch[423]/2);
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	ch[424] = 2720;
	ch[425] = 1050;
	ch[420] = 1;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30060,17);
	if (ch[423] - 15 < 1)
	{
		ch[423] = 1;
	}
	Walk2(17,ch[421]*2,ch[422]*2,ch[423] / 2);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait((ch[423] / 2) - 15);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(30064,17);
	Wait(15);
	CharPos(17,-200000,0,0);
	KaguTest(30063,-1,);	
	ch[400] = -1;
}
#EndScript

// ポコ発見イベント
#Script:01195
int main()
{
	ch[400] = 16;
	ch[2328] = 1;
	
	// 会話
	//パリン
	Message(0,"波庫，祢没事啀？","","","");
	Message(0,"祢在這種地方干什麼？","","","");
	//ポコ
	Message(16,"雖然知道人類无法看到我","但就是想躱起来。","","");
	//パリン
	Message(0,"身為舞蹈員却這麼害羞。","","","");
	//ポコ
	Message(16,"這一定是幽霊的本能反応。","本能是无法控制的。","","");
	Message(16,"幽霊之家怎麼了？","","","");
	//パリン
	Message(0,"被妖精破坏了。","","","");
	//ポコ
	Message(16,"真无奈姶…","","","");
	Message(16,"我還是回","幽霊之家看看叺。","","");
	
	// パリン避ける
	ch[424] = 1863;
	ch[425] = 1173;
	ch[426] = 7;
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	KaguTest(30060,0);
	Walk(ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(ch[423]);
	
	// ポコ立ち去る
	ch[400] = 116;
	KaguTest(30005,0);
	KaguTest(30062,0);
	ch[420] = 16;
	KaguTest(30063,0);
	ch[400] = 116;
	ch[424] = 1600;
	ch[425] = 1150;
	ch[420] = 1;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	KaguTest(30060,16);
	Walk2(16,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(ch[423]);
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	ch[424] = 735;
	ch[425] = 1150;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30060,16);
	Walk2(16,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(ch[423]-15);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(30064,16);
	Wait(15);
	CharPos(16,-200000,0,0);
	KaguTest(30063,-1);
	ch[400] = -1;
}
#EndScript

// ピノ発見イベント
#Script:01196
int main()
{
	ch[400] = 18;
	ch[2329] = 1;
	
	// 会話
	//ピノ
	Message(18,"姐姐！","","","");
	//パリン
	Message(0,"碧諾，祢在這姶！","","","");
	//ピノ
	Message(18,"姐姐，大家…幽霊之家…","","","");
	Message(18,"哥哥好不容易才回来","這下子真過侘…","","");
	//パリン
	Message(0,"別担心！","","","");
	Message(0,"妖精他們已経","从幽霊之家撤退了。","","");
	//ピノ
	Message(18,"…真的？","那我回幽霊之家看看。","","");
	Message(18,"一起逃走的哥哥還有波庫","説不定已経回到那里了。","","");
	
	// パリン避ける
	ch[424] = 50;
	ch[425] = -17;
	ch[426] = 7;
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	KaguTest(30060,0);
	Walk(ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(ch[423]);
	// ピノ立ち去る
	ch[400] = 118;
	KaguTest(30005,0);
	KaguTest(30062,0);
	ch[420] = 18;
	KaguTest(30063,0);
	ch[400] = 118;
	ch[424] = -125;
	ch[425] = 0;
	ch[420] = 1;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	KaguTest(30060,18);
	Walk2(18,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(ch[423]);
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	ch[424] = -500;
	ch[425] = 0;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	KaguTest(30060,18);
	Walk2(18,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(ch[423]-15);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(30064,18);
	Wait(15);
	CharPos(18,-200000,0,0);
	KaguTest(30063,-1);
	ch[400] = -1;
}
#EndScript

// 闇の霧発生
#Script:01200
int main()
{
	KaguTest(99986,0);
	KaguTest2(30014,0,"@ClearORoot");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"poboss");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"poura1");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"poura2");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"yama1");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"yama2");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"yamaboss");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"yamaura1");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"yamaura2");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"mori1");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"mori2");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"funsui");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"moriboss");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"moriura1");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"moriura2");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"spin1");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"spin2");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"spinboss");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"spinura1");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"spinura2");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"egg1");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"egg2");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"eggboss");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"eggura1");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"eggura2");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"great");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"hakai");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"ie2");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"ie3");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"ie4");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"ie4_1");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"ie4_2");
	KaguTest2(30014,3,"ie4_3");

	// 遷移計算呼び出し
	ch[420] = -3300;
	ch[421] = 1750;
	ch[422] = 0;
	ch[423] = 0;
	KaguTest(99988,0);
	ch[420] = -3300;
	ch[421] = -1750;
	ch[423] = 0;
	KaguTest(99988,1);
	ch[420] = 3300;
	ch[421] = 1750;
	ch[423] = 0;
	KaguTest(99988,2);
	ch[420] = 3300;
	ch[421] = -1750;
	ch[423] = 0;
	KaguTest(99988,3);
	KaguTest(99983,4);
//	KaguTest(99987,4);

	// カメラ位置
	KaguTest(99984,0);
	KaguTest(30033,200);
	Wait(30);
	ch[298] = 1;
	Black(0,0,15);
	SE(387);
	Wait(15);
	
	WaitC(165);
	
	ch[2522] = 1;

	Black(0,100,15);
	WaitC(15);
	Black(0,100,0);
	KaguTest(99984,-1);
	KaguTest(30033,100);
	KaguTest(99998,0);
	KaguTest(30033,100);
	LoadMapB(115);
	CharPos(0,0,300,0);
	ch[1107] = 2286;
	KaguTest(40003,111);
//	Mouse(0);
	PlayMovie("isk_1_3.txt",0);
//	Mouse(1);
//	KaguTest(20066,0);

//	Black(0,0,15);
//	Wait(15);
	KaguTest(30087,0);
	CharPos(0,-200000,0,0);

//	Black(0,0,15);

//	PostScr(1209);

	// オバケホーム崩壊ムービー
//	KaguTest(10011,10);
//	Wait(10);
//	KaguTest(20025,0);
	SetWaku(1);
	PostScr(1210);

	return 0;
}
#EndScript

// ブラックビーンつぼ置く
#Script:01201
int main()
{
	KaguTest(20056,0);
	if (ch[420])
	{
		// 魔法のツボ扱い
		PostScr(1308);
		return 0;
	}

	Wait(30);
	KaguTest(20010,0);
	ch[421] = ch[420];
	if (ch[420] != 308 || !ch[2497])
	{
		ch[421] = 0;
		if (!ch[3974])
		{
			KaguTest(30076,5);
		}
		else
		{
			// 召喚中
			KaguTest2(20002,0,"You　can't　use　that　now.");
		}
	}
	if (!ch[420] || (ch[421] == 308 && ch[2497]) )
	{
		// 置けなかった
//		GetItem(55);
		Mes("You　can't　use　this　here.");
	}
	Wait(30);
}
#EndScript

	ch[3966] = 180;
}

// 602裏：レバー引くとリフト動く
#Script:01204
int main()
{
	int bt15;
	int ln;
	
	ln = Lift2C(4);
	
	bt15 = Getbt15(ln);
	
	if (!bt15)
	{
		TekiStop(1);
		
		Wait(5);
		
		Black(0,100,10);
		Wait(10);
		
		SaveCamera();
		ch[420] = -1950;
		ch[421] = 7900;
		ch[422] = 1500;
		ch[423] = -2100;
		ch[424] = 11600;
		ch[425] = 170;
		KaguTest(30019,1);
		
		TekiStop(0);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
		Black(0,0,10);
		Event(502);
		Wait(150);
		KaguTest(30019,0);
		RestoreCamera();
		TekiStop(1);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
		TekiStop(0);
	}

}
#EndScript

		if (ch[420] == 610)
		{

			ch[1001 + (ch[1096] * 2)] = 0;
		}
	}
	Event(120);
}

// 115 -> クリア
#Script:01209
int main()
{
	KaguTest(40002,0);

	// クリア
	int a;
	a = ch[2286];
	
	TekiStop(1);
	MapEvent(0);
		// 評価表示
	KaguTest(10500,120);

	if (ch[2286] < 1)
	{
		ch[2286]=1;
	}
	
	Wait(90);
	
	Message(0,"","","","");

	// ミニフィールドへ戻る
	if (ch[512])
	{
		KaguTest(10011,1);
		Wait(1);
//		KaguTest(20025,0);

		if (!a)
		{
			ch[429] = 1;
			ch[397] = 1;
		}
		
		PostScr(1192);

//		Black(0,100,15);
//		Wait(15);
	}
	else
	{
		// オバケホーム崩壊前
		KaguTest(10011,10);
		Wait(10);
		KaguTest(20025,0);
		PostScr(1210);
	}
}
#EndScript

// 105:ボスサップ倒した
#Script:01217
int main()
{
	Wait(60);
	
	// ボスラッシュ中？
	if (ch[2092])
	{
		// モスビー戦へ
		ch[2094] = 1;
		KaguTest(40002,0);
		
		Blur(0,0,0);
		TekiStop(1);
		KaguTest(100000,0);
		LoadMapB(505);
		Wait(5);
		Event(600);
		
		SetSavePos2(6,0,150,0);
		ch[1095] = 6;
		// ムービー救援
		KaguTest(20020,0);
		CharPos(40,-200000,0,0);
		CharPos(ch[425],0,0,300);
		CharPos(0,0,-1600,0);
		KaguTest(12011,ch[425]);
		ch[420] = 2;
		KaguTest(12012,ch[425]);

		Wait(5);
		Walk(0,1,1);
		KaguTest(30057,0);

		White(0,0,30);
		Wait(30);
		MMV("boss02.mmv");
		TekiStop(0);
		MapEvent(1);

		return 0;
	}

	KaguTest(20041,0);
	ch[421] = 0;
	KaguTest(30034,100);
	BGM(39);
	if (ch[507])
	{
		ch[423] = 0;
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = -80;
		KaguTest(30084,0);
		CrossFade();
		White(0,0,30);
		Wait(30);
	}
	else
	{
		ch[423] = 0;
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = 400;
		KaguTest(30081,0);
		KaguTest(30019,9);
		White(0,0,30);
		Wait(30);
		Wait(183);
		KaguTest(30019,0);
		KaguTest(30082,1887);
		CrossFade();
	}
}
#EndScript

// 206:ラッシー倒した
#Script:01219
int main()
{
	Wait(60);

	// ボスラッシュ中？
	if (ch[2092])
	{
		// クリーム戦へ
		ch[2096] = 1;
		KaguTest(40002,0);
		
		Blur(0,0,0);
		TekiStop(1);
		KaguTest(100000,0);
		LoadMapB(606);
		Wait(5);
		Event(160);
		ch[300] = 1;
		
		SetSavePos2(6,0,150,0);
		ch[1095] = 6;
		// ムービー救援
		CharPos(0,0,2000,1050);

		KaguTest(20020,0);
//		CharPos(ch[425],0,-300,20);
		CharPos(ch[425],0,2300,1065);
		KaguTest(30028,ch[425]);
		
		Scop2(ch[425],1,"scop.it3");
		ch[300] = 1;

		KaguTest2(30013,50001,"fall_atari_ue");

		Look(ch[425],0);
		Look(0,ch[425]);

		Wait(5);
		Walk(0,1,1);
		KaguTest(30057,0);

		White(0,0,30);
		Wait(30);
		MMV("boss04.mmv");
		TekiStop(0);
		MapEvent(1);
		LiftEnable(0);

		return 0;
	}


	BGM(39);

	if (ch[1505])
	{
		KaguTest(30083,0);
		if (ch[455] != 1)
		{
			CharPos(ch[420],0,ch[422],ch[423]);
		}
		ch[421] = 0;
		KaguTest(30034,100);
		ch[423] = 0;
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = -120;
		KaguTest(30084,0);
		CrossFade();
		White(0,0,30);
		Wait(30);
	}
	else
	{
		KaguTest(30083,0);
		if (ch[455] != 1)
		{
			CharPos(ch[420],0,ch[422],ch[423]);
		}
		ch[421] = 0;
		KaguTest(30034,100);
		KaguTest(20041,0);
		ch[423] = 0;
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = 356;
		KaguTest(30081,0);
		KaguTest(30019,9);
		White(0,0,30);
		Wait(30);
		Wait(183);
		KaguTest(30019,0);
		KaguTest(30082,1887);
		CrossFade();
	}
}

// 306:王子戦開始
#Script:01224
int main()
{
	Wait(60);
	CharPos(58,-200000,0,0);
	CharPos(59,-200000,0,0);

	// ボスラッシュ中？
	if (ch[2092])
	{
		// 王子戦へ
		ch[2098] = 1;
		KaguTest(40002,0);
		
		Blur(0,0,0);
		TekiStop(1);
		KaguTest(100000,0);
		LoadMapB(306);
		ch[1096] = ch[1096] - 1;
		Wait(5);
		
		SetSavePos2(6,0,150,0);
		ch[1095] = 6;
		// ムービー救援
		KaguTest2(30014,0,"@tokaron");
		KaguTest2(30014,0,"@monyo");
		KaguTest2(30014,0,"@magicbelt1");
		KaguTest2(30014,0,"@magicbelt2");
		CharPos(12,-200000,0,0);
		CharPos(78,0,675,0);
		CharPos(0,0,-300,0);

		Event(160);
		LiftEnable(0);
		ch[300] = 1;
		ch[301] = 1;

		Wait(5);
		Walk(0,1,1);
		KaguTest(30057,0);

		White(0,0,30);
		Wait(30);
		MMV("boss06.mmv");
		TekiStop(0);
		MapEvent(1);

		return 0;
	}

//	White(0,0,30);
//	Wait(30);
	if (!ch[1571])
	{
		Mouse(0);
		KaguTest(20065,31);
		PlayMovie("kdo_3_3.txt",ch[2539]);
		Mouse(1);
	//	BGM(31);	// 仮
		CharPos(12,-200000,0,0);
		CharPos(78,0,675,0);
		ch[2539] = 1;
		SetSavePos2(306,-3150,-3375,-1125);
	}
	else
	{
		LoadMapB(306);
		KaguTest2(30014,0,"@tokaron");
		KaguTest2(30014,0,"@monyo");
		KaguTest2(30014,0,"@magicbelt1");
		KaguTest2(30014,0,"@magicbelt2");
		SetSavePos2(306,-3150,-3375,-1125);
		CharPos(12,-200000,0,0);
		CharPos(78,0,675,0);
		CharPos(0,0,-300,0);
		BGM(31);
	}

	Event(160);
	LiftEnable(0);
	ch[300] = 1;
	ch[301] = 1;
	Black(0,0,15);
	Wait(15);
//	Mes("王子戦闘予定");
//	Wait(60);
//	White(0,100,15);
//	Wait(15);
//	Event(106);
	MMV("boss06.mmv");
}

// 607:エレベーター下から乗る
#Script:01233
int main()
{
	if (ch[300] == 2)
	{
		return 0;
	}
	
	ch[300] = 1;
	MapEvent(0);

	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	int count;
	GetCharPos(0,x,y,z);

	count = 0;
	if (x > 100 || x < -100)
	{
		ch[424] = 0;
		ch[425] = -96;
		ch[426] = 36;
		KaguTest(30061,0);
		KaguTest(30060,0);
		while(ch[420])
		{
			Walk(ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
			Wait(ch[423]);
			KaguTest(30060,0);
			count++;
			
			if (count > 10)
			{
				// 最終手段・瞬間移動
				CharPos(0,ch[424],ch[425],ch[426]);
			}
		}

	}

	ch[424] = 0;
	ch[425] = -630;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	KaguTest(30060,0);
	count = 0;
	while(ch[420])
	{
		Walk(ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
		Wait(ch[423]);
		KaguTest(30060,0);

		count++;
		
		if (count > 10)
		{
			// 最終手段・瞬間移動
			CharPos(0,ch[424],ch[425],ch[426]);
		}
	}

	Event(153);
//	SE(390);
	ch[402] = 1;
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = -800;
	KaguTest(30070,0);
	KaguTest2(30017,1,"@p_null");
	Wait(240);
	ch[402] = 0;
	Wait(10);
	Event(155);
	KaguTest2(30017,0,"");
	Walk(0,-8,24);
	Wait(24);
	MapEvent(1);
}
#EndScript

// 607:エレベーター上から乗る
#Script:01234
int main()
{
	if (ch[300] == 2)
	{
		return 0;
	}

	ch[300] = 0;
	MapEvent(0);

	int count;

	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = 800;
	KaguTest(30088,60);
	if (ch[422])
	{
		// カメラ強制移動
		Camera(0,0,360,5825);
		CrossFade();
	}

	ch[424] = 0;
	ch[425] = -630;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	KaguTest(30060,0);
	count = 0;
	while(ch[420])
	{
		Walk(ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
		Wait(ch[423]);
		KaguTest(30060,0);

		count++;
		
		if (count > 10)
		{
			// 最終手段・瞬間移動
			CharPos(0,ch[424],ch[425],ch[426]);
		}
	}
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);

	Event(154);
//	SE(390);
	ch[402] = 1;
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = 800;
	KaguTest(30070,0);
	KaguTest2(30017,1,"@p_null");
	Wait(240);
	ch[402] = 0;
	Wait(10);
	Event(156);
	KaguTest2(30017,0,"");
	Walk(0,8,32);
	Wait(32);
	MapEvent(1);
}
#EndScript

// 401:スポンサーイベント終了後山１にいけるようになる
#Script:01235
int main()
{
	// マナエフェクト

	// あたり設定
	KaguTest(99986,0);
	KaguTest2(30014,0,"@ClearORoot");
	KaguTest2(30014,2,"yama1");
	
	// 遷移計算呼び出し
	ch[422] = 75;
	ch[420] = -2575;
	ch[421] = -525;
	ch[423] = 90;
	KaguTest(99988,0);
	KaguTest(99987,1);
	
	ch[3203] = 1;

	// カメラ位置
	KaguTest(99996,16);
	KaguTest(30033,70);
	KaguTest(30032,-2500);
	Wait(30);
	Black(0,0,15);
	Wait(150);
	
	ch[2527] = 1;
	// オバケホームに戻る＆会話続き
	Black(0,100,15);
	Wait(15);
	KaguTest(99998,0);
	KaguTest(30033,100);
	KaguTest(30032,0);
	LoadMap(401);
	Wait(15);
	CharPos(0,-50,600,0);
	Wait(5);
	Black(0,100,0);
	Black(0,0,30);
	MapEvent(1);

//	ch[294] = 1;
}
#EndScript

// 310:鍵穴連動関連
#Script:01238
int main()
{
	int kagi = 0;
	int mx;
	int my;

	SaveCamera();
	// カメラ位置
	if (ch[304] == 1)
	{
		// 右上
		ch[420] = 1180;
		ch[421] = 652;
		ch[422] = 350;
		ch[423] = 1870;
		ch[424] = 827;
		ch[425] = 107;
		mx = 1850;
		my = 825;
	}
	if (ch[304] == 2)
	{
		// 右下
		ch[420] = 1250;
		ch[421] = -571;
		ch[422] = 177;
		ch[423] = 1866;
		ch[424] = -812;
		ch[425] = 57;
		mx = 1850;
		my = -825;
	}
	if (ch[304] == 3)
	{
		// 左下
		ch[420] = 675;
		ch[421] = -710;
		ch[422] = 429;
		ch[423] = 205;
		ch[424] = -813;
		ch[425] = -42;
		mx = 250;
		my = -825;
	}
	if (ch[304] == 4)
	{
		// 左上
		ch[420] = 745;
		ch[421] = 640;
		ch[422] = 52;
		ch[423] = 205;
		ch[424] = 845;
		ch[425] = 182;
		mx = 250;
		my = 825;
	}
	// カメラアングル以外共通
//	KaguTest(30093,15);
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait2(2);
	ch[420] = mx;
	ch[421] = my;
	KaguTest(30070,0);

	if (ch[300])
	{
		kagi++;
	}
	if (ch[301])
	{
		kagi++;
	}
	if (ch[302])
	{
		kagi++;
	}
	if (ch[303])
	{
		kagi++;
	}
	
	Event(514);
	ch[420] = 90;
	KaguTest(30126,388);

	ch[420] = mx;
	ch[421] = my;
	Wait2(10);
	KaguTest(30070,0);
	Wait2(10);
	KaguTest(30070,0);
	Wait2(10);
	KaguTest(30070,0);
	Wait2(10);
	if (ch[304] == 1)
	{
		// 右上
		ch[420] = 1057;
		ch[421] = 1548;
		ch[422] = 1021;
		ch[423] = 1051;
		ch[424] = 8;
		ch[425] = 107;
	}
	if (ch[304] == 2)
	{
		// 右下
		ch[420] = 1162;
		ch[421] = -1209;
		ch[422] = 457;
		ch[423] = 1051;
		ch[424] = 8;
		ch[425] = 107;
	}
	if (ch[304] == 3)
	{
		// 左下
		ch[420] = 935;
		ch[421] = -1047;
		ch[422] = 1155;
		ch[423] = 1051;
		ch[424] = 8;
		ch[425] = 107;
	}
	if (ch[304] == 4)
	{
		// 左上
		ch[420] = 670;
		ch[421] = 1322;
		ch[422] = 651;
		ch[423] = 1051;
		ch[424] = 8;
		ch[425] = 107;
	}
	KaguTest(30093,48);
	ch[420] = ch[423];
	ch[421] = ch[424];
	ch[422] = ch[425];
	KaguTest(30094,48);
	KaguTest(30019,15);
	Wait2(60);

	if (kagi == 1)
	{
		// 鍵一つ目
		KaguTest(30089,2);
	}
	if (kagi == 2)
	{
		// 鍵二つ目
		KaguTest(30089,4);
	}
	if (kagi == 3)
	{
		// 鍵三つ目
		KaguTest(30089,7);
	}
	if (kagi == 4)
	{
		// 鍵四つ目
		KaguTest(30089,9);
		Event(517);
	}
	Wait2(30);
	if (kagi == 4)
	{
		Event(527);
		Wait2(15);
		Event(504);
//		KaguTest(30019,9);
//		PostScr(1239);
	}
	else
	{
		KaguTest(30019,0);
		RestoreCamera();
		CrossFade();
		Wait2(15);
	}
}
#EndScript

// 502:あたりに触れると円盤発動
#Script:01241
int main()
{
	int c;
	int pt;
	
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,1);
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	c = ch[420];
	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
	KaguTest(12004,c);
	KaguTest(12011,c);
	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(12012,c);
	pt = ch[420];
	ch[420] = -1;
	KaguTest(12002,c);
	SaveCamera();
	ch[420] = 650;
	ch[421] = 8079;
	ch[422] = 70;
	ch[423] = 650;
	ch[424] = 9050;
	ch[425] = -150;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(25);

	Walk2(c,-19,0,33);
	ch[420] = 1;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 5;
	KaguTest(12003,c);
	Wait(45);
	
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	ch[420] = pt;
	KaguTest(12002,c);
	KaguTest(30090,c);

	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
//	ch[420] = 0;
//	KaguTest(12012,c);
}
#EndScript

// 502:宝箱開けると敵に見つかる
#Script:01242
int main()
{
	int c;
	int pt;
	
	TekiStop(1);
	Wait(45);
	
	KaguTest(30025,2);
	c = ch[420];
	ch[427] = 7;
	ch[420] = 100000;
	KaguTest(30015,2);
	KaguTest(12004,c);
	pt = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12000,c);
	KaguTest(12000,c+1);

	ch[420] = -1350;
	ch[421] = 13283;
	ch[422] = 239;
	ch[423] = -1350;
	ch[424] = 11350;
	ch[425] = 0;
	KaguTest(30093,15);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	CrossFade();

	ch[424] = -1375;
	ch[425] = 11250;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	KaguTest(30060,c);
	ch[423] = ch[423] * 2;
	Walk2(c,ch[421]/2,ch[422]/2,ch[423]);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Walk2(c+1,ch[421]/2,ch[422]/2,ch[423]);
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(ch[423]);
	Look(c,0);
	Look(c+1,0);
	ch[420] = pt;
	KaguTest(12002,c);
	KaguTest(12002,c+1);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
	KaguTest(12005,c+1);

	TekiStop(0);
	Wait(30);
	KaguTest(30019,0);

}
#EndScript

// ステージガラクタ発生（出現高さ補正＋４０）（コンティニュー時には出さない）

	}

	ch[422] = ch[422] + 40;
	ch[423] = 0;

// 112:初スライム
#Script:01244
int main()
{
	ch[2120] = 1;
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	GetCharPos(58,x,y,z);
	KaguTest(30122,58);
	if (x < -20000 || ch[420])
	{
		// ファントム死んでる
		return 0;
	}
	
	TekiStop(1);
	Look(0,58);
//	Camera(0,-150,50,370);
	Camera(58,-150,1450,370);
	Wait(45);
	Camera(0,-150,50,370);
	Wait(10);
	Message(0,"這家夥是妖精姶！","","","");
//	ch[420] = 15;
//	ch[421] = 60;
//	KaguTest(30053,58);
//	Wait(30);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 112:初鎧スライム
#Script:01245
int main()
{
	int keihou;
	keihou = 0;
	ch[301] = 1;
	TekiStop(1);
	int ln;
	int i;
	ln = Door2C(2);
	Camera(ln,350,4075,300);
	Walk(0,8,10);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(30);
	
	for (i = 0;i < 4;i++)
	{
		if (keihou < 2)
		{
			SE(519);
			keihou++;
		}
		if (i == 2)
		{
			Look(0,ln);
		}
		ch[420] = 100;
		ch[421] = 50;
		ch[422] = 50;
		KaguTest(30046,15);
		Wait(10);
		if (i == 3)
		{
			ln = Door2C(1);
			Look(0,59);
			Camera(59,-575,3735,305);
			CrossFade();
			Walk2(59,-10,0,60);
			ch[420] = 15;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,59);
		}
		Wait(5);
		ch[420] = 100;
		ch[421] = 100;
		ch[422] = 100;
		KaguTest(30046,15);
		Wait(10);
		if (i == 0)
		{
			// エモ出し
			// きょろきょろ
			ch[420] = 15;
			ch[428] = 0;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,0);
			KaguTest(30019,12);
		}
		if (i == 1)
		{
			KaguTest(30019,0);
			Event(301);
		}
		Wait(5);
	}
	Event(302);
	Wait(40);
	Look(59,0);
	Look(0,59);
	Wait(10);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(10);
	ch[420] = 1;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30090,59);
	
	TekiStop(0);
	

	return 0;
}
#EndScript

// 112:鎧スライム倒したら扉開く

	Event(303);
//	Wait(45);

	CrossFade();
	Wait(20);
	Event(304);
	Wait(60);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 104裏：火が全部点いていれば扉開ける
#Script:01250
int main()
{
	int ln;
	
	if (!ch[304] && (ch[300] || ch[301]))
	{
		ch[304] = 1;
		ch[420] = 100000;
		ch[427] = 3;
		KaguTest(30015,3);
	}
	if (!ch[305] && (ch[301] || ch[302]))
	{
		ch[305] = 1;
		ch[420] = 100000;
		ch[427] = 3;
		KaguTest(30015,4);
	}
	if (!ch[306] && (ch[302] || ch[303]))
	{
		ch[306] = 1;
		ch[420] = 100000;
		ch[427] = 3;
		KaguTest(30015,5);
	}
	if (!ch[307] && (ch[303] || ch[300]))
	{
		ch[307] = 1;
		ch[420] = 100000;
		ch[427] = 3;
		KaguTest(30015,2);
	}
	
	if (!ch[300] || !ch[301] || !ch[302] || !ch[303])
	{
		return 0;
	}

	SaveCamera();
	
	TekiStop(1);
	ln = Door2C(2);
	Wait(20);
	Camera(ln,-150,-2310,-263);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(30);
	Event(209);
	Wait(45);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
		
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 103裏：あたりに触れたら壁の中からアーマースライム現れる

int main()
{

	Wait(30);
	ch[420] = -150;
	ch[421] = -2100;
//	for(i = 170;i > 0;i = i - 6)
//	{
//		KaguTest(20042,i);
//		Wait(1);
//	}
	KaguTest(30072,0);
	Wait(45);
	
	ch[420] = 828;
	ch[421] = -2081;
	ch[422] = 444;
	ch[423] = -240;
	ch[424] = -2082;
	ch[425] = 121;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	KaguTest2(30016,0,"b3b7b3b7L");
	Wait(30);
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;

	KaguTest(30025,1);
	CharPos(ch[420],-375,-2100,0);

// 113裏：あたりに触れたら敵がとげ鉄球転がしてくる
#Script:01253
int main()
{
	int c1;
	
	ch[300] = 1;

	TekiStop(1);
	SaveCamera();
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	c1 = ch[420];

	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(12005,c1);
	
	Look(0,c1);
	ch[420] = 15;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,0);
	Wait(30);

	ch[420] = -1600;
	ch[421] = 1200;
	ch[422] = 740;
	ch[423] = -2756;
	ch[424] = 1200;
	ch[425] = 700;
	KaguTest(30093,30);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	Wait(30);

	// カメラ設定
	ch[420] = -1600;
	ch[421] = 1200;
	ch[422] = 740;
	ch[423] = -2756;
	ch[424] = 1425;
	ch[425] = 700;
	KaguTest(30093,14);

	// 一つ目とげとげ出すへ
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	ch[424] = -2700;
	ch[425] = 1425;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30060,c1);
	Walk2(c1,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423] + 5);
	Wait(2);
	ch[421] = 11;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c1);
	Wait(17);
		// カメラ設定
		ch[420] = -1600;
		ch[421] = 1200;
		ch[422] = 740;
		ch[423] = -2756;
		ch[424] = 875;
		ch[425] = 700;
		KaguTest(30093,70);
	// 二つ目へ
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	ch[424] = -2700;
	ch[425] = 1315;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30060,c1);
	Walk2(c1,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	Wait(2);
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 1;
	KaguTest(30015,2);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30095,c1);
	ch[421] = 11;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c1);
	Wait(12);
	// 三つ目へ
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	ch[424] = -2700;
	ch[425] = 1205;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30060,c1);
	Walk2(c1,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	Wait(2);
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 1;
	KaguTest(30015,3);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30095,c1);
	ch[421] = 11;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c1);
	Wait(12);
	// 四つ目へ
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	ch[424] = -2700;
	ch[425] = 1095;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30060,c1);
	Walk2(c1,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	Wait(2);
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 1;
	KaguTest(30015,4);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30095,c1);
	ch[421] = 11;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c1);
	Wait(12);
	// 五つ目へ
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	ch[424] = -2700;
	ch[425] = 985;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30060,c1);
	Walk2(c1,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	Wait(2);
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 1;
	KaguTest(30015,5);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30095,c1);
	ch[421] = 11;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c1);
	Wait(12);
	// 遠ざかる
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	ch[424] = -2700;
	ch[425] = 875;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30060,c1);
	Walk2(c1,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	Wait(2);
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 1;
	KaguTest(30015,6);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30095,c1);
	ch[421] = 15;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c1);
	Wait(12);
	Look(c1,0);
	Wait(5);
	// ハートマーク
	ch[420] = 13;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c1);
	Wait(45);
	
	// 逃げる
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	ch[424] = -2700;
	ch[425] = 450;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30060,c1);
	Walk2(c1,ch[421],ch[422],ch[423] + 10);
	ch[427] = ch[423];
	// カメラ設定
	ch[420] = -1600;
	ch[421] = 1200;
	ch[422] = 1040;
	ch[423] = -2756;
	ch[424] = 450;
	ch[425] = 700;
	KaguTest(30093,ch[427]);
	Wait(ch[427] + 10);
	Look(c1,0);
	Wait(30);
	
	ch[420] = 400;
	ch[421] = 1200;
	ch[422] = 965;
	ch[423] = -2700;
	ch[424] = 1200;
	ch[425] = 600;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(30);
	TekiStop(0);
	Wait(30);
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c1);
	ch[420] = 8;
	ch[421] = 100;
	KaguTest(30092,c1);
}
#EndScript

// 102裏：敵の初期ルーチン（赤色灯火門番）解除

// 104:敵運んでくる
#Script:01255
int main()
{
	int tmp1;
	int tmp2;
	// パリン少し前に進みながら敵が運ばれてくる
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	ch[424] = 150;
	ch[425] = -2300;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30060,0);
	Walk(ch[421],ch[422],ch[423]);
	tmp1 = ch[423];
	ch[420] = 150;
	ch[421] = -2700;
	ch[422] = 950;
	ch[423] = 150;
	ch[424] = -1554;
	ch[425] = -430;
	KaguTest(30093,60);
	KaguTest(30019,14);

	tmp2 = 60;	
	if (tmp1 < tmp2)
	{
		Wait(tmp1);
		ch[420] = 150;
		ch[421] = -1000;
		KaguTest(30070,0);
		tmp2 = tmp2 - tmp1;
		tmp1 = 0;
	}
	else
	{
		tmp1 = tmp1 - tmp2;
	}
	Wait(tmp2);
	// こうもり発生
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[421] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,78);
	
	int pt[4];
	int c;
	KaguTest(30025,78);
	c = ch[420];
	int i;
	for (i = 0;i < 4;i++)
	{
		ch[420] = 2;
		KaguTest(12005,c + i);
//		pt[i] = ch[420];
//		KaguTest(12000,c + i);
	}
	
	tmp2 = 150 - tmp1;
	Wait(tmp1);
	ch[420] = 150;
	ch[421] = -1000;
	KaguTest(30070,0);
	// カメラ移動
	ch[420] = 475;
	ch[421] = -3300;
	ch[422] = 375;
	ch[423] = 150;
	ch[424] = -1550;
	ch[425] = -50;
	KaguTest(30093,0);
	ch[420] = 150;
	ch[421] = -1850;
	ch[422] = 20;
	ch[423] = 150;
	ch[424] = -1850;
	ch[425] = 20;
	KaguTest(30094,tmp2-30);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	KaguTest(30025,78);
	ch[421] = ch[420];
	ch[420] = -1;
	KaguTest(30098,ch[421] + 1);
	KaguTest(30098,ch[421] + 3);
	Wait(tmp2 + 30);
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	KaguTest(30025,78);
	ch[421] = ch[420];
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30098,ch[421] + 1);
	KaguTest(30098,ch[421] + 3);

	for (i = 0;i < 4;i++)
	{
		ch[420] = 3;
		KaguTest(12005,c + i);
//		ch[420] = pt[i];
//		KaguTest(12002,c + i);
	}
}
#EndScript
