// 507:ファイア台座教える
#Script:01259
int main()
{
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	int ax;
	int ay;
	int az;
	
	KaguTest(30005,0);
	x = ch[421];
	y = ch[422];
	z = ch[423];
	KaguTest(30068,0);
	ax = ch[423];
	ay = ch[424];
	az = ch[425];

	Message(0,"如何才能打開？","","","");
	ch[420] = 40;
	ch[421] = 496;
	ch[422] = 236;
	ch[423] = -200;
	ch[424] = 1050;
	ch[425] = 0;
	KaguTest(30093,15);
	ch[420] = -200;
	ch[421] = 1050;
	ch[422] = 0;
	KaguTest(30094,15);
	KaguTest(30019,15);
	CrossFade();
	ch[420] = -200;
	ch[421] = 1050;
	KaguTest(30070,0);
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 5;
	KaguTest(12003,0);
	Wait(5);
	ch[420] = 2;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 5;
	KaguTest(12003,0);
	Wait(45);

	ch[420] = -40;
	ch[421] = 496;
	ch[422] = 236;
	ch[423] = 200;
	ch[424] = 1050;
	ch[425] = 0;
	KaguTest(30093,30);
	ch[420] = 200;
	ch[421] = 1050;
	ch[422] = 0;
	KaguTest(30094,30);
	KaguTest(30019,15);
	ch[420] = 200;
	ch[421] = 1050;
	KaguTest(30070,0);
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 5;
	KaguTest(12003,0);
	Wait(7);
	ch[420] = 2;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 5;
	KaguTest(12003,0);
	Wait(45);
	
	ch[420] = x;
	ch[421] = y;
	ch[422] = z;
	ch[423] = ax;
	ch[424] = ay;
	ch[425] = az;
	KaguTest(30093,15);
	ch[420] = ax;
	ch[421] = ay;
	ch[422] = az;
	KaguTest(30094,15);
	KaguTest(30019,15);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	Message(0,"装飾台有些古怪。","","","");
}
#EndScript

// 507:ファイア台座チェック
#Script:01260
int main()
{
	int a;
	int b;
	KaguTest(20031,0);
	KaguTest(20030,ch[421]);
	a = ch[420];
	KaguTest(20031,1);
	KaguTest(20030,ch[421]);
	b = ch[420];
	
	if (a && b)
	{
		// 両方とも火がついている
		Wait(15);
		SE(950);
		Camera(Door2C(1),0,50,565);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(25);
		Event(303);
		Wait(45);
		Camera(-1,0,0,0);
		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);
		ch[300] = 1;
		ch[420] = 0;
		ch[421] = 1225;
		KaguTest(30011,0);
		ch[2076] = 1;
	}
}
#EndScript

// 503:かぼちゃ倒すと次の敵ふってくる
#Script:01261
int main()
{
	SaveCamera();

	ch[201] = 1;
	Wait(15);

	TekiStop(1);

	ch[420] = 2586;
	ch[421] = 8279;
	ch[422] = 350;
	ch[423] = 1835;
	ch[424] = 8973;
	ch[425] = -179;
	KaguTest(30093,15);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(20);
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 0;
	KaguTest(30015,7);
	Wait(30);

	ch[420] = 2365;
	ch[421] = 8184;
	ch[422] = 164;
	ch[423] = 2155;
	ch[424] = 9369;
	ch[425] = -179;
	KaguTest(30093,15);
	ch[420] = 2155;
	ch[421] = 9369;
	ch[422] = -179;
	KaguTest(30094,15);
	KaguTest(30019,15);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(20);
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 0;
	KaguTest(30015,5);
	Wait(30);

	ch[420] = 2702;
	ch[421] = 8194;
	ch[422] = 197;
	ch[423] = 3123;
	ch[424] = 9444;
	ch[425] = -179;
	KaguTest(30093,15);
	ch[420] = 3123;
	ch[421] = 9444;
	ch[422] = -179;
	KaguTest(30094,15);
	KaguTest(30019,15);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(20);
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 0;
	KaguTest(30015,6);
	Wait(30);

	ch[420] = 1947;
	ch[421] = 7798;
	ch[422] = 386;
	ch[423] = 3039;
	ch[424] = 8711;
	ch[425] = -179;
	KaguTest(30093,15);
	ch[420] = 3039;
	ch[421] = 8711;
	ch[422] = -179;
	KaguTest(30094,15);
	KaguTest(30019,15);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(20);
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 0;
	KaguTest(30015,8);
	Wait(30);
	
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 504:あたりに触れると角が現れる
#Script:01262
int main()
{
	int c;
	int pt1;
	int pt2;
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	
	// 出現
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 6;
	KaguTest(30015,1);
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	c = ch[420];
	// PT取得
	KaguTest(12004,c);
	pt1 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c+1);
	pt2 = ch[420];
	// ちゃんと同期が取れるようにＮＰＣモードに変更
	KaguTest(12000,c);
	KaguTest(12000,c+1);
	// 重力なし、壁なし
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30041,c);
	KaguTest(30041,c+1);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30097,c);
	KaguTest(30097,c+1);
	// カメラを向ける
	ch[420] = -161;
	ch[421] = 2206;
	ch[422] = 109;
	ch[423] = -1094;
	ch[424] = 2742;
	ch[425] = 296;
	KaguTest(30093,30);
	ch[420] = -1094;
	ch[421] = 2742;
	ch[422] = 296;
	KaguTest(30094,30);
	KaguTest(30019,15);
	Wait(45);
	// とび下りてくる
	Walk2(c,60,0,15);
	Wait(3);
	ch[422] = 1;
	ch[421] = 15;
	KaguTest(30037,c);	// ジャンプ
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30041,c);
	Wait(7);

	Walk2(c+1,12,0,15);
	Wait(3);
	ch[422] = 1;
	ch[421] = 15;
	KaguTest(30037,c+1);	// ジャンプ
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30041,c+1);
		// カメラ
	ch[420] = -66;
	ch[421] = 2151;
	ch[422] = 449;
	ch[423] = -1093;
	ch[424] = 2741;
	ch[425] = 45;
	KaguTest(30093,15);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	Wait(30);
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	// PT設定
	ch[420] = pt1;
	KaguTest(12002,c);
	ch[420] = pt2;
	KaguTest(12002,c+1);
	// ちゃんと同期が取れるようにＮＰＣモードに変更
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
	KaguTest(12005,c+1);
	// 壁抜けオフ
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30097,c);
	KaguTest(30097,c+1);
}
#EndScript

// 504:円盤倒したらスライム出てくる
#Script:01263
int main()
{
	int c;
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	KaguTest(30025,3);
	c = ch[420];
	GetCharPos(0,x,y,z);
	CharPos(c,-x - 100000,y + 500,z + 150);
	CharPos(c+1,-x - 100000 + 433,y - 250,z + 150);
	CharPos(c+2,-x - 100000 - 433,y - 250,z + 150);
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 0;
	KaguTest(30015,3);
}
#EndScript

// 503裏：あたりに触れると間抜け魚人出てくる
#Script:01264
int main()
{
	int c;
	int pt1;
	int pt2;

	// あたり消す
	ch[420] = 350;
	KaguTest2(30003,2,"Box01");

	TekiStop(1);

	// 敵準備
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,1);
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	c = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c);
	pt1 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c+1);
	pt2 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12000,c);
	KaguTest(12000,c+1);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30097,c);
	KaguTest(30097,c+1);
	ch[420] = 450;
	ch[421] = 8550;
	KaguTest(30070,c);
	
	// プレイヤー動かす
	ch[424] = 1019;
	ch[425] = 8364;
	ch[426] = 12;
	KaguTest(30061,0);
	KaguTest(30060,0);
	Walk(ch[421],ch[422],30);
	
	// カメラも動く
	ch[420] = 1310;
	ch[421] = 9336;
	ch[422] = 399;
	ch[423] = 1019;
	ch[424] = 8364;
	ch[425] = -4;
	KaguTest(30093,30);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	
	Wait(30);
	
	// 一匹目飛び掛る
	Walk2(c,21,0,25);
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(5);
	ch[420] = 24;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 5;
	KaguTest(12003,c);
	Wait(3);
	ch[421] = 30;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c);
	Wait(45);
	ch[420] = 2010;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c);
	ch[420] = 2009;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,0);
	Wait(40);
	ch[420] = 4;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c);
	Wait(30);
	Walk2(c,0,5,45);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);

	ch[420] = 1276;
	ch[421] = 9046;
	ch[422] = 179;
	ch[423] = 994;
	ch[424] = 8362;
	ch[425] = 46;
	KaguTest(30093,45);

	Wait(15);
	
	// 二匹目突撃
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,2);
	ch[420] = 450;
	ch[421] = 8550;
	KaguTest(30070,c+1);
	Walk2(c+1,21,0,25);
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(5);
	ch[420] = 24;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 5;
	KaguTest(12003,c+1);
	Wait(3);
	ch[421] = 30;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c+1);
	Wait(15);
	// ヒット！
	ch[420] = 93;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 5;
	KaguTest(12003,c);
	Wait(5);
	GetCharPos(c,ch[420],ch[421],ch[422]);
	ch[422] = ch[422] + 100;
	ch[423] = 1637;
	ch[424] = 1;
	ch[425] = 0;
	ch[426] = 0;
	ch[427] = 100;
	ch[428] = 0;
	KaguTest(30045,0);
	Wait(25);
	ch[420] = 2010;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c+1);
	Wait(30);
	// もめる
//	ch[420] = 0;
//	ch[421] = 1;
//	ch[422] = 5;
//	KaguTest(12003,c);
	ch[420] = 2;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 5;
	KaguTest(12003,c+1);
	Look(c,c+1);
//	Wait(5);
//	ch[420] = 2;
//	ch[421] = 1;
//	ch[422] = 5;
//	KaguTest(12003,c);
//	Wait(20);
	ch[420] = 9;	// 怒り
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c);
	Wait(60);
	
//	if (0)
//	{
//		ch[420] = 11;	// ピンチ
//		KaguTest(30036,c+1);
//		Walk2(c+1,0,-3,60);
//
//		ch[420] = 932;
//		ch[421] = 9144;
//		ch[422] = 398;
//		ch[423] = 991;
//		ch[424] = 8131;
//		ch[425] = -3;
//		KaguTest(30093,60);
//
//		Wait(60);
//		ch[420] = 12;	// ひらめき
//		KaguTest(30036,c+1);
//		Wait(45);
//		ch[420] = 8;	// はてな
//		KaguTest(30036,c);
//		Wait(45);
//		ch[420] = 15;	// ！
//		KaguTest(30036,c+1);
//		ch[420] = 6;
//		ch[421] = 1;
//		ch[422] = 5;
//		KaguTest(12003,c+1);
//		
//		ch[420] = 980;
//		ch[421] = 9433;
//		ch[422] = 383;
//		ch[423] = 988;
//		ch[424] = 8456;
//		ch[425] = -3;
//		KaguTest(30093,20);
//		
//		Wait(45);

//		KaguTest(30036,c);
//		Wait(20);
//	}
//	else
//	{
//		Wait(30);
//		ch[420] = 12;	// ひらめき
//		KaguTest(30036,c);
//		Wait(60);
//	}

	Look(c,0);
	Look(c+1,0);
	Wait(10);
//	ch[420] = 6;
//	ch[421] = 1;
//	ch[422] = 5;
//	KaguTest(12003,c);

//	ch[420] = 1150;
//	ch[421] = 10007;
//	ch[422] = 449;
//	ch[423] = 1035;
//	ch[424] = 8751;
//	ch[425] = 21;
//	KaguTest(30093,20);

//	Wait(30);
//	ch[420] = 15;	// ！
//	KaguTest(30036,0);
//	Wait(30);
	// 矛先はプレイヤーに
	
	// 後始末
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
	KaguTest(12005,c+1);
	ch[420] = pt1;
	KaguTest(12002,c);
	ch[420] = pt2;
	KaguTest(12002,c+1);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30097,c);
	KaguTest(30097,c+1);
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 205:玉転がさずにわたった
#Script:01269
int main()
{
	ch[420] = 9999;
	KaguTest2(30003,2,"tekiatari1");
	
	KaguTest2(30016,0,"4545L");
	
	Wait(30);
	
	SaveCamera();
	
	ch[420] = 1859;
	ch[421] = 1546;
	ch[422] = 50;
	ch[423] = 1680;
	ch[424] = 3671;
	ch[425] = -304;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(45);
	
	Ksk(1);	// 揺れはここでリセットされるはず
	KaguTest(60004,1);
	ch[423] = 0;
	KaguTest(40004,0);
	KaguTest(40004,0);
	KaguTest(40004,0);
	KaguTest(40004,0);
	KaguTest(40004,0);
	KaguTest(40004,0);
	KaguTest(40004,0);
	KaguTest(40004,0);
	KaguTest(40004,0);
	Wait(45);
	
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
}
#EndScript

// 205裏：301:309:305:211:火飾台点ける
#Script:01270
int main()
{
	KaguTest(20010,0);
	if (ch[420] == 305)
	{
		KaguTest(20031,0);
		ch[420] = 0;
		KaguTest(20045,ch[421]);
		KaguTest(20045,ch[421]+1);
		KaguTest(20045,ch[421]+2);
		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[420] == 301)
	{
		KaguTest(20031,0);
		ch[420] = 0;
		KaguTest(20045,ch[421]);
		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[420] == 211)
	{
		KaguTest(20031,0);
		ch[420] = 2;
		KaguTest(20045,ch[421]);
		return 0;
	}
	
	// それ以外
	KaguTest(20031,0);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(20045,ch[421]);
}
#EndScript

// 205裏：火飾台消すと敵沸く
#Script:01271
int main()
{
	ch[251] = 1;
	int keihou;
	keihou = 0;
	TekiStop(1);
	Wait(15);
	Camera(0,-1680,-3290,-435);
	CrossFade();
	
	int i;
	
	for(i = 0;i < 4;i++)
	{
		if (keihou < 2)
		{
			keihou++;
			SE(519);
		}
		ch[420] = 100;
		ch[421] = 50;
		ch[422] = 50;
		KaguTest(30046,15);
		Wait(15);
		ch[420] = 100;
		ch[421] = 100;
		ch[422] = 100;
		KaguTest(30046,15);
		Wait(10);
		if (i == 0)
		{
			// エモ出し
			// きょろきょろ
			ch[420] = 15;
			ch[428] = 0;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,0);
			KaguTest(30019,12);
		}
		if (i == 1)
		{
			KaguTest(30019,0);
		}
		if (i == 2)
		{
			ch[420] = 100000;
			ch[427] = 1;
			KaguTest(30015,2);
			Look(0,59);
			int c;
			KaguTest(30025,2);
			c = ch[420];
			KaguTest(12011,c);
			KaguTest(12011,c+1);
			ch[420] = 2;
			KaguTest(12012,c);
			KaguTest(12012,c+1);
		}
		Wait(5);
	}
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	CrossFade();
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 202裏：宝箱開けると敵が水の中から現れる
#Script:01272
int main()
{
	SaveCamera();
	ch[301] = 1;
	
	Wait(60);
	
	ch[420] = 2273;
	ch[421] = 6925;
	ch[422] = 506;
	ch[423] = 1270;
	ch[424] = 6688;
	ch[425] = -242;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(10);
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,1);
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	int c;
	c = ch[420];
	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
	KaguTest(12005,c+1);
	KaguTest(12005,c+2);
	Wait(5);
	Walk2(c,10,0,20);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Walk2(c+1,3,-7,20);
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Walk2(c+2,3,7,20);
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	ch[421] = 60;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c);
	KaguTest(30037,c+1);
	KaguTest(30037,c+2);
	KaguTest(20047,0);
	Look(0,c);
	ch[420] = 15;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,0);
	ch[420] = 1425;
	ch[421] = 6770;
	ch[422] = -35;
	ch[423] = 171;
	ch[424] = 0;
	ch[425] = 0;
	ch[426] = 0;
	ch[427] = 100;
	ch[428] = 0;
	KaguTest(30045,0);
	ch[421] = 6675;
	KaguTest(30045,0);
	ch[421] = 6862;
	KaguTest(30045,0);
	Wait(20);
	Look(c,0);
	Look(c+1,0);
	Look(c+2,0);
	Wait(20);

	KaguTest(30019,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
	KaguTest(12005,c+1);
	KaguTest(12005,c+2);
	ch[420] = 1;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30090,c);
	KaguTest(30090,c+1);
	KaguTest(30090,c+2);
}
#EndScript

// 604:あたりに触れるとスライム振ってくる
#Script:01275
int main()
{
	SaveCamera();
	ch[420] = 2891;
	ch[421] = 4250;
	ch[422] = 110;
	ch[423] = 3246;
	ch[424] = 5721;
	ch[425] = 846;
	KaguTest(30093,30);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 6;
	KaguTest(30015,1);
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	int c;
	c = ch[420];
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30041,c);
	KaguTest(30041,c+1);
	KaguTest(30041,c+2);
	int pt1;
	int pt2;
	int pt3;
	KaguTest(12004,c);
	pt1 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c+1);
	pt2 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c+2);
	pt3 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12000,c);
	KaguTest(12000,c+1);
	KaguTest(12000,c+2);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30097,c);
	KaguTest(30097,c+1);
	KaguTest(30097,c+2);
	
	Wait(30);

	Walk2(c,-8,-20,30);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(2);
	ch[421] = 20;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30041,c);
	Wait(13);
	Walk2(c+1,-8,-20,30);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(2);
	ch[421] = 20;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c+1);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30041,c+1);
	Wait(13);
	Walk2(c+2,-8,-20,30);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(2);
	ch[421] = 20;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c+2);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30041,c+2);
	Wait(13);
	
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	Look(c,0);
	Look(c+1,0);
	Look(c+2,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	ch[420] = pt1;
	KaguTest(12002,c);
	ch[420] = pt2;
	KaguTest(12002,c+1);
	ch[420] = pt3;
	KaguTest(12002,c+2);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
	KaguTest(12005,c+1);
	KaguTest(12005,c+2);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30097,c);
	KaguTest(30097,c+1);
	KaguTest(30097,c+2);
}
#EndScript

// 605:レバー引くとリフト動く＆敵がリフトに乗ってやってくる
#Script:01276
int main()
{
	ch[301] = 1;

	// 敵沸く
	int c;
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,1);
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	c = ch[420];
	int pt1;
	int pt2;
	int pt3;
	int pt4;
	KaguTest(12004,c);
	pt1 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c+1);
	pt2 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c+2);
	pt3 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c+3);
	pt4 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12000,c);
	KaguTest(12000,c+1);
	KaguTest(12000,c+2);
	KaguTest(12000,c+3);

	// リフト動く
	Wait(15);
	SE(950);
	
	SaveCamera();

	ch[420] = -804;
	ch[421] = 459;
	ch[422] = 1875;
	ch[423] = 255;
	ch[424] = 27;
	ch[425] = 1420;
	KaguTest(30093,15);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	
	ch[420] = 1;
	ch[421] = 0;
	KaguTest(30110,32);
	c = ch[420];
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest2(30023,c,"");
	ch[420] = c;
	ch[421] = 1;
	KaguTest(20062,0);
	ch[421] = 2;
	KaguTest(20044,ch[422]);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest2(30023,c,"@RopewayRoot1");

	// 敵やってくる
	Wait(45);

//	ch[420] = 1290;
//	ch[421] = 973;
//	ch[422] = 1875;
//	ch[423] = 2991;
//	ch[424] = 279;
//	ch[425] = 1420;
	ch[420] = 1577;
	ch[421] = 697;
	ch[422] = 1823;
	ch[423] = 2704;
	ch[424] = 330;
	ch[425] = 1420;
	KaguTest(30093,20);
	Wait(20);
//	ch[420] = -1264;
//	ch[421] = 360;
//	ch[422] = 1840;
//	ch[423] = 1068;
//	ch[424] = 273;
//	ch[425] = 1420;
	ch[420] = -319;
	ch[421] = 404;
	ch[422] = 1703;
	ch[423] = 897;
	ch[424] = 325;
	ch[425] = 1420;
	KaguTest(30093,170);
	Wait(140);
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	c = ch[420];
	Look(c,0);
	Look(c+1,0);
	Look(c+2,0);
	Look(c+3,0);
	Wait(30);
	Look(c,0);
	Look(c+1,0);
	Look(c+2,0);
	Look(c+3,0);

	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
	KaguTest(12005,c+1);
	KaguTest(12005,c+2);
	KaguTest(12005,c+3);
	ch[420] = pt1;
	KaguTest(12002,c);
	ch[420] = pt2;
	KaguTest(12002,c+1);
	ch[420] = pt3;
	KaguTest(12002,c+2);
	ch[420] = pt4;
	KaguTest(12002,c+3);
	
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();

	// ついでに魚人設定しておく
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,2);
	ch[420] = 15;
	KaguTest(30042,403);
}
#EndScript

// 605:魚人設定
#Script:01277
int main()
{
	int c;
	KaguTest(30025,2);
	c = ch[420];
	ch[420] = 8;
	KaguTest2(30023,c,"@lift4root");
	KaguTest2(30023,c+1,"@lift3root");
	ch[420] = c;
	ch[421] = 9;
	KaguTest(20044,4100);
	ch[420] = c+1;
	KaguTest(20044,4100);
	ch[420] = c;
	ch[421] = 10;
	KaguTest(20044,1);
	ch[420] = c+1;
	KaguTest(20044,1);
	ch[420] = -1;
	KaguTest(30051,c);
	KaguTest(30051,c+1);
}
#EndScript

// 605:敵に見つかるとすごいの出てくる
#Script:01278
int main()
{
	ch[302] = 1;
	SaveCamera();
	
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,3);
	KaguTest(30025,3);
	int c;
	c = ch[420];
	int pt1;
	int pt2;
	KaguTest(12004,c);
	pt1 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c+1);
	pt2 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12000,c);

	// 一匹目	
	ch[420] = 5605;
	ch[421] = -1079;
	ch[422] = 3130;
	ch[423] = 4297;
	ch[424] = -560;
	ch[425] = 2495;
	KaguTest(30093,30);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	
	Walk2(c,12,-17,30);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(30);

	ch[420] = 4945;
	ch[421] = 471;
	ch[422] = 3046;
	ch[423] = 5233;
	ch[424] = -454;
	ch[425] = 2720;
	KaguTest(30093,45);
	
	Walk2(c,22,-2,20);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(20);
	Look(0,c);
	Walk2(c,16,15,30);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(15);
	ch[420] = 15;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,0);
	Wait(15);
	Look(c,0);
	Look(0,c);
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,4);
	Look(c+1,0);
	KaguTest(12000,c+1);
	Wait(45);
	
	// ２匹目
	ch[420] = 4483;
	ch[421] = -449;
	ch[422] = 2999;
	ch[423] = 4788;
	ch[424] = 702;
	ch[425] = 3070;
	KaguTest(30093,30);
	Wait(45);
	ch[420] = 5528;
	ch[421] = -1100;
	ch[422] = 3281;
	ch[423] = 4748;
	ch[424] = 356;
	ch[425] = 2695;
	KaguTest(30093,45);
	
	Walk2(c+1,3,-20,15);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(2);
	ch[421] = 30;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c+1);
	Wait(30);
	Look(0,c+1);
	Look(c+1,0);
	Wait(45);
	
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
	KaguTest(12005,c+1);
	ch[420] = pt1;
	KaguTest(12002,c);
	ch[420] = pt2;
	KaguTest(12002,c+1);
	ch[420] = 1;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30090,c-1);
	KaguTest(30090,c-2);
	ch[420] = 100;
	ch[421] = 100;
	ch[422] = 100;
	KaguTest(30046,0);
}
#EndScript

// 605:敵倒すと扉開く
#Script:01279
int main()
{
	Wait(15);
	SE(950);
	ch[303] = 1;

	SaveCamera();
	ch[420] = 4830;
	ch[421] = -969;
	ch[422] = 3305;
	ch[423] = 4815;
	ch[424] = 630;
	ch[425] = 2770;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(30);
	Event(405);
	Wait(45);
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
}
#EndScript

// ラッシー会話
#Script:01280
int main()
{
	ch[400] = 58;
	ch[258]++;
	if (ch[1538])
	{
		// エピローグ
		//ラッシー
		if (ch[258] < 2)
		{
			//ラッシー
			Message(58,"我們知道異次元的出口","幇了祢不少叺。","","");
			Message(58,"如果不細心","可能需要几十年","也在彷徨。","");
			Message(58,"快感謝我叺！","","","");
			Message(58,"…不過，祢之前","打敗了巨竜","也幇了我。","");
		}
		else
		{
			//ラッシー
			Message(58,"我們知道異次元的出口","幇了祢不少叺。","","");
			Message(58,"如果不細心","可能需要几十年","也在彷徨。","");
		}
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	if (ch[1571] && !ch[1538])
	{
		//ラッシー
		Message(58,"還説拉希与王子","是很般配的一対。","","");
		Message(58,"呀，莫斯比","可真有眼光姶。","","");
	}	
	if (ch[1513] && !ch[1571])
	{
		if (ch[258] < 2)
		{
			//ラッシー
			Message(58,"還大声説拉希是个大美女","簡直像个藝術品。","","");
			Message(58,"呀，如果是莫斯比的話，","肯定会害羞。","這是人之常情啀！","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"…………………………","","","");
			//ラッシー
			Message(58,"……祢発什麼呆？","","","");
		}
		else
		{
			//ラッシー
			Message(58,"還大叫説拉希是个大美女","簡直像个藝術品。","","");
		}
	}
	if (!ch[1513])
	{
		Message(58,"我悁莫斯比","所説的話姶。","","");
		Message(58,"想知道他説什麼","尽管問我好了。","","");
	}
	ch[400] = -1;
}
#EndScript

// クリーム会話	//クリームは普通のキャラ
#Script:01282
int main()
{
	ch[400] = 60;
	ch[260]++;
	if (ch[1538])
	{
		// エピローグ
		//クリーム
		Look(60,0);
		if (ch[260] < 2)
		{
			Message(60,"普柯按照我遺留下的照片","変装成王子了。","","");
			Message(60,"不過，真正的王子","一定身処某个地方！","","");
			Message(60,"他想親手打敗","殱滅了王国的巨竜。","","");
			Message(60,"冷静下来以后，","大家一起去迎接叺。","","");
		}
		else
		{
			Message(60,"普柯按照我遺留下的照片","変装成王子了。","","");
			Message(60,"不過，真正的王子","一定身処某个地方！","","");
		}
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	
	//クリーム
	Look(60,0);
//	if (ch[2112])
//	{
//		//クリーム
//		if (ch[260] < 2)
//		{
//			Message(60,"………………","","","");
//			Message(60,"王子…究竟為什麼……","","","");
//			Message(60,"完全不像王子本人咾……","","","");
//		}
//		else
//		{
//			Message(60,"王子…究竟為什麼……","","","");
//		}
//	}
	if (ch[1571])
	{
		Message(60,"好……","","","");
		Message(60,"我决定了……","","","");
	}
	else
	{
		if (ch[260] < 2)
		{
			// 10/20 15:00テキスト
			//パリン
			Message(0,"已経没事了。","","","");
			//クリーム
			Message(60,"………………","","","");
			Message(60,"王子…究竟為什麼……","","","");
			Message(60,"完全不像王子本人咾……","","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"雖然不清楚事情","我从現在開始要去追赶王子。","","");
			Message(0,"要是有想知道的事情","祢也可以来叺。","","");
			//クリーム
			Message(60,"…現在我没有","這侘閑情！","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"是呎……","","","");
			
			if (!ch[2112])
			{
				//クリーム
				Message(60,"……………………","","","");
				Message(60,"那道墻……","","","");
				//パリン
				Message(0,"唹？","","","");
//				// 10/20 17:30テキスト
//				//クリーム
//				Message(60,"………………","","","");
//				Message(60,"王子…究竟為什麼……","","","");
//				Message(60,"完全不像王子本人咾。","","","");
//
//				Message(60,"按這様子看，那道墻……","","","");
				SaveCamera();
				ch[420] = -366;
				ch[421] = 1293;
				ch[422] = 790;
				ch[423] = 1185;
				ch[424] = 1286;
				ch[425] = 671;
				KaguTest(30093,30);
				KaguTest(30019,14);
				Wait(80);
				KaguTest(30019,0);
				RestoreCamera();
				CrossFade();
				Wait(15);

//				// 10/20 17:30テキスト
//				// クリーム
//				Message(60,"感到一股強勁的力量。","有什麼在呎……","","");
//				10/20 15:00テキスト
				//クリーム
				Message(60,"我感到从那道墻伝来很強的力量。","有什麼東西咾？","","");
			}
		}
		else
		{
			//クリーム
			Message(60,"王子…究竟為什麼……","","","");
		}
	}
	ch[400] = -1;
}

// ボブー会話
#Script:01283
int main()
{
	if (ch[1538])
	{
		// エピローグ
		ch[400] = 58;
		//ボブー
		Message(58,"以真面目干活","好爽姶！","","");
		Message(58,"給老子更多的","労力差事干叺！","","");
		ch[400] = -1;
		return 0;
	}
	ch[400] = 58;
	if (ch[1571] && !ch[1538])
	{
		//ボブー
		Message(58,"猫幽霊給我的薬","把傷都治好了！","","");
		Message(58,"很快能回復原様！","","","");
	}
	if (ch[1513] && !ch[1571])
	{
		//ボブー
		Message(58,"王子配戴的手鐶…","","","");
		Message(58,"那是正式的国王継位人","的証明姶！","","");
		Message(58,"…王子是対各式各様武器","都運用自如的専家。","","");
		Message(58,"祢能贏得了他呎？","","","");
	}
	if (ch[1505] && !ch[1513])
	{
		//ボブー
		Message(58,"姶，好柔和的風。","","","");
		Message(58,"那家夥……","","","");
		Message(58,"那家夥要是没来的話","我們就不用這麼辛苦","結束了……","");
	}
	if (!ch[1505])
	{
		//ボブー
		Message(58,"和祢戦斗","我会精疲力尽。","","");
		Message(58,"治好身体后再跟祢挑。","洗干浄肭子等着叺。","","");
	}
	if (!ch[2150])
	{
		// 雷のパーツヒント
		Message(58,"…対了","湖的対岸有桟橋","雷鳴時很響咾。","");
		Message(58,"我也不清楚","或許那邊有什麼東西在。","","");
	}
	ch[400] = -1;
}

// 012:街中クエスト中は外に出れない
#Script:01288
int main()
{
	MapEvent(0);
	if (ch[2002])
	{
		// のぞきクエスト中
		//パリン
		Message(0,"最重要是先找到西林達先生。","","","");
	}
	if (ch[2010])
	{
		// ビラ貼りクエスト中
		if (ch[2012] && ch[2013] && ch[2014])
		{
			Message(0,"必須告訴廸斯克先生","貼招貼已経完了。","","");
		}
		else
		{
			Message(0,"廉価商店委托","貼招貼的事還没完。","","");
		}
	}
	if (ch[2018])
	{
		// わらしべクエスト途中（限りなく実行する可能性の高い予定）
		Message(0,"我覚得還有","没做完的事。","","");
	}
	if (ch[2020])
	{
		KaguTest(20001,54);
		if (ch[430])
		{
			Message(0,"一定要把找到的奨牌","交給爺爺。","","");
		}
		else
		{
			Message(0,"還没找到爺爺所説","很珍貴的那種奨牌。","","");
		}
	}
	
	Walk(0,-8,15);
	Wait(15);
	
	MapEvent(1);
}
#EndScript

// 012:あたりに触れるとシリンダーが奥からやってくる
#Script:01289
int main()
{
	// シリンダー自由に動けるようにする
	ch[420] = 350;
	KaguTest2(30003,2,"Box01");
	
	KaguTest(12000,15);
	CharPos(15,3913,2140,-500);
	
		// シリンダーあらわれる
	Walk2(15,1,-7,60);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(60);
		// パリンは！
	ch[420] = 15;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,0);
		// シリンダーはなおも歩く	
	Walk2(15,-4,-6,30)
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(30);
	Walk2(15,-7,-3,45);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	
	//パリン
	Message(0,"姶，西林達先生！","","","");
	//シリンダー
	ch[400] = 15;
	Look(15,0);
	Message(15,"哦，小絈琳姶。","","","");
	Look(15,0);
	Message(15,"好感動啝。","莫非祢是在","等我回来呎？","");
	Look(15,0);
	//パリン
	Message(0,"没有這回事。","","","");
	Message(0,"祢偸看我","換衣服叺…","","");
	Message(0,"我要告祢！","","","");
	//シリンダー
	Message(15,"小絈琳換衣服？","","","");
	Message(15,"是，是誤会啀。","今天一大早就被鉱山長","叫去工作了。","");
	//パリン
	Message(0,"那，這是什麼姶！","被畄在家門前的。","","");
	
	//システム
	Mes("把帽子交給西林達先生。");
	Wait(60);
	KaguTest(20002,12);
	//シリンダー
	Message(15,"啣，這个早被普奇奪走了","是我很喜歓的帽子嘛。","","");
	//パリン
	Message(0,"看門犬的普奇？","","","");
	//シリンダー
	Message(15,"哈哈，今天早上追逐的時候","被它奪走的。","","");
	Message(15,"雖然我有后備的帽子","但，還是這頂","最合我心意。","");
	//パリン
	Message(0,"原来，是這麼回事姶。","","","");
	//シリンダー
	Message(15,"謝謝祢給我拿回来。","対了，為表謝意我給祢這个。","","");
	//システム
	SE(853);
	KaguTest(10006,0);
	KaguTest(10007,1);
	KaguTest2(10008,0,"得到壁紙④「峠通風格」。");
	KaguTest2(10008,2,"在絈琳家的棹上");
	KaguTest2(10008,3,"可以更換壁紙。");
	KaguTest2(10009,0,"kb004s.bmp");
	KaguTest(10010,10);
	Wait(10);
	Message(0,"","","","");
	KaguTest(10011,10);
	GetItem(2);
	//パリン
	Message(0,"唹？…為什麼","普奇要追着祢不放姶？","","");
	//シリンダー
	Message(15,"因為小芬説最近，","経常不見了蛋糢","我就在店周囲看看有没有発現。","");
	Message(15,"所以，普奇","誤認我是小偸了。","","");
	//パリン
	Message(0,"哘，祢該不会","是在偸看小芬呎？","","");
	//シリンダー
	Message(15,"哈哈，不是啀。","我還是，先走了。","","");
	
	Walk2(15,-25,-6,60);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	ch[420] = 15;
	KaguTest(30063,0);
	Wait(45);
	KaguTest(30063,-1);
	//パリン
	Message(0,"…平常都是那様了","説真話反而没有人相信。","","");
	ch[400] = -1;
	
	ch[420] = 60;
	KaguTest(12002,15);
	ch[3987] = 0;
	ch[3990] = 15;
	ch[3991] = 15;
	ch[3992] = 0;
	
	// クエスト終わり?クエスト終了
	ch[2002] = 0;
	ch[2003] = 0;
	ch[2004] = 1;
	ch[2006] = 0;
	ch[2007] = 0;
	ch[2008] = 0;
	ch[2009] = 0;
	ch[420] = 58;
	KaguTest2(30003,1,"@atariyotsu");
}
#EndScript

// 012:ビラ貼り１
#Script:01290
int main()
{
	ch[2012] = 1;
	
	//パリン
	Message(0,"這里好像可能貼伝単。","貼上去叺。","","");
	
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(20006,8);
	Black(0,100,15);
	Wait(15);
	LoadMapB(12);
	Black(0,0,15);
	Wait(15);
	
	if (ch[2012] && ch[2013] && ch[2014])
	{
		Message(0,"全部貼好了。","馬上去給廸斯克先生","報告叺。","");
	}
}
#EndScript

// シリンダーの帽子使った
#Script:01294
int main()
{
	KaguTest(10006,0);//発言初期化
	
	KaguTest2(10008,0,"竟敢偸看我換衣服……");
	KaguTest2(10008,1,"絶対要捉到他，再好好整治一頓。");
	
	KaguTest(10012,0);
}

// 004:バイトクエスト、ミニゲーム
#Script:01295
int main()
{
	// クエスト開始
	ch[2006] = 0;
	ch[2007] = 1;
	ch[2008] = 0;
	ch[2009] = 0;
	
	string text;
	string order;
	string answer;
	
	int kyaku;
	int seikai;
	kyaku = 0;
	seikai = 0;
	KaguTest(12000,3);
	// 客	
	// ?プレーン
	// ?シリンダー
	// ?ポコ
	// ?ディスク
	// ?プチ
	// ?ハイパボリック
	
	// プレーンやってくる
	kyaku++;
	KaguTest(12000,13);
	CharPos(13,0,-450,0);
	Look(0,13);
	Look(3,13);
	Walk2(13,0,7,110);
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = 0;
	KaguTest(30070,13);
	Wait(110);
	Message(0,"歓迎光臨！","","","");
		// 注文処理
	switch( rand() % 3)
	{
	case 0:
		order ="ＢｉｎｇＱｉＬｉｎ";
		answer ="氷淇淋";
		break;
	case 1:
		order ="ＫｅｌｅＢｉｎｇ";
		answer ="可楽餅";
		break;
	case 2:
		order ="ＫａＦｅｉ";
		answer ="嗹嘸";
		break;
	}
	Message(13,"「"+order+"」","吃這个叺……","","");
	text = Type(300);
	
	if (strcmp(text,answer) == 0 || strcmp(text,order) == 0)
	{
		seikai++;
		Message(0,"「"+order+"」、放入一个！","","","");
		Wait(15);
		SE(950);
		Wait(15);
		ch[420] = 13;
		ch[429] = 1;
		KaguTest(30036,13);
	}
	else
	{
		if (strcmp(text,"未輸入") == 0)
		{
			Message(0,"…………………","","","");
			ch[420] = 8;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,0);
			Wait(30);
			ch[420] = 9;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,13);
			Wait(30);
			ch[420] = 4;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,3);
			Wait(30);
		}
		else
		{
			Message(0,"「"+text+"」、放入一个！","","","");
			ch[420] = 4;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,3);
			Wait(30);
			ch[420] = 9;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,13);
			Wait(30);
			Message(13,"等等！","我要的是「"+order+"」姶！！","","");
		}
		Message(13,"算了。","小絈琳打工時","就客气一点叺。","");
		ch[420] = 9;
		ch[429] = 1;
		KaguTest(30036,13);
	}
	Walk2(13,0,-7,110);
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = -450;
	KaguTest(30070,13);
	Message(0,"謝謝祢！","","","");
	KaguTest(20053,0);
	Wait(ch[420]);
	CharPos(13,-200000,0,0);
	ch[420] = 60;
	KaguTest(12002,13);
	// シリンダーやってくる
	kyaku++;
	KaguTest(12000,15);
	CharPos(15,0,-450,0);
	Look(0,15);
	Look(3,15);
	Walk2(15,0,7,110);
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = 0;
	KaguTest(30070,15);
	Wait(110);
	Message(0,"歓迎光臨！","","","");
		// 注文処理
	switch( rand() % 3)
	{
	case 0:
		order ="ＤａｎＧａｏ";
		answer ="蛋糢";
		break;
	case 1:
		order ="ＫｅｌｅＢｉｎｇ";
		answer ="可楽餅";
		break;
	case 2:
		order ="ＫｅＫｅ";
		answer ="可可";
		break;
	}
	Message(15,"「"+order+"」","我要一个叺","","");
	text = Type(300);
	
	if (strcmp(text,answer) == 0)
	{
		seikai++;
		Message(0,"放入「"+order+"」","","","");
		Wait(15);
		SE(950);
		Wait(15);
		ch[420] = 13;
		ch[429] = 1;
		KaguTest(30036,15);
	}
	else
	{
		if (strcmp(text,"未輸入") == 0)
		{
			Message(0,"…………………","","","");
			ch[420] = 8;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,0);
			Wait(30);
			ch[420] = 9;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,15);
			Wait(30);
			ch[420] = 4;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,3);
			Wait(30);
		}
		else
		{
			Message(0,"放入「"+text+"」","","","");
			ch[420] = 4;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,3);
			Wait(30);
			ch[420] = 9;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,15);
			Wait(30);
			Message(15,"等一下！","我想吃的是「"+order+"」姶","","");
		}
		Message(15,"啣，誰也有做錯的時候。","不過今天就不追究了。","","");
		ch[420] = 9;
		ch[429] = 1;
		KaguTest(30036,15);
	}
	Walk2(15,0,-7,110);
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = -450;
	KaguTest(30070,15);
	Message(0,"謝謝祢！","","","");
	KaguTest(20053,0);
	Wait(ch[420]);
	CharPos(15,-200000,0,0);
	ch[420] = 60;
	KaguTest(12002,15);
	// ポコやってくる
//	kyaku++;
	KaguTest(12000,16);
	CharPos(16,0,-450,0);
	Look(0,16);
	Look(3,16);
	Walk2(16,0,7,110);
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = 0;
	KaguTest(30070,16);
	Wait(110);
	Message(0,"歓迎光臨！","","","");
	ch[420] = 8;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,3);
	Wait(30);
		// 注文処理
	switch( rand() % 3)
	{
	case 0:
		order ="ＤａｎＧａｏ";
		answer ="蛋糢";
		break;
	case 1:
		order ="ＢｅｉＭｉａｎ";
		answer ="杯面";
		break;
	case 2:
		order ="ＤｉａｎＸｉｎ";
		answer ="点心";
		break;
	}
	Message(16,"「"+order+"」","我要這个！","","");
	text = Type(300);
	
	if (strcmp(text,answer) == 0)
	{
		seikai++;
		Message(0,"放入一个「"+order+"」","","","");
		Wait(15);
		ch[420] = 8;
		ch[429] = 1;
		KaguTest(30036,3);
		SE(950);
		Wait(30);
		ch[420] = 13;
		ch[429] = 1;
		KaguTest(30036,16);
	}
	else
	{
		if (strcmp(text,"未輸入") == 0)
		{
			Message(0,"…………………","","","");
			ch[420] = 8;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,0);
			Wait(30);
			ch[420] = 9;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,16);
			Wait(30);
//			ch[420] = 4;
//			KaguTest(30036,3);
//			Wait(30);
		}
		else
		{
			Message(0,"放入一个「"+text+"」","","","");
			ch[420] = 8;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,3);
			Wait(30);
//			ch[420] = 4;
//			KaguTest(30036,3);
//			Wait(30);
			ch[420] = 9;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,16);
			Wait(30);
			Message(16,"等一等！","我要的是「"+order+"」！","","");
		}
		Message(16,"還是算了。","這間店的店員素質不駈。","","");
		ch[420] = 9;
		ch[429] = 1;
		KaguTest(30036,16);
	}
	Walk2(16,0,-7,110);
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = -450;
	KaguTest(30070,16);
	Message(0,"謝謝祢！","","","");
	ch[420] = 8;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,3);
	KaguTest(20053,0);
	Wait(ch[420]);
	CharPos(16,-200000,0,0);
	ch[420] = 23;
	KaguTest(12002,16);
	// ハイパボリックやってくる
	kyaku++;
	KaguTest(12000,20);
	CharPos(20,0,-450,0);
	Look(0,20);
	Look(3,20);
	Walk2(20,0,7,110);
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = 0;
	KaguTest(30070,20);
	Wait(110);
	Message(0,"歓迎光臨！","","","");
		// 注文処理
	switch( rand() % 3)
	{
	case 0:
		order ="ＤｉａｎＸｉｎ";
		answer ="点心";
		break;
	case 1:
		order ="ＰｉｎｇＧｕｏＰａｉ";
		answer ="苹果派";
		break;
	case 2:
		order ="ＫａｏＴｉａｎＳｈｕ";
		answer ="烱甜薯";
		break;
	}
	Message(20,"想吃「"+order+"」姶！","","","");
	text = Type(300);
	
	if (strcmp(text,answer) == 0)
	{
		seikai++;
		Message(0,"放入一个「"+order+"」","","","");
		Wait(15);
		SE(950);
		Wait(15);
		ch[420] = 13;
		ch[429] = 1;
		KaguTest(30036,20);
	}
	else
	{
		if (strcmp(text,"未輸入") == 0)
		{
			Message(0,"…………………","","","");
			ch[420] = 8;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,0);
			Wait(30);
			ch[420] = 9;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,20);
			Wait(30);
			ch[420] = 4;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,3);
			Wait(30);
		}
		else
		{
			Message(0,"放入一个「"+text+"」。","","","");
			ch[420] = 4;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,3);
			Wait(30);
			ch[420] = 9;
			ch[429] = 1;
			KaguTest(30036,20);
			Wait(30);
			Message(20,"不要走！！","我点的是「"+order+"」！","","");
		}
		Message(20,"既然是我的孫女","不仁慈一点不行","","");
		ch[420] = 9;
		ch[429] = 1;
		KaguTest(30036,20);
	}
	Walk2(20,0,-7,110);
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = -450;
	KaguTest(30070,20);
	Message(0,"謝謝祢！","","","");
	KaguTest(20053,0);
	Wait(ch[420]);
	CharPos(20,-200000,0,0);
	ch[420] = 60;
	KaguTest(12002,20);
	// 終了
	Black(0,100,15);
	Wait(15);
	ch[2015] = 0;
	
	// ＮＰＣを戻す
	ch[420] = 60;
	KaguTest(12002,13);
	KaguTest(12002,15);
	ch[420] = 23;
	KaguTest(12002,16);
	ch[420] = 22;
	KaguTest(12002,3);
	
	LoadMap(4);
	CharPos(0,0,190,0);
	Look(0,3);
	Black(0,0,15);
	Wait(15);
	if (seikai > kyaku * 0.75)
	{
		// 合格
		//ファン
		Message(3,"好的，辛苦祢了。","","","");
		//パリン
		Message(0,"這麼累…","","","");
		//ファン
		Message(3,"呵呵，工作很不容易叺。","","","");
		Message(3,"小絈琳，祢很努力","借帳就一筆勾銷叺。","","");
		//パリン
		Message(0,"不，不用這様…","","","");
		//ファン
		Message(3,"這是我給祢的奨励。","","","");
		//システム
		SE(853);
		KaguTest(10006,0);
		KaguTest(10007,1);
		KaguTest2(10008,0,"得到壁紙⑧「讓人打盻睡的講議」。");
		KaguTest2(10008,2,"在絈琳家的棹上");
		KaguTest2(10008,3,"可以更換壁紙。");
		KaguTest2(10009,0,"kb008s.bmp");
		KaguTest(10010,10);
		Wait(10);
		Message(0,"","","","");
		KaguTest(10011,10);
		GetItem(2);
		//ファン
		Message(3,"不可以再随便吃","店里頭的食品哦。","","");
		//パリン
		Message(0,"…都説過，不是我干的！","","","");
		ch[2016] = 1;
	}
	else
	{
		// 不合格
		//ファン
		Message(3,"小絈琳…","","","");
		//パリン
		Message(0,"什麼事？","","","");
		//ファン
		Message(3,"真没用。","","","");
		Message(3,"這様子不能","給祢消帳。","","");
		//パリン
		Message(0,"啣……","","","");
		
		ch[2017] = 1;
	}
	ch[2007] = 0;
	ch[2015] = 0;
}
#EndScript

// 0401:ポコ・アフロモード

int main()
{
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(12009,16);
	KaguTest(12006,16);

	KaguTest(12002,16);
	ch[420] = 16;
	ch[421] = 0;

	ch[421] = 2;

// 0401:イワオ・ファラオモード
#Script:01303
int main()
{
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(12009,7);
	KaguTest(12006,7);
	ch[420] = 98;
	KaguTest(12002,7);
	ch[420] = 7;
	ch[421] = 0;
	KaguTest(20044,0);
	ch[421] = 2;
	KaguTest(20044,922);
	ch[421] = 15;
	KaguTest(20044,41);
	ch[421] = 4;
	KaguTest(20044,0);
}

// 0401:ポコ・アフロモード解除
#Script:01304
int main()
{
	//ポコ
	ch[423] = 14028;
	KaguTest2(30024,16,"@Dummy05");
	GetCharPos(16,ch[420],ch[421],ch[422]);
	ch[423] = 8805;
	ch[424] = 0;
	ch[425] = 0;
	ch[426] = 0;
	ch[427] = 100;
	ch[428] = 0;
	KaguTest(30045,0);
	Wait2(20);

	Message(16,"好熱好熱！","熱死了！","","");
	
	//※アフロが燃え上がってポコの頭からはずれる。
	ch[421] = 15;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,16);
	Wait(20);
	ch[421] = 15;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,16);
	Wait(20);
	ch[421] = 15;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,16);
	Wait(20);
	ch[421] = 15;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,16);
	
	ch[3962] = 0;
	Black(0,100,15);
	Wait(15);
	LoadMap(401);
	ch[400] = 116;
	KaguTest(20039,16);
	Look(0,16);
	Look(16,0);
	ch[400] = 16;
	Black(0,0,15);
	Wait(15);

	//ポコ
	Message(16,"哘……","終于出来了。","","");
	//パリン
	Message(0,"太好了。","","","");
	//ポコ
	Message(16,"又痒又熱的，","差点悶死我了。","","");
	Message(16,"那肯定被下了詛呪的品種。","","","");
	//パリン
	Message(0,"詛呪的品種？","","","");
	//ポコ
	Message(16,"幇助了被詛呪的幽霊","就一定会送祢回礼。","","");
	Message(16,"所以，這个送祢。","","","");

	if (ch[2027])
	{
		// 既に壁紙を手に入れてある
		// ケーキをあげる
		KaguTest(20001,20);
		Mes("得到『蛋糢』。");
		KaguTest(20022,20);
		GetItem(20);
		Wait(60);
		if (ch[430] == 3)
		{
			// オーバーしている
			Mes("物品太多不能持有。");
			Wait(60);
		}
	}
	else
	{
		//システム
		SE(853);
		KaguTest(10006,0);
		KaguTest(10007,1);
		KaguTest2(10008,0,"得到壁紙⑤「友好的早上」。");
		KaguTest2(10008,2,"在絈琳家的棹上");
		KaguTest2(10008,3,"可以更換壁紙。");
		KaguTest2(10009,0,"kb005s.bmp");
		KaguTest(10010,10);
		Wait(10);
		Message(0,"","","","");
		KaguTest(10011,10);
		GetItem(2);
		ch[2027] = 1;
	}
	ch[2026] = 0;

	//ポコ
	Message(16,"絶対還有其他","類似的品種。","","");
	Message(16,"雖然不知道是誰做的","真麻煩的品種姶。","","");
	ch[400] = -1;
}
#EndScript

// 0401:イワオ・ファラオモード解除
#Script:01305
int main()
{
	//イワオ
	Message(7,"嗾嗾…嗾嗾嗾…","","","");
	Message(7,"嗚哇！","","","");

	ch[3964] = 0;
	White(0,100,15);
	Wait(15);
	LoadMap(401);
	Look(0,7);
	Look(7,0);
	ch[400] = 7;
	KaguTest(20039,7);
	White(0,0,15);
	Wait(15);

	//イワオ
	Message(7,"姶，這是哢里？","","","");
	//パリン
	Message(0,"祢好像醒了姶？","","","");
	//イワオ
	Message(7,"我梦見自己","変成不知名的国王","還被暗殺了！","");
	//パリン
	Message(0,"被悪梦魘住了。","","","");
	//イワオ
	Message(7,"哘，謝謝祢","叫醒我。","","");
	Message(7,"這是謝礼。","","","");

	if (ch[2033])
	{
		// 既に壁紙を手に入れてある
		// ケーキをあげる
		KaguTest(20001,20);
		Mes("得到『蛋糢』。");
		KaguTest(20022,20);
		GetItem(20);
		Wait(60);
		if (ch[430] == 3)
		{
			// オーバーしている
			Mes("物品太多不能持有。");
			Wait(60);
		}
	}
	else
	{
		//システム
		SE(853);
		KaguTest(10006,0);
		KaguTest(10007,1);
		KaguTest2(10008,0,"得到壁紙⑥「各種各様的装備」。");
		KaguTest2(10008,2,"在絈琳家的棹上");
		KaguTest2(10008,3,"可以更換壁紙。");
		KaguTest2(10009,0,"kb006s.bmp");
		KaguTest(10010,10);
		Wait(10);
		Message(0,"","","","");
		KaguTest(10011,10);
		GetItem(2);
		ch[2033] = 1;
	}
	ch[2032] = 0;
	ch[400] = -1;
}
#EndScript

	//フランソワ
	Message(61,"啗唸啗～","","","");
	//システム
	CharPos(61,-200000,0,0);
	Mes("得到『弗朗索瓦』。");
	KaguTest(20022,33);
	GetItem(33);
	Wait(60);
	ch[2034] = 1;
}

// フランソワ使用
#Script:01307

// 魔法のツボ使用
#Script:01308
int main()
{
	// この場所で使えるかチェック
	KaguTest(20056,1);
	if (!ch[420])
	{
		// 使えない
		KaguTest2(20002,0,"這里无法使用。");
		return 0;
	}

	// 近くにキャラがいないかチェック
	int b;
	int tubo;
	int tubo2;

	tubo = 34;
	tubo2 = 6;
	KaguTest(20001,23);
	if (ch[430])
	{
		b = 16;
		tubo = 23;
		tubo2 = 1;
	}
	KaguTest(20001,24);
	if (ch[430])
	{
		b = 7;
		tubo = 24;
		tubo2 = 2;
	}
	KaguTest(20001,26);
	if (ch[430])
	{
		b = 11;
		tubo = 26;
		tubo2 = 3;
	}
	KaguTest(20001,28);
	if (ch[430])
	{
		b = 6;
		tubo = 28;
		tubo2 = 4;
	}
	KaguTest(20001,55);
	if (ch[430])
	{
		b = 25;
		tubo = 55;
		tubo2 = 5;
	}
	
	KaguTest(20055,b);

	int chara;
	chara = ch[420];
	ch[421] = 1;
	KaguTest(30076,0)
	if (chara == 25 && !ch[2285])
	{
		// 駄目
		chara = 0;
	}
	if (chara && ch[420])
	{
		// 近くにキャラがいた
		KaguTest(20057,0);
		Wait(30);
		ch[421] = 0;
		KaguTest(30076,tubo2);

		// ツボを全てなくす
		KaguTest(20002,23);
		KaguTest(20002,24);
		KaguTest(20002,26);
		KaguTest(20002,28);
		KaguTest(20002,55);
		KaguTest(20002,34);
		
		switch(chara)
		{
		case 16:
			// ポコ吸出し
			//ポコ
			ch[420] = 0;
			KaguTest(30111,16);
			Wait(100);
			ch[420] = 1;
			KaguTest(30111,0);
			GetItem(23);
			KaguTest(20022,23);
			Mes("得到『青色的壷』。");
			Wait(60);
			Message(16,"怎，怎麼突然有点頭暈。","一定是工作過労了。","","");
			break;
		case 11:
			// チャッキー吸出し
			//チャッキー
			ch[420] = 0;
			KaguTest(30111,11);
			Wait(100);
			ch[420] = 1;
			KaguTest(30111,0);
			GetItem(26);
			KaguTest(20022,26);
			Mes("得到『緑色的壷』。");
			Wait(60);
			Message(11,"魂魄好像一下子","被抽走了似的？","","");
			break;
		case 7:
			// イワオ吸出し
			//イワオ
			ch[420] = 0;
			KaguTest(30111,7);
			Wait(100);
			ch[420] = 1;
			KaguTest(30111,0);
			GetItem(24);
			KaguTest(20022,24);
			Mes("得到『黄色的壷』。");
			Wait(60);
			Message(7,"振作起精神来了！","","","");
			break;
		case 6:
			// ピエール吸出し
			//ピエール
			ch[420] = 0;
			KaguTest(30111,6);
			Wait(100);
			ch[420] = 1;
			KaguTest(30111,0);
			GetItem(28);
			KaguTest(20022,28);
			Mes("得到『紫色的壷』。");
			Wait(60);
			Message(6,"唹？整个身体","変得軽松了。","","");
			Message(6,"多虧了小姐","今晩可以安睡了。","","");
			break;
		case 25:
			// ブラックビーン吸出し
			//ブラックビーン
			ch[420] = 0;
			KaguTest(30111,25);
			Wait(100);
			ch[420] = 1;
			KaguTest(30111,0);
			GetItem(55);
			KaguTest(20022,55);
			Mes("得到『黒色的壷』。");
			Wait(60);
			//ブラックビーン
			Message(25,"哘…？","站起来会眩暈。","","");
			Message(25,"不多点鍛煉不行姶。","","","");
			break;
		default:
			// それ以外
			//パリン
			GetItem(tubo);
			Wait(30);
			Message(0,"壷没有反応姶。","対了，听説根据不同的幽霊","有不同的用法。","");
			KaguTest2(20003,61,"mt_put.it3");
			Wait(30);
			ch[420] = 1;
			KaguTest(30111,0);
			Wait(30);
			break;
		}
	}
	else
	{
		// キャラがいない
		// ここでは使えないメッセージを出す
//		GetItem(tubo);
		KaguTest2(20002,0,"這里无法使用。");
	}
}
#EndScript

// ポポン
#Script:01309
int main()
{
	ch[400] = 56;
	KaguTest(99993,0);
	if (ch[420] && ch[421] && ch[422] && ch[425])
	{
		// 全制覇済み
		if (!ch[2038])
		{
			// 初会話
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"呼呼，好累……","我快走不動了。","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"祢，祢是誰？","","","");
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"嚇我一跳！！","","","");
			Message(56,"祢…何時","站在那里的？","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"剛才姶。","","","");
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"是，是呎…","我的名字叫波班。","","");
			Message(56,"今天，","搬到這个城鎮来。","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"呀！！","進展得真快姶。","","");
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"呵呵，从布莱恩婆婆","那邊听説了。","","");
			Message(56,"祢是這个城鎮唯一的孩子……","絈琳対叺？","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"哘，我是。","","","");
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"怎麼様？","跟我做个朋友","好呎？","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"……………………","","","");
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"怎麼了？","","","");
			Message(56,"…不対，応該是祢覚得我怎麼了？","","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"太好了！！","終于如我所愿找到人類的朋友。","","");
			Message(0,"祢叫波班呎？","我們現在就去玩叺！","","");
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"哘，好姶。","","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"祢喜歓","玩什麼？","","");
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"在老家時","常常和爺爺玩撃剣。","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"撃剣？","祢也愛玩休育運咾。","","");
			Message(0,"那麼，和我輪流","去跟妖精作戦叺？","","");
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"听起来好像很有趣。","","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"就這様决定咊！","快人快語。","","");
			Message(0,"那我現在就把","伝説中的借給祢。","没的武器很可憐的。","");
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"祢用不着担心。","","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"哘？","","","");
			//ポポン抜刀
			KaguTest(12000,56);
			White(0,100,0);
			Scop2(56,1,"spscop.it3");
			White(0,0,15);
			
			ch[420] = 45;
			ch[421] = 1;
			ch[422] = 5;
			KaguTest(12003,56);
			Wait(30);
			ch[420] = 46;
			ch[421] = 1;
			ch[422] = 5;
			KaguTest(12003,56);
			Wait(50);
			ch[420] = 2;
			ch[421] = 1;
			ch[422] = 10;
			KaguTest(12003,56);
			Wait(5);
			Scop2(56,0,"");
			ch[420] = 87;
			KaguTest(12002,56);
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"我有我家伝的","斬竜剣！","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"啝！！","","","");
			Message(0,"我把『啗唸小天使』的劇本","交給祢。","","");
			Message(0,"因為祢要代替","要謹記台詞哦。","","");
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"哘，一切交給我。","不会讓祢失望的。","","");
			
			ch[2038] = 1;
		}
		if (!ch[1545] && ch[2038])
		{
			//▼兄たま誘拐後&&ドリル入手後 !ch[1545]
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"要交給我呎？","","","");
		}
		if (!ch[2330] && ch[1545])
		{
			//▼王子と四天王登場後 !ch[2330]
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"哘，接下来是","找幽霊来対付叺……","","");
			Message(56,"…不是，我的意思是","找那些可愛的幽霊們，呵呵。","","");
		}
		if (!ch[507] && ch[2330])
		{
			//▼襲撃後?３オバケ発見後 !ch[507]
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"姶，一直在這里","站着…","","");
			Message(56,"絈琳，祢看，祢看！","很快就要和","四天王决戦了！","");
			Message(56,"哂哂，心里怦怦真跳咾！","","","");
		}
		if (!ch[1542] && ch[507])
		{
			//▼ボブー戦終了後 !ch[1542]
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"我好像不適合","絈琳那種衣服和装備。","","");
			Message(56,"真可惜……","","","");
		}
		if (!ch[1505] && ch[1542])
		{
			//▼モスビー戦終了後 !ch[1505]
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"自己出銭","比想像中還要難。","","");
		}
		if (!ch[1513] && ch[1505])
		{
			//▼ラッシー戦終了後(ホーム復興イベント) !ch[1513]
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"要是在我家附近","就可以向父親求助","賛助我了……","");
		}
		if (!ch[1571] && ch[1513])
		{
			//▼クリーム戦終了後 !ch[1571]
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"啗唸啗唸……","","","");
			Message(56,"因為被騙而要負上債務","光是看到也想哭。","","");
			Message(56,"好可憐啝。","","","");
		}
		if (!ch[1538] && ch[1571])
		{
			//▼王子戦終了後 !ch[1538]
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"絈琳，","快要决戦了。","","");
			Message(56,"和汢悶的家庭","生活相比，","現在過得十分充実。","");
		}
		
		SelStart(50);
		SelText("和咜交換",1);
		SelText("不交換",2);
		SelEnd();
		if (ch[50] == 1)
		{
			// チェンジ
			if (ch[2007])
			{
				// パリン
				Message(0,"現在不是交換的時机姶。","","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
				return 0;
			}
			
			// ドクイベント中？
			if (ch[2530] && !ch[2533])
			{
				// ドクイベント中で交代してはいけない
				//ポポン
				Message(56,"交換呎？","","","");
				Message(56,"対不起，","我現在有点不想前進了。","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
				return 0;
			}
			{
				// わらしべ中は交代できないようにする
				int warasibe;
				warasibe = 0;
				KaguTest(20001,17);
				if (ch[430])
				{
					warasibe = 1;
				}
				KaguTest(20001,18);
				if (ch[430])
				{
					warasibe = 1;
				}
				KaguTest(20001,25);
				if (ch[430])
				{
					warasibe = 1;
				}
				KaguTest(20001,27);
				if (ch[430])
				{
					warasibe = 1;
				}
				KaguTest(20001,30);
				if (ch[430])
				{
					warasibe = 1;
				}
				KaguTest(20001,31);
				if (ch[430])
				{
					warasibe = 1;
				}
				KaguTest(20001,32);
				if (ch[430])
				{
					warasibe = 1;
				}
				if (warasibe)
				{
					// わらしべ中だ
					Message(56,"現在突然","不想玩了……","","");
					Message(56,"下次有約我叺。","","","");
					ch[400] = -1;
					return 0;
				}
				//パリン
				Message(0,"再見，加油姶。","","","");
				Black(0,100,15);
				Wait(20);
				KaguTest(20070,6);
//				ch[2501] = 6;
				ch[3957] = 1;
				ReloadChar();
				LoadMapB(12);
				Black(0,0,15);
				Wait(15);
			}
		}
		else
		{
			// 非チェンジ
			//パリン
			Message(0,"還是，以后再算叺。","","","");
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"是呎，真可惜。","","","");
		}
	}
	else
	{
		// まだ交代は出来ない
		if (!ch[2038])
		{
			// 初会話
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"呼呼，好累……","我快走不動了。","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"祢，祢是誰？","","","");
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"嚇我一跳！！","","","");
			Message(56,"祢…何時","站在那里的？","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"剛才姶！","","","");
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"是，是呎…","我的名字叫波班。","","");
			Message(56,"今天","搬到這个城鎮来。","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"呀！！","進展得真快姶。","","");
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"呵呵，从布莱恩婆婆","那邊听説了。","","");
			Message(56,"祢是這个城鎮唯一的孩子……","絈琳対叺？","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"哘，我是。","","","");
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"怎麼様？","跟我做个朋友","好呎？","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"……………………","","","");
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"怎麼了？","","","");
			Message(56,"…不対，応該是祢覚得我怎麼了？","","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"太好了！！","終于如我所愿找到人類的朋友。","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"祢叫波班呎？","我們現在就去玩叺！","","");
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"姶…現，現在去呎？","其実我才剛","搬過来。","");
			Message(56,"等我先安頓","好了再去可以呎？","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"説得也是。","我明白了。","","");
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"很抱歉。","","","");
			
			ch[2038] = 1;
			ch[400] = -1;
			return 0;
		}
		if (!ch[1545] && ch[2038])
		{
			//▼兄たま誘拐後&&ドリル入手後 !ch[1545]
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"不去遺迹那邊幇普柯","真的可以呎？","","");
		}
		if (!ch[2330] && ch[1545])
		{
			//▼王子と四天王登場後 !ch[2330]
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"那个伝説中的鑚頭","有着神秘的能量咾。","","");
			Message(56,"但我的武器","也不会輸給祢哦。","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"祢拿着什麼武器？","快給我看看。","","");
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"哂哂，先不告訴祢。","時机到了自然会給祢看。","","");
		}
		if (!ch[507] && ch[2330])
		{
			//▼襲撃後?３オバケ発見後 !ch[507]
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"対了","絈琳知道壁紙呎？","","");
			Message(56,"如果想収集到壁紙","我推荐祢","尽可能和大家説説話。","");
			Message(56,"然而大家有什麼要求的話","請不要嫌弃尽量達到。","","");
		}
		if (!ch[1542] && ch[507])
		{
			//▼ボブー戦終了後 !ch[1542]
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"我好羡慕絈琳","有更換的衣服。","","");
			Message(56,"増加服装","有很多種方式的。","","");
			Message(56,"過了一関","接下来難易度会提升才能再過関","類似這様是其中一種方法。","");
		}
		if (!ch[1505] && ch[1542])
		{
			//▼モスビー戦終了後 !ch[1505]
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"剛才，西林達先生","邀請我約会。","","");
			Message(56,"雖然他不是坏人，","可是我…","","");
			Message(56,"還是不想応約。","","","");
			//パリン
			Message(0,"哘？","","","");
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"没，没什麼。","呵呵。","","");
		}
		if (!ch[1513] && ch[1505])
		{
			//▼ラッシー戦終了後(ホーム復興イベント) !ch[1513]
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"白金的珍稀","奨牌全部集斉的話……","","");
			Message(56,"可能会発生什麼事。","","","");
		}
		if (!ch[1571] && ch[1513])
		{
			//▼クリーム戦終了後 !ch[1571]
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"幽霊之家以外的幽霊","也可以封印","到壷里。","");
		}
		if (!ch[1538] && ch[1571])
		{
			//▼王子戦終了後 !ch[1538]
			//ポポン
			Message(56,"一切都結束時……","","","");
			Message(56,"再跟絈琳。","一起去玩叺。","","");
			Message(56,"我跟祢承諾","到時拿出我最自豪的武器給祢看。","","");
		}
	}
	ch[400] = -1;
}
#EndScript

// 012:NPCパリン
#Script:01311
int main()
{
	ch[400] = 59;
	KaguTest(99993,0);
	if (!ch[1545])
	{
		//▼兄たま誘拐後&&ドリル入手後 !ch[1545]
		//パリン
		Message(59,"偶爾偸懶，","這様一直站着","也不錯嘛。","");
	}
	if (!ch[2330] && ch[1545])
	{
		//▼王子と四天王登場後 !ch[2330]
		//パリン
		Message(59,"哘，始終站着","脚会很痛。","","");
		Message(59,"芬姐和廸斯克先生","還真了不起姶。","","");
	}
	if (!ch[507] && ch[2330])
	{
		//▼襲撃後?３オバケ発見後 !ch[507]
		//パリン
		Message(59,"被莫托洛塗了油漆","就算見到","爺爺……","");
		Message(59,"看到這副様子","可能也不会説話叺。","","");
	}
	if (!ch[1542] && ch[507])
	{
		//▼ボブー戦終了後 !ch[1542]
		//パリン
		Message(59,"説到遺迹，","想起我的父母親。","","");
		Message(59,"他們，現在如何咾？","","","");
	}
	if (!ch[1505] && ch[1542])
	{
		//▼モスビー戦終了後 !ch[1505]
		//パリン
		Message(59,"祢是布莱恩婆婆","的外甥叺？","","");
		Message(59,"大概是喜歓討論伝聞叺？","","","");
	}
	if (!ch[1513] && ch[1505])
	{
		//▼ラッシー戦終了後(ホーム復興イベント) !ch[1513]
		//パリン
		Message(59,"是時候換了叺？","","","");
		Message(59,"在碧曼陀山","穿那套衣服，会很麻煩的。","","");
	}
	if (!ch[1571] && ch[1513])
	{
		//▼クリーム戦終了後 !ch[1571]
		//パリン
		Message(59,"説什麼偸吃蛋糢","要背負債款姶！","","");
		Message(59,"大家，好過侘哦。","","","");
	}
	if (!ch[1538] && ch[1571])
	{
		//▼王子戦終了後 !ch[1538]
		//パリン
		Message(59,"奪走普柯和碧諾","故郷的犯人","応該是西林達先生叺","");
		Message(59,"明白了呎？","","","");
		Message(59,"不過，西林達先生","也没有悪意的，","在這世上生存不容易姶。","");
	}
	
	SelStart(50);
	SelText("交換",1);
	SelText("不交換",2);
	SelEnd();
	
	if (ch[50] == 1)
	{
		// チェンジ
		Black(0,100,15);
		Wait(20);
		KaguTest(20070,0);
//		ch[2501] = 0;
		ch[3957] = 0;
		ReloadChar();
		LoadMapB(12);
		Black(0,0,15);
		Wait(15);
	}
	else
	{
		// 非チェンジ
	}
	ch[400] = -1;
}
#EndScript

// 109裏：門番会話
#Script:01312
int main()
{
	ch[400] = 58;
	ch[258]++;
	KaguTest(12004,58);
	if (ch[420] != 98)
	{
		// ルーチン変更
		KaguTest(12000,58);
		ch[420] = 98;
		KaguTest(12002,58);
		ch[420] = 58;
		ch[421] = 15;
		KaguTest(20044,42);
	}
	{
		ch[302] = 1;
		// マップによって変える
		int map;
		KaguTest(20010,0);
		map = ch[420];
		
		if (map == 109)
		{
			// 遺跡裏１
			if (ch[2041])
			{
				// 過関済み
				//看門人
				Message(58,"祢可以前進了。","","","");
			}
			else
			{
				// 初看門人
				if (ch[258] < 2)
				{
					//看門人
					Message(58,"想進去的話，","讓我見識一下…祢的力量！","","");
				}
				else
				{
					if (ch[258] < 3)
					{
						//看門人
						Message(58,"怎麼？","我再説一次啅。","","");
						Message(58,"想進去的話，","讓我見識一下…祢的力量！","","");
					}
					else
					{
						//看門人
						Message(58,"想進去的話，","讓我見識一下…祢的力量！","","");
						Message(58,"……莫非祢還不悁呎？","","","");
						Message(58,"不然這様叺。","給我￥１０００就給祢提示。","","");
						
						SelStart(50);
						SelText("給￥１０００",1);
						SelText("不給",2);
						SelEnd();
						
						if (ch[50] == 1)
						{
							if (GetGP() < 1000)
							{
								// 足りない
								Mes("現金不足。");
							}
							else
							{
								SetGP(GetGP() - 1000);
								SE(893);
								//看門人
								Message(58,"這様就会被体諒。","","","");
								Message(58,"必殺技姶，必殺技。","什麼都可以教給祢啅！","","");
							}
						}
						else
						{
							//看門人
							Message(58,"想進去的話，","讓我見識一下…祢的力量……","","");
						}
					}
				}
				ch[420] = 58;
				ch[421] = 2;
				KaguTest(20044,1);
			}
		}
		if (map == 114)
		{
			// 遺跡裏２
			string kotae;
			kotae ="啗唸小天使";
			switch(ch[2078])
			{
			case 0:
				kotae ="啗唸小天使";
				break;
			case 1:
				kotae ="新英雄伝説";
				break;
			case 2:
				kotae ="永遠的伊蘇";
				break;
			case 3:
				kotae ="七星魔法使";
				break;
			case 4:
				kotae ="謎城的国度";
				break;
			}
			
			if (ch[2040])
			{
				//看門人
				Message(58,"祢可以前進了。","","","");
			}
			else
			{
				// 初看門人
				if (ch[258] < 2 || ch[300])
				{
					Message(58,"要是門没有打開，","就念我們的口令。","","");
				}
				else
				{
					if (ch[258] < 3)
					{
						//看門人
						Message(58,"怎麼？","我再説一次啅。","","");
						Message(58,"要是門没有打開，","就念我們的口令。","","");
					}
					else
					{
						//看門人
						Message(58,"要是門没有打開，","就念我們的口令。","","");
						Message(58,"……莫非祢還不悁呎？","","","");
						Message(58,"不然這様叺。","約我￥１０００就給祢提示。","","");
						SelStart(50);
						SelText("給￥１０００",1);
						SelText("不給",2);
						SelEnd();
						
						if (ch[50] == 1)
						{
							if (GetGP() < 1000)
							{
								// 足りない
								Mes("現金不足。");
								ch[400] = -1;
								return 0;
							}
							else
							{
								SetGP(GetGP() - 1000);
								SE(893);
								//看門人
								Message(58,"多謝了啅！","","","");
								Message(58,"祢要仔細听清楚","徳克羅説的話就該悁了。","","");
								Message(58,"還有就是口令会改変","要小心応対。","","");
								Message(58,"現在的口令","就是《"+kotae+"》。","","");
								ch[400] = -1;
								ch[300] = 1;
								return 0;
							}
						}
						else
						{
							//看門人
							Message(58,"要是門没有打開，","就念我們的口令","","");
						}
					}
				}
				string type;
				type = Type(600);
				if (strcmp(type,kotae) == 0)
				{
					SE(950);
					//看門人
					Message(58,"『"+type+"』……","正確！","","");
					Message(58,"祢可以前進了。","","","");
					SaveCamera();
										
					Event(302);
					Wait(30);
					Camera(-1,0,0,0);
					RestoreCamera();
					CrossFade();
					ch[2040] = 1;
					CharPos(59,-200000,0,0);
					CharPos(60,-200000,0,0);
					CharPos(61,-200000,0,0);
					CharPos(62,-200000,0,0);
					CharPos(63,-200000,0,0);
					CharPos(64,-200000,0,0);
				}
				else
				{
					if (strcmp(type,"未輸入") == 0)
					{
						//看門人
						Message(58,"重新再做一次叺。","","","");
					}
					else
					{
						//看門人
						Message(58,"『"+type+"』……","很可惜，不正確姶。","","");
						Message(58,"重新再做一次叺。","","","");
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if (map == 506)
		{
			if (ch[2044])
			{
				// 過関済み
				//看門人
				Message(58,"祢可以前進了。","","","");
			}
			else
			{
				if (ch[308])
				{
					// 過関チェック
					if (ch[309])
					{
						// 壊してる
						//看門人
						Message(58,"祢姶，不可以破坏燭台的……","重新再做一次叺。","","");
						ch[400] = -1;
						return 0;
					}
					if (ch[300] && ch[301] && ch[302] && ch[303] && ch[304] && ch[305] && ch[306] && ch[307])
					{
						// 過関
						SE(950);
						//看門人
						Message(58,"所有的燭台都点灯了。","祢可以前進了。","","");
						ch[2044] = 1;
						Event(302);
						Wait(30);
						ch[400] = -1;
						return 0;
					}
				}
				if (ch[258] < 2)
				{
					//看門人
					Message(58,"想進去的話，","就点燃所有的燭台。","","");
				}
				else
				{
					if (ch[258] < 3)
					{
						//看門人
						Message(58,"怎麼？","我再説一次啅。","","");
						Message(58,"想進去的話，","就点燃所有的燭台。","","");
					}
					else
					{
						//看門人
						Message(58,"想進去的話，","就点燃所有的燭台。","","");
						Message(58,"……莫非祢還不悁呎？","","","");
						Message(58,"不然這様叺。","給我￥１０００就給祢提示。","","");
						Message(58,"還是，給我￥５０００","就幇祢開門","怎麼様？","");
						SelStart(50);
						SelText("給￥１０００",1);
						SelText("給￥５０００",3);
						SelText("不給",2);
						SelEnd();
						
						if (ch[50] == 1)
						{
							if (GetGP() < 1000)
							{
								// 足りない
								Mes("現金不足。");
							}
							else
							{
								SetGP(GetGP() - 1000);
								SE(893);
								//看門人
								Message(58,"多謝了啅。","","","");
								Message(58,"若燭台矼到鑚頭就会坏掉。","要使用必殺技去点火。","","");
							}
						}
						if (ch[50] == 3)
						{
							if (GetGP() < 5000)
							{
								// 足りない
								Mes("現金不足。");
							}
							else
							{
								SetGP(GetGP() - 5000);
								SE(893);
								//看門人
								Message(58,"多謝了啅！","","","");
								ch[2044] = 1;
								Event(302);
								Wait(30);
								//看門人
								Message(58,"祢可以前進了。","","","");
							}
						}
						if (ch[50] != 1 && ch[50] != 3)
						{
							//看門人
							Message(58,"想進去的話，","就点燃所有的燭台……","","");
						}
					}
				}
				// 飾台の火を消す
				KaguTest(20060,-1);
				ch[300] = 0;
				ch[301] = 0;
				ch[302] = 0;
				ch[303] = 0;
				ch[304] = 0;
				ch[305] = 0;
				ch[306] = 0;
				ch[307] = 0;
				ch[308] = 1;
			}
		}
		if (map == 507)
		{
			// 遺跡裏１
			if (ch[2042])
			{
				// 過関済み
				//看門人
				Message(58,"祢可以前進了。","","","");
			}
			else
			{
				KaguTest(20059,0);
				if (ch[2043] && (ch[420] == 1 || ch[420] == 11))
				{
					// 過関
					SE(950);
					//看門人
					if (ch[420] == 11)
					{
						Message(58,"１１……哘。","過于深思","算了叺。","");
						Message(58,"好，祢可以前進。","","","");
					}
					else
					{
						Message(58,"似乎已経達到過関条件。","好，祢可以前進了。","","");
					}
					Event(302);
					ch[2042] = 1;
					ch[400] = -1;
					return 0;
				}
				if (ch[258] < 2)
				{
					//看門人
					Message(58,"祢所擁有百分之九十九的価値","与水中暢游的白翼一様。","","");
				}
				else
				{
					if (ch[258] < 3)
					{
						//看門人
						Message(58,"怎麼？","我再説一次啅。","","");
						Message(58,"祢所擁有百分之九十九的価値","与水中暢游的白翼一様。","","");
					}
					else
					{
						//看門人
						Message(58,"祢所擁有百分之九十九的価値","与水中暢游的白翼一様。","","");
						Message(58,"……莫非祢還不悁呎？","","","");
						Message(58,"不然這様叺。","給我￥１０００就給祢提示。","","");
						Message(58,"還是，給我￥５０００","就幇祢開門","怎麼様？","");
						SelStart(50);
						SelText("給￥１０００",1);
						SelText("給￥５０００",3);
						SelText("不給",2);
						SelEnd();
						
						if (ch[50] == 1)
						{
							if (GetGP() < 1000)
							{
								// 足りない
								Mes("現金不足。");
							}
							else
							{
								SetGP(GetGP() - 1000);
								SE(893);
								//看門人
								Message(58,"其実也没有","那麼難啀。","","");
								Message(58,"随机値","和湖邊的白天鵝小船","的号碼相合就ＯＫ啀。","");
								Message(58,"攻撃敵人，破坏物品","随机値都会発生調整。","","");
							}
						}
						if (ch[50] == 3)
						{
							if (GetGP() < 5000)
							{
								// 足りない
								Mes("現金不足。");
							}
							else
							{
								SetGP(GetGP() - 5000);
								SE(893);
								//看門人
								Message(58,"多謝了啅！","","","");
								Event(302);
								ch[2042] = 1;
								Wait(30);
								//看門人
								Message(58,"祢可以前進了。","","","");
								ch[400] = -1;
								return 0;
							}
						}
						if (ch[50] != 1 && ch[50] != 3)
						{
							Message(58,"祢所擁有百分之九十九的価値","与水中暢游的白翼一様…","","");
						}
					}
				}
				ch[2043] = 1;
				// 過関チェック
				if (ch[420] == 1 || ch[420] == 11)
				{
					Message(58,"…………………………","","","");
					Message(58,"似乎已経達到","所有的過関条件。","","");
					Message(58,"祢可以前進了。","","","");
					Event(302);
					ch[2042] = 1;
				}
			}
		}
		if (map == 210)
		{
			if (ch[2045])
			{
				// 過関済み
				//看門人
				Message(58,"祢可以前進了。","","","");
			}
			else
			{
				if (!ch[2046])
				{
					// 初回
					//看門人
					Message(58,"哘，下一个問題","説什麼好咾……","","");
					Message(58,"想問題也是挺累人的。","","","");

				}

				}
				else

								// 足りない
								Mes("現金不足。");
							}
							else
							{
								SetGP(GetGP() - 1000);
								SE(893);
								//看門人

								Message(58,"用那个壷","封入有趣的幽霊来給我。","","");
							}
						}
						else
						{
							//看門人
							Message(58,"想進去的話，","先要讓我感到高興……","","");
						}
					}
				}
				ch[2046] = 1;
				ch[420] = 58;
				ch[421] = 2;
				KaguTest(20044,2);
			}
			
		}

		}
		if (map == 607)
		{
			if (ch[2050])
			{
				// 過関済み
				if (ch[2050] == 1)
				{
					// 必殺技で倒した
					// 罵倒
					switch(rand() % 3)
					{
						//看門人
					case 0:
						Message(58,"姶姶，不是叫祢","用力推倒我姶。","","");
						break;

						Message(58,"戦技越華麗","戦斗会越快楽。","","");
						break;
					}
					// 敵を出す
					// いなかったら出現
					// 死んでたら復活
					KaguTest(30025,1);
					KaguTest(30122,ch[420]);
					if (ch[420])
					{
						// 復活
						KaguTest(30021,1);
						
						ch[420] = 0;
						ch[421] = 450;
						ch[422] = 150;
						KaguTest(30123,1);
						KaguTest(30025,1);
						ch[421] = ch[420];
						ch[420] = 30;
						KaguTest(30120,ch[421]);
						ch[400] = -1;
						ch[301] = 0;
						return 0;
					}
					// 出現
					int x;
					int y;
					int z;
					KaguTest(30025,1);
					GetCharPos(ch[420],x,y,z);
					if (x > -20000)
					{
						ch[400] = -1;
						return 0;
					}
					ch[420] = 100000;
					ch[427] = 0;
					KaguTest(30015,1);
					ch[420] = 58;
					ch[421] = 2;
					KaguTest(20044,4);
					ch[420] = 0;
					ch[421] = 450;
					ch[422] = 150;

					KaguTest(30025,1);

					ch[420] = 30;

					//看門人

			}

			{

				else
				{
					//看門人
					Message(58,"使出讓我双眼燃焼","的華麗戦斗叺！","","");
					Message(58,"……莫非祢還不悁呎？","","","");
					Message(58,"不然這様叺。","給我￥１０００就給祢提示！","","");
					SelStart(50);
					SelText("給￥１０００",1);
					SelText("不給",2);
					SelEnd();

					{
						if (GetGP() < 1000)
						{
							// 足りない
							Mes("現金不足。");
						}

							SE(893);

				KaguTest(30122,ch[420]);

				{
					// 復活
					KaguTest(30021,1);
					ch[420] = 0;
					ch[421] = 450;
					ch[422] = 150;
					KaguTest(30123,1);
					KaguTest(30025,1);

					ch[301] = 0;

					Message(58,"指出那个人所在的地方。","","","");
					Message(58,"……莫非祢還不悁呎？","","","");
					Message(58,"不然這様叺。","約我￥１０００就給祢提示。","","");
					Message(58,"還是，給我￥５０００","就幇祢開門","怎麼様？","");

					SelText("給￥５０００",3);

					SelEnd();

					{

						}
					}
					if (ch[50] == 3)
					{
						if (GetGP() < 5000)
						{
							// 足りない
							Mes("現金不足。");
						}
						else
						{
							SetGP(GetGP() - 5000);
							SE(893);
							//看門人
							Message(58,"多謝了啅！","","","");

							ch[2051] = 1;
							Wait(30);
							//看門人
							Message(58,"祢可以前進了。","","","");
							ch[400] = -1;
							return 0;
						}
					}
					if (ch[50] != 1 && ch[50] != 3)
					{
						//看門人
						Message(58,"我們看門人之中","滲入了一位不相容的人。","","");
						Message(58,"指出那个人所在的地方。","","","");
					}
				}
			}
			string type;
			type = Type(600);
			if (strcmp(type,"暗黒空洞") == 0)
			{
				SE(950);
				//看門人
				Message(58,"……祢説得没錯。","好了，祢可以前進。","","");
				Event(302);
				ch[2051] = 1;
				ch[400] = -1;

			}
			if (strcmp(type,"未輸入") == 0)
			{
				//看門人
				Message(58,"……完全不活道的話","不能讓祢過関。","","");
				Message(58,"重新再来一次。","","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
				return 0;
			}
			Message(58,"……真可惜不正確。","","","");
			if (ch[2048])
			{
				Message(58,"再次和其他看門人","見見面看叺。","","");
				Message(58,"再矼面答案很快就会出来的。","","","");
			}
			else
			{
				//看門人
				Message(58,"……唔，祢似乎","還没跟其他看門人","見面咾。","");
				Message(58,"再矼面答案很快就会出来的。","","","");
			}
		}
		if (map == 311)
		{
			if (ch[2052])
			{
				//看門人
				Message(58,"祢可以前進了。","","","");
				ch[400] = -1;
				return 0;
			}
			if (ch[258] < 2)
			{
				//看門人
				Message(58,"想前進的話，","給我看祢最能吃的食物。","","");
			}
			else
			{
				if (ch[258] < 3)
				{
					//看門人
					Message(58,"怎麼？","我再説一次啅。","","");
					Message(58,"想進去的話，","給我看祢最能吃的食物。","","");
				}
				else
				{
					//看門人
					Message(58,"想進去的話，","給我看祢最能吃的食物。","","");
					Message(58,"……莫非祢還不悁呎？","","","");
					Message(58,"不然這様叺。","給我￥１０００就給祢提示。","","");
					SelStart(50);
					SelText("給￥１０００",1);
					SelText("不給",2);
					SelEnd();
					
					if (ch[50] == 1)
					{
						if (GetGP() < 1000)
						{
							// 足りない
							Mes("現金不足。");
						}
						else
						{
							SetGP(GetGP() - 1000);
							SE(893);
							//看門人
							Message(58,"多謝了啅。","","","");
							Message(58,"在那邊吃","最愛吃的食物。","","");
							Message(58,"不用多説","草莓……就是我所指的。","","");
						}
					}
					else
					{
						//看門人
						Message(58,"想進去的話，","給我看祢最能吃的食物…","","");
					}
				}
			}
			ch[420] = 58;
			ch[421] = 2;
			KaguTest(20044,5);
		}
	}
	ch[400] = -1;
}
#EndScript

// 109裏：門番正解
#Script:01313
int main()
{
	// 正解した
	SaveCamera();

	Camera(58,0,1035,320);
	CrossFade();
	SE(950);
	Message(58,"確実給我看過了。","尽管継続前進叺。","","");
	Event(302);
	ch[2041] = 1;
	Wait(30);
	
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
}
#EndScript

// 114裏：番人１～６
#Script:01314
int main()
{
	int x;
	x = ch[400];
	
	KaguTest(12004,x);
	if (ch[420] != 98)
	{
		// ルーチン変更
		KaguTest(12000,x);
		ch[420] = 98;
		KaguTest(12002,x);
		ch[420] = x;
		ch[421] = 15;
		KaguTest(20044,42);
	}
	
	if (ch[2040])
	{
		// クリア済み
		Message(58,"尽管継続前進叺。","","","");
	}
	else
	{
		string kotae;
		if (x == 59)
		{
			// 看門人１　　４番目文字
			kotae ="ｉ";
			switch(ch[2078])
			{
			case 0:
				kotae ="天";
				break;
			case 1:
				kotae ="伝";
				break;
			case 2:
				kotae ="伊";
				break;
			case 3:
				kotae ="法";
				break;
			case 4:
				kotae ="国";
				break;
			}
			Message(59,"暗号是「"+kotae+"」。","知道下一个字的人，","就是正対面的那个我。","");
		}
		if (x == 60)
		{
			// 看門人２　　１番目文字
			kotae ="ｈｉ";
			switch(ch[2078])
			{
			case 0:
				kotae = "啗";
				break;
			case 1:
				kotae = "新";
				break;
			case 2:
				kotae = "永";
				break;
			case 3:
				kotae = "七";
				break;
			case 4:
				kotae = "謎";
				break;
			}
			Message(60,"暗号一開始是「"+kotae+"」。","知道下一个字的人，","就是正対面的那个我。","");
		}
		if (x == 61)
		{
			// 看門人３　　３番目文字
			kotae = "ｋｅ";
			switch(ch[2078])
			{
			case 0:
				kotae = "小";
				break;
			case 1:
				kotae = "雄";
				break;
			case 2:
				kotae = "的";
				break;
			case 3:
				kotae = "魔";
				break;
			case 4:
				kotae = "的";
				break;
			}
			Message(61,"暗号是「"+kotae+"」。","知道下一个字的人，","就是旁邊隔一个的那个我。","");
		}
		if (x == 62)
		{
			// 看門人４　　５番目文字
			kotae = "ｍｏ";
			switch(ch[2078])
			{
			case 0:
				kotae = "使";
				break;
			case 1:
				kotae = "説";
				break;
			case 2:
				kotae = "蘇";
				break;
			case 3:
				kotae = "使";
				break;
			case 4:
				kotae = "度";
				break;
			}
			Message(62,"暗号最后是「"+kotae+"」","知道最初的暗号的人，","就是正対面旁邊的那个我。","");
		}
		if (x == 63)
		{
			// 看門人５　　２番目文字
			kotae = "ｒａ";
			switch(ch[2078])
			{
			case 0:
				kotae = "唸";
				break;
			case 1:
				kotae = "英";
				break;
			case 2:
				kotae = "遠";
				break;
			case 3:
				kotae = "星";
				break;
			case 4:
				kotae = "城";
				break;
			}
			Message(63,"暗号是「"+kotae+"」。","知道下一个字的人，","就是左前方斜対面的那个我。","");
		}
		if (x == 64)
		{
			// 看門人１
			Message(64,"想暗号也是件很煩的事姶。","","","");
		}
	}
	
	ch[400] = -1;
}
#EndScript

// 210裏:呼び出されたキャラチェック
#Script:01315
int main()
{
	int pt;
	
	if (ch[301] == 16)
	{
		// ポコが呼び出された
		ch[400] = 58;
		ch[420] = 15;

		KaguTest(12000,16);
		ch[420] = 7;
		ch[421] = 1;
		ch[422] = 5;
		KaguTest(12003,ch[301]);
//		ch[420] = 3;
//		KaguTest(30064,16);

		Wait(15);

	{

		CrossFade();
		Wait(15);

		Wait(ch[423]);

		ch[420] = 3;
		KaguTest(30064,ch[301]);
		Wait(25);
		ch[420] = 2;
		KaguTest(30064,ch[301]);
		CharPos(ch[301],340,275,0);
		Look(ch[301],58);
		Wait(15);

		{
			//チャッキー
			Look(11,0);
			Message(11,"姐姐，听听我的新作叺。","","","");

			SE(473);
			Wait(60);
			Fill(0,0.0);
			ch[420] = -100000;
			ch[421] = -100000;
			ch[422] = -100000;
			ch[423] = -100000;
			KaguTest(20054,0);
			//パリン

			//イワオ

// 608裏：門番正解
#Script:01317

	Camera(58,125,-125,370);
	CrossFade();

	Message(58,"確実給我看過了。","尽管継続前進叺。","","");

// 607裏：門番正解
#Script:01318
int main()
{
	// 正解した
	int a;
	if (ch[2050] && ch[302] != 42 && ch[302] != 38)
	{
		// 駄目
		return 0;
	}
	a = 0;
	if (ch[2050])
	{
		// 既に扉あいてる
		a = 1;
	}
	
	SaveCamera();
	WaitD(0);
	Camera(58,0,-205,370);
	CrossFade();
	SE(950);
	if (ch[302] == 42 || ch[302] == 38)
	{
		// 爆死させた
		if (ch[2050])
		{
			//看門人
			Message(58,"啝，太美妙了！","簡直像是蝴蝶在起舞，","蜜蜂在采蜜般姶！","");
		}
		else
		{
			//看門人
			Message(58,"啝啝啝！！","","","");
			Message(58,"真精采，不愧是","鑚頭的持有者！","","");
			Message(58,"門我幇祢打開叺","請小心前進！","","");
		}
		ch[2050] = 2;
	}
	else
	{
		// 必殺技で倒した
		//看門人
		Message(58,"…哘，還没有","達到戦斗時的美学姶。","","");
		Message(58,"既是鑚頭的継承者就該","使出更華麗的戦斗。","","");
		Message(58,"門勉強可以給祢打開。","","","");
		ch[2050] = 1;
	}
	if (!a)
	{
		Event(302);
		Wait(30);
	}
	
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
}
#EndScript

// 603裏：レバー引いたら扉開く
#Script:01323
int main()
{
	SaveCamera();
	TekiStop(1);
	Wait(15);
	SE(950);
	Black(0,100,15);
	Blur(5,0,15);
	Wait(15);
	Camera(Door2C(1),-800,-3215,250);
	CrossFade();
	
		// 敵準備
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,1);
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	int c;
	c = ch[420];
	int pt1;
	int pt2;
	int pt3;
	KaguTest(12004,c);
	pt1 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c+1);
	pt2 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c+2);
	pt3 = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12000,c);
	KaguTest(12000,c+1);
	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(12005,c+2);
	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(30064,c);
	KaguTest(30064,c+1);
	KaguTest(30064,c+2);
	
	TekiStop(0);
	Wait(15);
	Black(0,0,15);
	Wait(30);

	Event(300);
	
	Wait(30);

	// 敵が凍った敵を運んでくる
	Walk2(c,0,8,100);
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Walk2(c+1,0,8,100);
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Walk2(c+2,0,8,100);
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	ch[420] = 0;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 5;
	KaguTest(12003,c);
	KaguTest(12003,c+1);
	ch[420] = 2;
	KaguTest(12003,c+2);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30113,c+2);
	Wait(120);
		// 凍った敵を下ろす
	ch[420] = 2011;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c+1);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30041,c+2);
	Wait(15);
	Walk2(c,5,0,15);
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Walk2(c+1,-5,0,15);
	KaguTest(30039,0);
	Wait(15);
	ch[420] = 2010;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c);
		// パターン戻す
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30113,c+2);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30041,c+2);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
	KaguTest(12005,c+1);
	KaguTest(12005,c+2);
	ch[420] = pt1;
	KaguTest(12002,c);
	ch[420] = pt2;
	KaguTest(12002,c+1);
	ch[420] = pt3;
	KaguTest(12002,c+2);
	Wait(45);

	Black(0,100,15);
	Wait(15);
	TekiStop(1);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	Black(0,0,15);
	Blur(5,120,15);
	Wait(15);
	
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 602裏：あたりに触れるとガンマンが出てくる
#Script:01324
int main()
{
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;

	ch[420] = 15;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,0);

	TekiStop(1);
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,1);

	ch[420] = -2615;
	ch[421] = 7230;
	ch[422] = 916;
	ch[423] = -1670;
	ch[424] = 7210;
	ch[425] = 296;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	
	// 落下中かチェック
	GetCharPos(0,x,y,z);
	if (z < 400)
	{
		// 場所移動
		CharPos(0,-2400,7350,450);
	}
	
	// 敵のそのそ出てくる
	int c;
	int pt;
	KaguTest(30025,1);
	c = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12004,c);
	pt = ch[420];
	KaguTest(12000,c);
	
	Walk2(c,0,4,100);
	ch[429] = 0;
	KaguTest(30039,0);

		// カメラ
	ch[420] = -3303;
	ch[421] = 7568;
	ch[422] = 932;
	ch[423] = -1738;
	ch[424] = 7298;
	ch[425] = 296;
	KaguTest(30093,90);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	
	ch[420] = c;
	KaguTest(30063,0);

	Wait(100);
	Look(c,0);
	ch[420] = 2009;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c);
	KaguTest(30063,-1);
	Wait(60);
		// 銃構える
	ch[420] = 18;
	ch[421] = 1;
	ch[422] = 15;
	KaguTest(12003,c);
	Wait(30);
		// 銃撃つ（ルーチン作ってから）
	KaguTest(30119,c);
	Wait(60);

	// 後始末
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	
	TekiStop(0);
	
	ch[420] = pt;
	KaguTest(12002,c);
	ch[420] = 3;
	KaguTest(12005,c);
}
#EndScript

// 601裏：あたりに触れるとトゲボール隊スタンバイ
#Script:01325
int main()
{
	ch[420] = 9999;
	KaguTest2(30003,2,"tekiatari1");
	
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,1);
}
#EndScript

// 601裏：あたりに触れると中ボスがこうもりに乗ってやってくる
#Script:01326
int main()
{
	int c;
	int i;
	int pt[4];

	ch[420] = 9998;
	KaguTest2(30003,2,"tekiatari2");
	
	ch[420] = 100000;
	ch[427] = 7;
	KaguTest(30015,50);
	KaguTest(30015,51);
	KaguTest(30015,52);
	KaguTest(30015,53);
	KaguTest(30025,50);
	c = ch[420];
	for (i = 0;i < 4;i++)
	{
		KaguTest(12004,c + i);
		pt[i] = ch[420];
		KaguTest(12000,c + i);
		ch[420] = 2;
		KaguTest(30041,c + i);
		Look(c+i,0);
		KaguTest(12011,c + i);
		ch[420] = 2;
		KaguTest(12012,c + i);
	}

	Look(0,c);
	
	ch[420] = -3045;
	ch[421] = -806;
	ch[422] = -307;
	ch[423] = -4427;
	ch[424] = -1264;
	ch[425] = 20;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);

	ch[420] = -3086;
	ch[421] = -995;
	ch[422] = 216;
	ch[423] = -4520;
	ch[424] = -1256;
	ch[425] = -279;
	KaguTest(30093,75);
	KaguTest(30019,14);
	Wait(15);
	
	ch[420] = 2011;
	ch[429] = 0;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c+1);
	KaguTest(30036,c+2);
	KaguTest(30036,c+3);
	
	Wait(60);

	// 中ボス飛ぶ
	ch[420] = 2011;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,c+1);
	KaguTest(30036,c+2);
	KaguTest(30036,c+3);
	Walk2(c,24,0,30);
	Wait(2);
	ch[420] = 1;
	KaguTest(30041,c);
	KaguTest(30041,c+1);
	KaguTest(30041,c+2);
	KaguTest(30041,c+3);
	ch[421] = 20;
	ch[422] = 1;
	KaguTest(30037,c);
	Wait(8);
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30041,c+1);
	KaguTest(30041,c+2);
	KaguTest(30041,c+3);
	Wait(20);
	
	// 後始末
	KaguTest(30019,0);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);

	for (i = 0;i < 4;i++)
	{
		ch[420] = 3;
		KaguTest(12005,c + i);
		ch[420] = pt[i];
		KaguTest(12002,c + i);
	}
}
#EndScript

// 309:火飾台消したら扉開く
#Script:01327
int main()
{
	ch[300] = 1;
	Wait(15);
	SE(950);
	Camera(Door2C(1),0,2825,350);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(20);
	Event(303);
	Wait(40);
	Camera(-1,0,0,0);
	CrossFade();
	ch[2074] = 1;
}
#EndScript

// ミニゲーム脱出
#Script:01329
int main()
{
	ch[2061] = 0;
	KaguTest(20057,0);
	Black(0,100,30);
	ch[3982] = 0;
	ch[2144] = 0;
	ch[2497] = 0;
	KaguTest(20010,0);
	int map;
	map = ch[420];
	Wait(30);
	LoadMap(map);
	KaguTest(12013,0);

	// マップに応じてデフォ位置、カメラ位置かえる	
	switch(map)
	{
	case 21:
		// 岩壊し
		CharPos(0,750,600,-150);
		Walk(-5,0,2);
		break;
	case 22:
		// レーザー避け
		CharPos(0,0,-900,0);
		Walk(0,5,2);
		break;
	case 23:
		// モグラタタキ
		CharPos(0,0,-1450,150);
		Walk(0,5,2);
		break;
	case 24:
		// サッカー
		CharPos(0,650,0,0);
		Walk(-5,0,2);
		break;
	default:
		// おかしい
		// 座標は０、０、０
		CharPos(0,0,0,0);
		Walk(0,5,2);
		break;
	}
	KaguTest(30057,0);
	Black(0,0,30);
}
#EndScript

// 22:ドクドック家２ルックポイント1：顔モニター①
#Script:01377
int main()
{
	Message(0,"対了，「相性占卜」？","","","");
	Message(0,"好像挺有点意思哦。","","","");
	SelStart(50);
	SelText("做相性占卜",1);
	SelText("不作相性占卜",2);
	SelEnd();
	
	if (ch[50] != 1)
	{
		return 0;
	}
	Mes("輸入名字。");
	Wait(60);
	string txt;
	txt = Type(600);
	if (strcmp(txt,"未輸入") == 0)
	{
		// エラー
		Message(0,"「発生輸入錯誤」？","","","");
		Message(0,"不輸入名字的話","就没有効果咾。","","");
		return 0;
	}
	Mes("輸入占卜的対象名字。");
	Wait(60);
	string txt2;
	txt2 = Type(600);
	if (strcmp(txt2,"未輸入") == 0)
	{
		// エラー
		Message(0,"「発生輸入錯誤」？","","","");
		Message(0,"不輸入名字的話","就没有効果咾。","","");
		return 0;
	}
	KaguTest2(10007,0,txt);
	KaguTest2(10007,1,txt2);
	KaguTest(13000,0);
	
	int a;
	if (ch[420] < 0)
	{
		ch[420] = -1 * ch[420];
	}
	a = ch[420] % 5;
	
	switch(a)
	{
	case 0://この機械駄目
		Message(0,"『明日是大晴天叺』？","","","");
		Message(0,"……相性占卜","還完全没有！","","");
		break;
	case 1:// 二人はラブラブ
		Message(0,"『両人面前没有任何阻隔。","両人永遠相親相愛","一直白頭到老生』？","");
		Message(0,"……這麼難為情的事情","好好想想咾。","","");
		break;
	case 2:// 親友
		Message(0,"『両人的友情已経神的等級！","神的作為面前会","只埋伏怎様的敵人』？","");
		Message(0,"……不好理解姶","総之好像挺了不得的叺。","","");
		break;
	case 3:// もうだめぽ
		Message(0,"『両人之間已経産生了代溝","可能会進而破裂成一条大峡谷","好好想想祢們的関系叺』？","");
		Message(0,"……哘？","説是当然也就是当然咾。","","");
		break;
	case 4:// これからこれから
		Message(0,"『両人的未来一定从這開始！","不要悲観而要経常努力是最重要的","這様做的話，総有一天会……』？","");
		Message(0,"……呵呵，占卜就是這麼一様東西咾。","","","");
		break;
	}
	ch[420] = a;
}
#EndScript

// 22:ドクドック家２ルックポイント2：顔モニター②
#Script:01378
int main()
{
	Message(0,"「今日的運勢」？","","","");
	Message(0,"好像是占卜的机器咾。","","","");
	
	SelStart(50);
	SelText("做占卜",1);
	SelText("不占卜",2);
	SelEnd();
	
	if (ch[50] != 1)
	{
		return 0;
	}
	switch(rand() % 10)
	{
	case 0://大吉
	case 2:
	case 6:
	case 8:
		Message(0,"『祢的運勢是大吉。","今天会在大吉的一天中度過』？","","");
		Message(0,"…有干勁的叺？","","","");
		break;
	case 1://大凶
		Message(0,"『祢今日的運勢是大凶。","笑着度過大凶的一天』？","","");
		Message(0,"那里是勃然大怒","為什麼会這様咾…","","");
		break;
	case 3:
	case 4:
	case 5://吉
		Message(0,"『祢今天的運勢是吉。","可有可无","在平凡的一天中度過』？","");
		Message(0,"……占卜之類的","就是這麼一様東西咾。","","");
		break;
	case 7:
	case 9:// 末吉
		Message(0,"『祢今天的運勢是小吉。","如果将小小的幸運変成大大的幸運的話","怎様的運勢都変成大吉』？","");
		Message(0,"這就是好事","可以這様理解的叺……","被騙了？","");
		break;
	}
}
#EndScript

// 22:ドクドック家２ルックポイント5：筒①
#Script:01381
int main()
{

// 203:岩カウンターパターンにする
#Script:01404
int main()
{
	int x;
	x = Lift2C(-1);
	
	if (ch[2498] > 990 && !ch[2059])
	{
		ch[2498] = 990;
	}
	
	ch[420] = 97;
	KaguTest(12002,x);
	ch[420] = 99;
	KaguTest(12010,x);
}
#EndScript

// 203:岩カウント終了。宝箱出す
#Script:01405
int main()
{
	SaveCamera();
	ch[2059] = 1;
	TekiStop(1);

	ch[420] = 15;
	ch[429] = 1;
	KaguTest(30036,0);
	Wait(30);
	
	ch[420] = -412;
	ch[421] = 2736;
	ch[422] = 2501;
	ch[423] = -1503;
	ch[424] = 2736;
	ch[425] = 2471;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	GetCharPos(0,x,y,z);
	KaguTest(30005,0);
	if (y < 1650 || ch[422] < 1650)
	{
		Black(0,100,7);
	}
	Wait(20);
	if (y < 1650 || ch[422] < 1650)
	{
		Black(0,0,7);
		Wait(20);
	}
	
	ch[2498] = 1000;
	Wait(10);
	SE(950);
	Wait(40);
	
	ch[420] = -565;
	ch[421] = 2745;
	ch[422] = 3045;
	ch[423] = -806;
	ch[424] = 4299;
	ch[425] = 2421;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(20);

	int ln;
	ln = Takara2C(2060);
	CharPos(ln,-825,4350,2400);
	SE(566);
	KaguTest(30018,ln);
	Wait(60);
	KaguTest(30019,0);	
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);

	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 103裏：橋壊すとツボ振ってくる
#Script:01406
int main()
{
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30124,3726);
	if (ch[420])
	{
		KaguTest(30004,101);
	}
	ch[420] = 15;
	KaguTest(30042,381);
}
#EndScript

// 103裏：落ちてきたツボを止める
#Script:01407
int main()
{
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(30124,3726);
	if (ch[420])
	{
		KaguTest(30004,200);
		CharPos(ch[420],-750,450,75);
	}
}
#EndScript

// 113:敵装備はがしチュートリアル
#Script:01410
int main()
{
	TekiStop(1);
	Message(0,"写着什麼東西","","","");

	// チュートリアル表示
	KaguTest(10006,0);
	KaguTest(10007,7);
	KaguTest2(10009,0,"tute_11.bmp");
	ch[423] = 180;
	ch[424] = 42;
	ch[425] = 460;
	ch[426] = 438;
	ch[427] = 0;
	ch[428] = 0;
	ch[429] = 320;
	ch[430] = 452;
	ch[431] = 512;
	SE(399);
	KaguTest(10010,10);
	Wait(10);
	Message(0,"","","","");
	ch[420] = 0;
	KaguTest(10011,10);
	Wait(10);
	
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

// 607裏:メダルの宝箱
#Script:01416
int main()
{
	ch[396] = 1;
	
	TekiStop(1);
	
	Wait(15);
	
	SaveCamera();
	ch[420] = 575;
	ch[421] = 609;
	ch[422] = 370;
	ch[423] = 575;
	ch[424] = -438;
	ch[425] = 70;
	KaguTest(30019,1);
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);

	int ln;
	ln = Takara2C(2611);
	CharPos(ln,575,-450,0000);
	SE(566);
	KaguTest(30018,ln);
	Wait(60);

	KaguTest(30019,0);	
	RestoreCamera();
	CrossFade();
	Wait(15);
	
	TekiStop(0);
}
#EndScript

	}
}

// 006 -> 012
#Script:01418
int main()
{
	ch[3952] = 0;
	MapEvent(0);
	
	Black(0,100,15);
	Wait(15);
	Black(0,100,0);
	Event(110);
	Wait(5);
	Black(0,0,15);
	Walk(0,-8,15);
	Wait(15);
	
	MapEvent(1);
}
#EndScript

// 開発室のキャラ設定
#Script:01441
int main()
{
	int x;
	int y;
	int z;
	int i;
	
	for (i = 58;i < 66;i++)
	{
		GetCharPos(i,x,y,z);
		if (x > -20000)
		{
			ch[420] = 2;
			KaguTest(12005,i);
			// 全員待機させる
			ch[420] = 2;
			ch[421] = 1;
			ch[422] = 5;
			KaguTest(12003,i);
			ch[420] = -1;
			Look(i,18);
			KaguTest(12002,i);
		}
	}
}
#EndScript

// 開発室用キャラ：ボブー
#Script:01442
int main()
{
Message(58,"喟，祢是主角耶！","","","");
	Message(58,"這个祢知道呎？","","","");
	Message(0,"什麼姶？","","","");
	Message(58,"啗唸小天使的商標只用一天都做好了！","","","");
	Message(58,"主編在出版前説的！","","","");
	Message(0,"呀！！","","","");
	Message(58,"哈哈哈哈！！","","","");
	Look(58,18);
}
#EndScript
